review: So so. Usually everything is delivered on time, but over last year I had a few orders that did not show up. Plus with the cost of living in the UK and the price of the delivery fee's its probably best to go and pick what you want in the supermarket, particularly when they don't stock everything via Uber.

I‚Äôve tried calling but as of yet and I‚Äôm unable to get through to discuss the issue and I have called numerous times. Customer service seems to be non-existent. I won‚Äôt be ordering again.

So disappointing they keep luring me in with the promise of a discount. Which They automatically apply- then say it's no good. I have complained before via chat and they basically were like sorry,  not sorry. You'd think I'd learn, but I keep getting sucked in by their emails saying 'hurry- don't lose this deal'.

review: I have been billed 2 items that didn't arrive and I placed order 17:19 it arrived just after 7pm - shocking service - considering shop less than 10 minutes away.

Last year I spent around 2,600¬£ on Uber and had never before been a fussy client. 1 star and Deliveroo from now on.

I see the timer count down to 2 minutes, and the wait time climbs up and down again and again. Eventually, I see a missed call from what seems like the driver and I call them back. They mumble this and that, and I hear them say something like "2 minutes, sorry". Before I know it, a couple more minutes pass, and then my order gets cancelled....and it's not even a full refund.

review: I have used Uber Eats less than a handful of times, but each time I have had trouble with a promo code being applied. It appears to be applied right up until the point of payment and then  they take the full payment without discount applied. No sign of the discount on the order confirmation. This must be a regular occurrence for them as  one of their support options is'promo not applied '. You'd think they'd be great at resolving such issues due to this, but it is an extremely stressful process. Firstly, they apparently cannot see details of your order until it is delivered so won't do anything until then. Even when you do raise the problem and provide full details they dont read properly and send you back guidance on applying a promo code to a new order, automatically closing your ticket before giving you a chance to respond. Eventually I was given a 'goodwill' gesture of  refund to the amount of the discount that should have been applied but advised I was lucky to get this as it is outside their normal procedure. I genuinely think these discounts are scams to lure people in before they rip you off at the full price then make you jump through hoops to try and claim the discount retrospectively. It's not a coincidence that this has happened to me every time I've applied a promo. I certainly will not risking this and using them again.

They inform you the couriers name and transport they will be using well the motorbike the courier arrived had no motor as it was a bicycle and the bag had hardly any insulation.So the food that should arrive complete, at least edible temperature ended up being missing items and had to heat the food ourselves.So we learnt our lesson the hard way! Both McDonald‚Äôs and Uber Eats are cheating people out of money. Best thing use the McDonald‚Äôs app but take that trip and pick it up.

review: I‚Äôm a regular user of Uber eats purely due to my disability , it‚Äôs easier to order stuff here,Todays experience was very shaking for myself and my young kids,Due to my disability I have a note on the door, claiming im disable and can‚Äôt get to the door,Normally I‚Äôll call the driver and ask them when outside to call me and I can give them the code and they‚Äôll put the order outside ,In this instance this persons phone was unreachable, when the person came he was banging on my door , very violently and as mentioned above it was a struggle getting to the door but due to being essential shop I made my way there (which took time as expected ) as I opened the door the man went full on ballistic on me , ‚Äòwhy you no open the door‚Äô why you have no bell‚Äô literally on my face , I made it clear of the sign of my disability and how it said to reach me bearing in mind I had those big door knock things if you knock I can‚Äôt miss you but if you read the notice in front  of you , you know how to reach me ) I‚Äôve called him and did show him again and called the phone which was unreachable , he said it was his wife‚Äôs and even the Uber account picture and name was a females not his .He was very aggressive   and startled me and my kids .I have put in an complain and defo won‚Äôt be using Uber eats, This man was very scary and aggressive , I felt so vulnerable and at that point I knew I wouldn‚Äôt be able to defend for myself and my kids ! how scary some people can be and knowing Ubereats haven‚Äôt done the relevant checks on this was worse as he‚Äôs clearly using  his wife‚Äôs account !I do not feel safe using this service and a fear this man will return to my home as I will take this further .

I go in app and see the promotion has disappeared. I reach out to customer service via chat and I was told if I am not able to provide a picture of the promotion, nothing can be done. Without photos they will not refund me my money. THIS IS FIRST CLASS FRAUD. UBER EATS
name: Ijeoma Oyakhilome

review: Spent ¬£39 on my birthday and the delivery man didn‚Äôt come to my door or call me. His proof of delivery photo shows he was on a different road. Uber are refusing to refund my ¬£39, refusing to send me official complaints channels and refusing to explain why I can‚Äôt have my money back. I have used Uber since the earliest days in London, and this is the way I‚Äôve been treated. ¬£39 down on my birthday for food I didn‚Äôt eat, for a driver who didn‚Äôt call or even knock on my door one time. If it was my fault the order was missed then fair enough, but proof of delivery shows he wasn‚Äôt at my address. In this economy with all the money Uber makes, it‚Äôs horrible they‚Äôve done this. Letting everyone know.
name: CW

review: I have been billed 2 items that didn't arrive and I placed order 17:19 it arrived just after 7pm - shocking service - considering shop less than 10 minutes away.
name: EW

review: This company is a disgrace.Ordered food from McDonald‚Äôs and our growing concern brought us to phoning McDonald‚Äôs them self to be told that the food had left them an hour before contacting Uber eats. After a 45 minute phone call we were told that cancelling the order would still be chargeable. I demanded a manager to confirm this was the correct way they treat paying customers and was told there was no manager available. The company changed the estimated delivery time 5 times to keep the order processing so a refund won‚Äôt be possible during the phone call.Avoid by all costs.

review: Unfortunately you don‚Äôt have less than 1 star ratings, but you should! Everytime I order a McDonald‚Äôs from the Stroud branch, it‚Äôs always stone cold and no sauces that I have asked for!! Sort it out before ¬£3.99 delivery charge for disgusting food is not on
name: JA

review: Well what can I say about uber eats if I could score you a big 0 I would ordered Mcdonald it was delivered on a push bike  bag was wet through and it was stone cold to the point it went straight in the bin but your customer service is the pits no refund all the dips was missing how the hell can you justify delivering food on a bike you might as well put a roller skates on a turtle so come on McDonald's stop them from doing it I so cross will not be using you again and sort your customer service out he was rude and then put phone done on me

review: Very unreliable with the promotions/discounts.I had a 5‚Ç¨ discount which was applied at checkout but after submitting the order and paying it charged me full price without the discount.The fact that its imposible to contact support via the app or any other method says everything about this company.

review: Uber eats Ok.  I am actually tired of all the wrong orderes being recieved.  As the issue should be with the individual merchant this complaint against Uber Eats is because they penalize customers when merchants gets something wrong.  To elaborate, recently, Jan 6, 2024 order placed and one item was not received, but rather a completely different item.  A picture was taken and sent to UE.  1- not only did they NOT respond within the 48 hrs but instead, 13 days later!, they said the food was picked up and no refund will be given. First, 13 days later is unacceptable.  Second, the order was NEVER picked up it was delivered.  Third, how dare you penalize the customer and let the merchant just get away with getting the order wrong.  This is wrong and flat out an unacceptable business model.  I assure you if you punish the merchant when appropriate like getting orders wrong, then I‚Äôm sure they will start reading the orders correctly.  Keep my money that you stole from me and other customers, Mr Merchant and Uber Eats.  I‚Äôm not in need of that, you are.  I am happy to continue to post everywhere I can about your flawed business and lack of respect for customers.  Go ahead and stand by your merchants when they continuously get orders wrong and ignore your customers.  Without customers there would be no need for merchants and Uber Eats.  Taking my business elsewhere.  Goodbye.

review: They keep sending me promotions and I've logged in and done orders 3 or 4 times and they NEVER work, even though all the conditions have been met. It's a scam and Uber Eats should be ashamed!

review: I've been ordering from ubereats for years, frequently, and my last order had a missing item. So I let customer service know, and they said I can't get a refund because my account has temporary hold on refunds. Absolutely no reason, clarification, or estimate on when refunds will be allowed on my account again. The service has been awful at responding to my questions and just gives the same automated message. What a horrible way to treat a long time customer. My trust is broken. How can I trust this service if they don't allow refunds when an item is missing?

review: Useless customer service. Too much AI Automation. I even called customer service via the phone to be told they can only help me via email. When I emailed it was an automated response with no human interaction. I tried several times to talk to someone about the awful experience I had and why I was seeking a refund to only be told over and over there's nothing more they can do. In the end, i kept declining their resolutions and asking 'are you even human?' before I got a proper response. Terrible service. Would not recommend. Reason for complaint: Food was over an hour late, arrived squished, cold and covered in grease. Inedible. Got ¬£7 back from an ¬£18 order even though the whole meal was ruined. Made second order to eat something for it to also arrive cold and disgusting. Took three days to get a person to respond.

review: They need work on the customer service side . As I didn't get my whole order . Trying to get a hold of anybody was a pain. Then never respond.  Never got a refund on the food that i never received.  So pissed to only get half my order .

review: Had a delivery for McDonald's, once it arrived the drink was half empty due to it spilling and the food was freezing cold and not edible, I called up to tell them and the refused to offer a refund or even replace the items. I think the ¬£6 they charge in delivery and they cannot even deliver edible food. Rediculous and disgusting they won't even refund me so now I'm out of pocket and still had no food

review: I make many orders from UberEATS, but in the past few months, when I am missing an item in my order, they are not getting back to me, or it takes weeks to hear something back from their customer service support team in the app. Postmates was the app I used to use. They bought the company. An order was made on January 6, 2024, and they returned to me on January 19, 2024, at 7:00 AM. I ordered with Subway, and one of my items was not delivered. After I didn‚Äôt hear back from UberEATS in two hours, I contacted the store, and they said they ran out of oatmeal cookies and I needed to contact UberEATS for a refund. The store should‚Äôve got me and given me another option or cancel the order, but they didn‚Äôt. I contacted UberEATS, and now, 12 days later, they refuse to give me a refund because they said after the investigation, they can‚Äôt confirm I didn‚Äôt receive my order of oatmeal cookies.  Please know I spend around $300.00 a week with UberEATS. I had a drink missing from another order, and they refused to refund me.  UberEATS has to understand when you have a customer who orders a lot, and they likely will have more requests for refunds or complaints about missing items. UberEATS owes me about $159.00 in five months on missing items; they refund to give me credit or refund back to my credit cards‚ÄîUberEATS is not customer friendly.

review: ONE STAR IS TOO GOODVery hard to contact when order not received then they close the chat so you can't continue with complaint.We did not receive order or have a call from driver to say he couldn't find usWe apparently aren't eligible for refund.We ended up going up to the actual store to buy the food.I can provide call logs to prove we never received call from driver and receipt to show we purchased food again.This is not on we are a small business and it was training day so we arranged food for our delegatesThis has also happened to a delivery to my home that never arrived, driver said left with concierge !!!  I only live in a little house .  On this occasion we did get a refund.Will never use Ubereats again or recommend them

review: I would give it negative stars if I could not once but twice they took my child‚Äôs money and refused to refund it and he never received his orders. They rather argue instead of take responsibility and just steal from people. He me er received his orders and lost 41 bucks the drivers kept reassigning it after sitting at the establishment for 5 minutes and my son is punished with no order and no refund because after 4 reassignments he cancelled the order. They literally stole from him and refuse to give back his money and state it‚Äôs out policy. Still waiting on a call back because they refuse to transfer me to a supervisor

review: It seems like our drivers help themselves to portions of our orders when they're unsealed. Uber really should require sealing packages to be able to use their app, as a restaurant. I am swearing off the app and will just drive and grab stuff from now on. Sorry Uber Eats but ya‚Äôll are too unregulated for my comfort

review: So I ordered some shopping,  kept eye on delivery.  Took a while but said delivery driver was on his way.  Then next thing it's come up cancelled you haven't been charged ,we will try not do this again.  No better explanation or an easier way to make a complaint.  Found a way onto chat to speak only to be told you will get a refund can take upto 2 days . We appreciate your feedback. I stated how do I reorder my shopping now as that is all I had in bank as you don't accept cash . To be told reorder again and he ended the chat .tried signing back in but chat somehow not working . So so rude and absolute shocking service.  Not the 1st time I have had a problem with uber eats . If I was you I would delete the app before they mess your order up. Reviews awful, disgrace uber eats should be ashamed

review: Two orders in just over a week and the first one missed a double McMuffin which they agreed to refund a partial amount much less than the item itself then I order my kids dinner and it‚Äôs collected at 7.35 and delivered cold 8.15 after two calls to the driver and the restaurant only being 5 minutes away apparently according to their customer Service that‚Äôs quite acceptable! Need a resolve or I won‚Äôt be using Uber again in future!

review: What I find really awful about Uber Eats is that when they don‚Äôt have a driver your food is left just sitting on a counter somewhere. It can take a considerable amount of time to source another driver and Uber won‚Äôt let you cancel or give a full refund. They will tell you the food is kept in insulated bags. It isn‚Äôt. And anyway, sitting around does nothing for the quality of the food which is unfair on the restaurant who spent time preparing it.What‚Äôs more irritating is that Uber won‚Äôt do anything about it so you end up with a delivery of freezing cold fast food when it‚Äôs minus 3 in January that even the dog won‚Äôt touch. Just Eat is way better and I would suggest ordering from them if you like hot food.

review: I placed a order it went through then nothing shows up the other is not even coming up on my account new to this way of ordering only done it twice before the app is so god dam stupid you cart get no help from them at all will not be using this anymore and think I'll go back to local taxis as well

review: These people are robbing you! I order desserts from dessert junkie they have put between ¬£2-¬£3 extra on each item. Always check the website before ordering I would of saved ¬£13 on 5 items.

review: Awfull ! Just deleted the app immediately. Ordered a Mc Donnalds, after waiting for ages received phone call that there was an issue with processing the order. review: Uber Eats are serious con artists. If you find you‚Äôve complained once before, they will never accept a second complaint, regardless of the reason. review: terrible service. would give 0 stars if an option. you order food then they don't have anyone to deliver it. delivery keeps getting reassigned again and again. in meantime food gets colder and colder and older and older. online chat reps keep abrutly cutting you off whilst you are in the midst of trying to resolve.

review: Cold food constantly - they delay the estimated arrival time whilst assigning driver - meanwhile your food is prepared and sitting getting cold in the corner of a restaurant.  ‚ÄúIt was delivered in the estimated time therefore no refund given‚Äù It‚Äôs food delivery not rocket science
name: SW

review: I was given a 50 gift cert. for uber eats. I remember why I use doordash. I ordered a breakfast order for my self and my 6 year old I was babysitting. The total came to 38 and some change . I struggled with the app as it required me to apply a verification before the order could be sent out. The driver sent message no hot chocolate . I advised milk. the order arrived late and cold as well as missing the entire kids wonka pancakes meal. I was notified I was to get a credit for being late. I then sent in I was missing the meal. After I wrote a bad review my bill was then updates to a higher amount. Not only did they take the entire 50 gift card balance. Ubereats charged my debit card 14 something as well as the tip . for grand total of 71 and some change. Not only did they not credit me for late cold food. they over charged me . after numerous frustrating messages back and forth. customer service is useless. they credited my credit card for the 11 and change for the meal.  I am still over charged over 30 for this entire mess. and no budging from customer service to see they over charged me in the first place. Needless to say  at the end this $38 IHOP breakfast missing a meal still cost me  the 50 gift card the 6.49 tip and 3.66 still on my debit from the 11.24 credit for missing meal. no credit for the 10 they stated would be for late meal.  btw I began this order at 930a  I got the meal around 1245pm never again....sticking to doordash ans slice and grubhubAfter housr before the deliver finally arrived

review: Used Uber eats for the first time today. Had given specific directions as we're slightly off the main road. Could see rider was 1 minute away so waited outside. Driver didn't arrive, i could see from the map that she'd gone straight past so tried ringing her no answer so sent message telling her to turn around and reiterated directions she replied ok so I waited and waited no delivery. Then suddenly it said delivered but god knows where. I decided to walk in the freezing cold to see if it was outside a neighbours house but nothing and no driver to be seen. Tried ringing several more times and no answer at all. Safe to say I will never order from Uber eats again. I did complain and I they have said I wil be refunded but awful service. Will stick with Deliveroo

review: Awful company, every order gets messed up, half the orders always missing and they offer no support and refuse refunds, they are the biggest scammers out there, scumbags

review: Ordered from Greggs and the order was cancelled multiple times and each time they still took my money! There‚Äôs no clear number to call, no clear help section to contact for the situation. And there was no message sent to me to tell me the order had been cancelled.

review: What can I say, Ordered a mcdonalds round 2.45 and it's now just past 3.45, 5 drivers accepted the order then cancelled it. Maybe driver 6 will actually delivery it ( they didn't so had to edit this, hopefully driver 7? not holding my breath). Food by this point i can imagine being stone cold, contacted uber eats chat and basically told to wait. Probably cancelled so many times due to the fact they see I've left no tip so cant be bothered, I only leave tips with quick and good service after delivery as it should be. I won't be ordering with them again.

review: I made an order to  Japanese restaurants. After I waited for 40 mins, the delivery man came with papoyes chicken. I showed my order from my app to this man and he showed his phone and we clearly saw and agreed it was his fault. Somehow he picked the other customer's order from wrong place. He made some phone call to manager or whoever in his language which I couldn't understand and at the end told me he should leave to the right customer. I kept asking then where is my order? He said  deal with the customer service. While I was talking to this man, my wife tried to explain this dumb chat customer service and the staff said until the delivery status confirmed as complete, there is nothing they can do. After I sent the delivery man as he wanted to delivery it to right place, I contacted the customer service again by chat. Explained the situation, but it kept saying WAIT until they investigate. I waited and as the delivery man changed the delivery status to 'complete' as he deliver it to the papoyes customer, the chat staff said he can't do anything. What a joke. And this chat staff said he transferred the conversation to the right team. And I got a message immediately and said they give me refund partial which is ¬£30 and will investigate. I paid over ¬£50 though. So now, no food delivered, I only suffered with coldness outside as I had to wait until this delivery man finishing his talking to the manager, my wife got angry as she had to leave with out food for her big and long working day, and only got a half of refund. What is this company doing? Is this scam? I know many cases do not have this problem, but I believe this small issues should be dealt with quick and sensible solution. I don't understand what they are doing!!!! They even don't have a contact number!!

review: I placed an order for home delivery at a local eatery in Massachusetts yesterday evening, and spoke to Uber Eats customer service twice because the order was not delivered in the promised time. They said they would compensate me with 50% of the order value (approximately $30 odd) because of late delivery. This morning I contacted them to ask how I could access the Uber Cash. And they said since the Uber Cash was in INR, they can't do anything to help me!

review: I waited 1.5 hours for my order, tried to contact the driver multiple times as he was standing still, he read messages and ignored. Uber Eats then cancelled my order and charged me fully for it. I reordered so was charged twice with no food received until about 3 hours later. Uber Eats makes it impossible to report issues and claim refunds as they don‚Äôt offer a phone number. I finally got in touch with their team via email through their website and they offered no help. They kept claiming I cancelled the order myself which is why they could not refund me even though I sent screenshot PROOF of the app saying Uber Eats cancelled my order. I had to send the screenshot multiple times and they still ignored the facts, so that they could take my money even though they had not delivered. A company cannot charge a customer for goods/services not delivered when it‚Äôs no fault of the customer. At one point they said they charged me for the restaurant and drivers time, when THEY had cancelled the order?! If anyone should be charged for anyone‚Äôs time Uber Eats should be charged for wasting mine and for taking my money and delivering nothing. I have still not been refunded and they have stopped responding so that they don‚Äôt have to refund me, so reporting this here. I have seen online that this has been an issue for many and is completely unacceptable. I will keep reporting about this, urging everyone everywhere not to use Uber Eats as they may simply lose their money and get nothing in return, and attempt to claim back the money from Uber Eats through my bank instead. I have never ever heard of a company fully charging customers when no goods/services are delivered and the fault is 100% their own. Incredible.
name: CL

review: EXTORTION. Driver didn‚Äôt bring my order for over an hour and only after I called him he said he would bring it later. After another hour he demanded more money for the delivery. He kept sending me messages like ‚ÄúMoney !!!‚Äù or ‚ÄúCash now nor nothing‚Äù. I felt threatened by his messages. After complaint, Uber customer support will refund the items in ‚Äú3-10 Business days‚Äù and no further help was provided (+3 hours after order). They refused to cancel my Uber One subscription, since I dont want to experience encounters with extorting delivery people anymore. DO NOT get Uber One!!!!

review: AWFUL service and customer service. Missing item reported with cost of nearly ¬£8, it was the main item. Called them to complain and was offered a refund to the amount of ¬£2. When I queried this, I was told that as I'd ordered the item as part of a meal deal cost ¬£10, they could only refund ¬£2 as 1 out of 3 items were missing. When I queried this again I was told it was their's, and the restaurants policy to do this. When I again queried why it was ¬£2 and not the ¬£8 minus the discount (¬£2.51 so refund of ¬£5.49), she said they divide it by 3 as its a 3 item meal. This again made no sense as ¬£10√∑3 does not equal ¬£2! I asked for an email or number to call to complain further up and was told there wasn't one. Rude and illogical service. I then called the restaurant, who said this was not their policy and sorted me out with a replacement at a later date.
name: Kay rowe

review: i am utterly disgusted at the way my order was delivered and the customer service that i was given after trying to sort out this issue. when the food was delivered the bag was soaked with coke and was leaking into my hallway and on my mat inside, this bag was just left there and delivery driver was no where to be seen. the coke had soaked its way through into all of our food making in inedible. we later called customer service to sort it out where we had a person who was zero help at all and only said we could get a partial refund for the food that we could not eat. i am honestly so disappointed with this service and i hope that they buck up their ideas and sort problems like these out properly. thanks to them me and my family have no dinner

review: got charge for the cancel order just a rip off would never use this again!

After asking for a refund they are telling me they don't understand and I can't have a refund. This app-design and customer service shows pure incompetence.

review: I can‚Äôt believe that to order my ¬£6.99 meal from McDonalds uber eats wants to charge me. ¬£.99p small order fee¬£0.99 service ¬£2.79 delivery. No thanks uber eats keep the food.

review: Rip of merchants honest to god con artists .. convienently always make recent receipts dissapear.. cancel orders randomly .. if you camcel an order less than 5 mins later they take 5 wuid off you to give the driver .. crooks and another c word keeps popping in to my head. Dont do it ..

By the time I get it, it‚Äôs cold. I like to cook food at home with some orders, but I can‚Äôt cook anything as I don‚Äôt know when my food will arrive. In some cases it‚Äôs turning up a whole 30 minutes whilst it is still waiting to be collected. It‚Äôs outrageous, priority delivery isn‚Äôt a real thing. The drivers do what they want.

review: I ordered a vegan burger using Uber eats and was sent the wrong item. Overall very satisfied with how they handled the situation, they provide great services as well as very friendly customer services. I will be using again.

review: Disgraceful Company, signed up last year but haven‚Äôt used them yet.  Got sent a discount code for ¬£10 minimum spend of ¬£15 as a new customer.  So I got my order up to ¬£17.20 excluding delivery like it said, then it said I could also have a free trial of Uber One for a month which would half the service charge and mean no delivery fee. After an hour of trying, just continued to pop up with the same message, tried to contact someone, however no phone number, email or live chat to be found anywhere on website just FAQs that don‚Äôt help at all, but not only that, they charged me for my free trial of Uber One, so no food and no help. Disgraceful Company
name: SW

review: Steals customers money! AVOID!!!I placed an order to be delivered by uber eats. And can I say Absolutely what disgusting customer service from that company I ordered food for me and my son it came missing my son's burger and milkshake so only got the chips the meal cost ¬£9.49 and they refunded me ¬£5.69 I've rang up twice now and this apparently is the correct amount for the steak stack and large milkshake so I paid ¬£3.80 for a portion of cold chips! I've spent 30 min on the phone. I've spoken to two customer service staff then asked to speak with a manager and got absolutely no satisfaction out of them all. My order has gone in the bin as it was all cold when it arrived because the courier sat at the restaurant with my order waiting for another two orders. (I watched this on the app as I got notification she had picked it up and was still sitting in the restaurant for 10 min) She Dropped one off on the way and gave me the other order by mistake and came back to swap it. And Uber eats don't care that my whole order costing me ¬£20 half wasn't delivered and half went in the bin!!I swear I will never order from Uber again!!! VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE.

review: Uber drivers are routinely stealing items from customer orders. review: I have made an order through Uber eats. The order arrived almost two hours late, the food wasn‚Äôt what I ordered, it was dry cold, burned uneatable. The 6th person that I spoke to it was a manager that didn‚Äôt know how to guide me through the app so I had to find a way to manage that myself, after all of that I received and email from them saying that the case has been closed and their can‚Äôt do anything. I find it disgusting in how their treat their customers creating me loads of stress and  in the end their don‚Äôt return the money that I paid for as their haven‚Äôt provided the service in the first place.

review: Recently I had two situations I personally think in 21century shouldn't have happened.I orderded KFC, half of the order was missing and I still didn't get the money for it. The SECOND PART CAME IN WET PAPER BAG as it was raining. UBER doesn't even provide drivers with any wet-resistance bag. 21 CENTURY. They don't answer the calls and don't reply to text messages. It happens regularly to everyone as I spoke to people waiting for a cab. The worst thing is that UBER as a company doesn't give a s**t about this and since we can not even report this scammers I would say they even support that kind of behaviour... their customer service doesn't exist. The worst company ever.

review: This is the worst delivery company in Bedford.  DO NOT USE.  Ordered mcDonald‚Äôs to be delivered.  Asked them to hand it to me at the door as I am disabled.  Waited and waited and waited. Don‚Äôt know how long it had been left on the step.  Hot chocolate totally cold so it had been a long time.  Hash browns conjealed and stuck to paper.  Contacted McDonalds to complain they said not there problem even though they employed them but once the food leaves there store it is Ubers responsibility,  uber customer services do not give a damn .  Second rate company with a third rate service and that is being generous. You will get NO REFUND as they are incapable of taking any responsibility.  Meal ended up in bin  with rubbish.

review: If I could give zero stars I would. Disgusting! They charged me but I did not receive my order. Ripped off. Do not trust or spend your money with them they are a fraudulent company.

review: The worst company in existence. You‚Äôd think a company the size of Uber would allow you to cancel orders, no. Even when they take 90 minutes to arrive. review: Order from the Mcdonals app, states delivered. Driver has not been to the address. When he phoned I couldn't answer the call. Went outside not there. States delivered. Uber won't refund. Having to do a chargeback. Awful service

review: They allow you to put the first part of you post code and not the post code in full, and order it like that without street address and number. He arrived somewhere in my post code wherever they placed the destination (it was only the first few letters of my post code so idk how they managed that), and he replied "im here". Then replied that he just saw my message and wouldn't of delivered it anyway as it was my mistake (even though the drive distance would have been the same), and the help tool said otherwise. Anyway a waste of money and time its overpriced anyway.

review: They employ people who use a ther people‚Äôs accounts it‚Äôs very unsafe and they will attempt to rob you if they get the chance they will eye up your cars and things in house be careful

review: Joke of a company. Ordered food, driver didnt pick up for 30 minutes before the order went to abother driver. review: USE AT YOUR PERIL!!! By some distance, the worst company I have ever experienced. review: Ordered a KFC though uber eats. Order a bargain bucket and gravy. It arrived in good time. review: Twice my food arrived Cold ! THIRD TIME IT DIDN'T ARRIVE...

review: I order from Uber eats A LOT. I don‚Äôt usually have an issue however whenever I do have an issue I don‚Äôt feel like it‚Äôs ever actually being resolved. Let‚Äôs say an items missing, they will refund that missing item only. In most cases this is part of someone‚Äôs meal and now someone has less than ordered it ruins the whole meal at times and if I‚Äôm just getting an item refunded then why the hell would I order in the first place. If I didn‚Äôt want it I would order it. So being like oh sorry here‚Äôs 2 quid back is completely useless because the whole convenience of ordering is he sole reason. Not to then get only what I paid for and wait for refund of said item then have to go through the gruelling process of having to go on the app an and complain to get the refund when I should be eating. It‚Äôs completely infuriating.I had a driver have a McDonald‚Äôs drink spill all over the paper bag. He hands it to me. I have a carpet in my hallway and had to scrub it after. I told him I didn‚Äôt want a bag of liquid which is now all over my carpet and he leaves spilling in from my door to the exit of my apartment block. Uber refunded less than the price of the drink I had to complain for about 4 hours back and foward through emails at this point what is the point.I pay for the app too, but enoughs enough. I‚Äôve spent literal thousands but im cancelling. Im tired of paying for stuff I don‚Äôt get. If I want half a meal I would order half a meal not spend money get half and spend another 10 mins organising a refund

review: UberEats itself is a wonderful concept and great app, but their customer service is seriously lacking. I have placed several orders where several items have been missing, and when I call Uber Eats to report the missing food, the only response I have gotten was that I would be refunded for the items. That's great and all, but what do I do with the people who have nothing to eat because they didn't receive their order??? Why is it not in the policy to contact the restaurant and ask them to deliver the missing food items??? Last night my family and I ordered over $100 worth of food for dinner. After an hour, my son was literally crying because he was hungry. The time for delivery kept extending later and later. I received a phone call from the restaurant itself. Apparently the driver picked up the wrong food. He said he would be contacting Uber and they would contact me. Another 10-15 minutes went by before I finally heard from Uber. The woman who called me from Uber spoke barely any English and was extremely difficult to understand. She informed me that my order had been canceled, I would be refunded, and if I wanted, I could go back to the app and place another order. I was confused by this. S instead of just figuring out the mix-up with the driver and getting me the correct food, I had to place another order and wait ANOTHER hour?!?!?! As I was asking the woman to clarify why that needed to be done, she literally began to talk over me, as if I was not even speaking. Then she tried to dismiss me and end the call and I asked her to wait because I still had questions. She again ignored me and spoke over me and then hung up on me! Let me make this clear: SHE HUNG UP ON A CUSTOMER WHO WAS ASKING FOR HELP IN CLARIFYING THE SITUATION!!! As someone who has worked in customer service for over 15 years, I found this absolutely unacceptable. When a situation like this mix-up happens, which I was completely understanding of and not at all irate, a customer service representative should have been kind and apologetic, offering solutions and listening to any questions I might have, NOT talk over me, ignore me, and then hang up on me.To make matters worse, I called Uber Customer Service to complain about this rude representative, and the woman I spoke to at that time was very kind and helpful, and she apologized for the other representative, and told me that a supervisor would be calling me later on in the evening. I asked her if they would be calling me that same night and she said yes. Well, here it is, the next day, and my phone has yet to ring. So Uber Eats itself is great. But their customer service is seriously lacking!!!
name: Gracie Facie

review: Boycott this horrible app They ripp people off massively .I placed an order last night only one of 7 items where delivered and they only refunded me ¬£4 considering it came to ¬£35 !!!!!! What a joke

review: they don't care about the customers, I made an order and the chips were very oily and hard and I also found burnt chips...I think they were for a month, in the used oil...I sent pictures and asked 4 times to a refund was made, but they did not want it and only said that they were sorry and that they would take measures against the restaurant!

review: I am writing to express my extreme dissatisfaction with the service I received from Uber Eats, specifically regarding an order I placed with Soi Thai in Clapham. Unfortunately, my experience has been nothing short of appalling.After purchasing a meal through Uber Eats from Soi Thai, I suffered from a severe case of food poisoning. Distressed by this, I promptly contacted Uber Eats seeking assistance and resolution to this health hazard. To my dismay, the response I received was both unhelpful and dismissive.The lack of concern and assistance displayed by Uber Eats in handling such a critical issue is utterly unacceptable. As a customer, I expected a responsible and prompt resolution to ensure the safety of all patrons. The refusal to address my concerns is indicative of a poor commitment to customer welfare and highlights the inadequacy of Uber Eats in managing food quality issues.Considering the severity of the matter, I feel compelled to report this incident to the relevant health and safety authorities. It is disheartening that such a trusted platform as Uber Eats fails to take responsibility for the potential health risks posed by its affiliated restaurants.I strongly urge Uber Eats to reevaluate its customer service protocols and prioritize the health and safety of its patrons. Neglecting such issues not only tarnishes the reputation of your service but also poses serious risks to the well-being of your customers.This experience has left me deeply dissatisfied and concerned about the standards upheld by Uber Eats. I hope that steps will be taken to rectify these issues promptly.
name: Wioleta

review: I am a longtime customer. I have been ordering takeaways and groceries from them for years. Today is my last day as a customer. After my experience this evening, I would rather walk through snow barefoot to pick up my food, because that would feel more pleasant than dealing with Ubereat‚Äôs robot customer service.My order never arrived, I have evidence on my door camera and concierge downstairs, no sighting of a delivery driver.The delivery driver never contacted me and left the food out at a random building (with a blurry photo of the food next to a concrete wall‚Ä¶who knows where).I never got any notifications from the driver regarding issues in finding my apartmentI had even ordered another item earlier in the day (and many times of the past few years) with no issues. I have never had a driver not be able to locate my current apartment. I make the instructions clear, keep my phone near me and always have my notifications on.Ubereats sided with the driver, despite no evidence of them delivering the food to me or contacting me. And I got charged for the food‚Ä¶unbelievable!This is apparently common practice as some ubereats drivers just can‚Äôt be bothered, wait outside a random location and claim to have tried to contact you and just take a photo of it next to a random wall (and it‚Äôs nowhere near where you actually live). And UberEats will side with the driver because they wait the amount of time needed for whatever aweful policy they have to charge the customer.Go with Deliveroo - this never happens with them.Ubereats used to be a great business - it‚Äôs a shame their automated customer service and policies don‚Äôt side with customers. It seems silly as there are so many other great providers and competition on the market.

review: Awful service,  unfortunately I cannot leave my home very often so getting in a few staple essentials from my local supermarket is a must, it seems almost everytime there has been an issue with 1 or more item ie short dated or broke open none of which are my fault and now the last two issues I‚Äôve been told it‚Äôs basically too suss so they won‚Äôt refund me or even take the product back I can‚Äôt use absolutely shocking service am deleting account won‚Äôt be using again I‚Äôll stick to Deliveroo!

review: I had placed an order from UberEats and gave instructions for the delivery driver to come to the front of my building as many will, for whatever reason, go to the back.  My driver sent me a text saying he was here and I told him I was at the front, even mentioning that there were instructions for him to go there.  Instead of driving to the front of the building, he walked my food - in the middle of cold (-8 C) weather - to the front.  Because my building is large, my order was cold and inedible.  I contacted customer service via the app 4 times and all 4 times was disconnected without resolution.  I had requested a refund or a credit in the amount of my order, but they refused; stating it was against their policy to do so.  The last agent I was chatting with at least offered to have a supervisor call me back.The supervisor, Angel, did call me at 1 in the morning.  He kept cutting me off when I tried to explain the issue and then proceeded to get upset because I raised my voice.  I told him I had been in customer service for years and have offered full credit whenever an issue arose, which was rare. I will admit, I did curse at him, but this was after him not understanding the situation that they technically stole money from me as I was unable to have my meal.  SHAME ON UBEREATS AND THEIR POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE!

review: I have complained several times to these about the food I had ordered. Stressed to them that it was NOT the restaurants fault but it was their fault as the food was cold.  The reason behind this was that the first driver who agreed to pick it up, cancelled and then had a driver from the other side of the city pick it up. But because they supposedly resolved the issue when they clearly didn't, and will only go by the latest complaint, they will not refund. Disgusting customer service

review: Didn't use Uber service for a while. Recently I received an email from UberEats with GB50JAN code-  "50% off your next 5 orders". Driver arrived late, food was cold and flattened. I cancelled the order but did not get refund - almost 40 quid wasted. Never again.

review: If I could leave no stars I would. Tonight‚Äôs issue, I ordered a McDonald‚Äôs through Ubereats for ¬£37, on arrival the steakhouse stack burger was misssing I contacted McDonald‚Äôs who were very apologetic and confirmed the burger was still in store but I‚Äôd have to contact Uber for my refund so that I did, they then proceeded to email me confirming my chat was closed and they had refunded me ¬£1.85. I don‚Äôt leave reviews often but there‚Äôs always an issue when using them, I pay for Uber one monthly and one of the promises is if an order is delivered after the latest estimated time your account willl be credited with ¬£5 this has happened on 2 occasions and I have never received the ¬£5. review: Placed an order from a Burger Chain through Uber Eats selected everything and the modifications to the item correctly.Order turns up and the burger has cheese even though I‚Äôd specifically selected the no cheese option.Raised an issue with Uber for this and they just sent a generic response basically saying because the No Cheese modification doesn‚Äôt have a price attached they can‚Äôt do anything‚Ä¶So I told them to use try and use a bit of common sense and check the actual parent item that modification was part of. Same copy and paste response so once again re-opened the ticket to say is anyone actually taking 5minutes to atleast try and actually investigate this?They then changed their tune to ‚Äúwe can‚Äôt guarantee a restaurant will be able to fulfil a special request in line with our policy we won‚Äôt be offering a refund‚Äù. Once again it wasn‚Äôt a special request at the end the no cheese was literally one of the options available so surely they should be able to accommodate that‚Ä¶I basically told them if they aren‚Äôt willing to refund the burger I‚Äôll be raising a dispute with my bank for the entire order so their choice and wasn‚Äôt given any response.Even called the restaurant and credit to the manager there he was very apologetic but said he probably has even less chance of speaking to someone useful at Uber than I do and the way Ubers system works if a option doesn‚Äôt have a price attached it doesn‚Äôt come through to the restaurant and they get a lot of complaints from Uber orders for this same situation.Credit to them I did get an email through the night it has been sent to an escalation team and they issued a full refund but it shouldn‚Äôt have got to that point and it would‚Äôve been nice to have been told that‚Äôs what‚Äôs going to happen rather than just being ignored until then and I feel had I not threatened to start a dispute it wouldn‚Äôt have happened.Shame that companies outsource to save money because they just don‚Äôt care about customer experience‚Ä¶

review: Their driver stole my food and uber refused to replace them and said I'd have to wait 15 days for a refund

review: When food is received cold in a restaurant would you gladly sit there & eat it? No, so why do UberEats believe it‚Äôs acceptable to send someone on a bike with 3 drop offs with food in the middle of winter & expect food to be warm when it reaches on the final drop off.Then refuse to take any accountability when this is questioned? Instead they send several automated bot responses. Safe to say I immediately deleted my Uber accounts after this experience, which is not the first time.They say that they take matters like this seriously, but this has happened so many times with the same restaurant that they can‚Äôt review it. The way they handle their customer service needs to be way better before I return my custom to them!

review: Worst experience ever! Order some food, the food was delivered to wrong address photo to proof it was wrong location! review: SCAMMERS!!!Don‚Äôt use their grocery shopping services! The shoppers will buy expired items (with discount stickers) and still charge you the full price! review: Absolutely appalled by the response from Ubereats regarding my Iceland order missing more than 50% of the items ordered.Uber are refusing to refund me as I have had previous issues with orders and had other refunds for missing items. Whilst I understand there are some people who may have scammed Uber this is incredibly unfair to just assume I have done the same!I have tried everything I can to get the items delivered to me - I even called the store who told me 2 of the 4 bags were never collected and Uber have now cancelled the transaction with Iceland.Due to the current climate fund's are low for everyone and I used the last of my money to buy food for my children, one of whom is diabetic and needs to eat meals regularly. Between my husband and myself we simply haven't had the time to physically go to the shop and relied on this service, now I have no available funds to buy more food and have had to borrow money from my neighbour just to be able to eat dinner this evening all thanks to Uber!!! who have showed no remorse for their error and are simply refusing to resolve the issue and accuse me of scamming you!!!!A simple call to the store would have resolved this, but despite messaging numerous times through social media, we have been left with no option but to dispute this transaction with our bank who have said they will refund the entire order not just missing items, which is all I am asking for.Uber you are a disgrace you claim You're there for the convenience but if you cannot accept responsibility for you/ your driver's error then what use are you?I have had issues with other delivery companies in the past and never been treated in such a poor manner!
name: Karen Leverett

review: This company is the biggest set of delinquents in a few decades.they employ  delinquent drivers that either sit outside to waste time or they decide not to deliver which  delays your food by multiple hours! Uber = cheap , low quality standards, low quality drivers. Don't do what I did, returned after a few month's thinking surely a company carnt continue to decline, Trust me , they can.2.3 hours waiting for food 2x different drivers  decided they couldn't be bothered driving.The food came flat cold and as I am allergic to Gurkins I specially said no gurkins,  guess what , it had loads in so the food went into bin. support are as delinquent as the drivers , they give you textbook answers that they have on  Windows' note pad to copy and paste into answers. they are incapable of independent thinking.One can only hope company has a new director that has better control and standards. however I would expect that in next 5 yearsdo not ruin your night by picking this company,  ignore there offeres, pay the extra go to Just Eat
name: KR

review: My order was taking too long and when I went on the customer service the man was really rude and not understanding If this happens again I will be writing to my local mp
name: Rkizzy SINGH

review: Placed order through my mcdonald's app at 1010 this morning and was told it would be here by 1040. At 1030 I received a phone call from the courier who said they couldn't find my address and was on a street that was nowhere nearby. I informed him that I wasn't sure where i was going as I'm new to the area and could he bare with me while I found exactly where he was. His response was rude to say the least and said I've got other deliveries to make and was refusing to wait. Rather than cancelling my order he put it down as delivered so I was extremely annoyed by this. I phoned uber eats themselves and told them the situation hoping to get this resolved and maybe get a refund. I was greeted by a woman who was extremely unhelpful and rude to say the least. She then went onto say "the driver had followed guidelines" therefore was our own fault and wouldn't be able to get refund. Certainly won't be ordering from these again and would urge others to approach with caution when ordering after moving to new area!!!
name: DP

review: This is the 2nd time I have had missing items and when I phone them they tell me "We cannot refund your missing items because the system won't let me." Then, when I ask for a complaints address they refuse to give it. Do not use or order from any place that User UberEats as it's courier. By any other definition this company would be known as a Scam.

review: Cold food no help from Uber eats at all as usual whatever the the problem they fob you off .. drivers are dropping off other orders on the way to you when we pay delivery and service charges to end up with cold food.. I find myself using food apps as a last resort now the service is so poor .. and finding my address is another story‚Ä¶

review: I had to give 1 star because it doesn't allow none but my driver collected the order from the restaurant it took an hour to arrive,it was all stone cold,I called uber and they would t help me they were very rude and ended the call without a refund or replacement food,they said it was delivered in a reasonable amount of time which to me is not an hour,the service I had is absolutely disgusting I will not be using this service again

review: I am a one-year member of uber one. Uber One says if you're an Uber One member you don't have to pay these fees, but I was charged a fee. I have contacted customer service several times and requested that these fees be refunded. I've been asking the custumer service for an answer for several times and days. Just nothing. Therefore, I canceled my membership and do not recommend this fraudulent Uber One to anyone.

review: Uber Eats are a disgrace. Unreliable, slow or don't turn up at all.  Our Honest Burgers Chiswick order never arrived on 4th Jan 2024 and Uber Eats make it impossible to find out what has happened. I have deleted all my Uber accounts. The company is a faceless, unaccountable multinational. Do not order food via Uber Eats because you will never get it.

review: If I could give 0 stars I would!I ordered a delivery from Seafresh in Twickenham yesterday evening. It never arrived. When  I went into the website to complain, the response was that the driver had tried to call me, had waited for 7 mins and a photo was sent of the parcel, left on a random street. I sent a screen grab of my phone record showing that I was not called and pictures of my front door and path which bore no resemblance to where the driver left the food. I am coming up against a brick wall and have lost ¬£16.74. As a pensioner I feel truly aggrieved at having my money taken to cover their incompetence and this compounded by false claims and bot responses.

review: I ordered something last night from asda the whole order I received was incorrect ive tried to explain this to a uber agent via messages but I'm sorry its like trying to get through too a child so I've gave up also they can stick the uber one it's just not worth the hassle I will go too asda my self in future üò°üò°

review: 9 months ago I paid for a treat to my granddaughter on my daughters ubereats account, since then there has been an attempted fraud on my card, so I have a new card. in November she was charged 4 times for a takeaway, fortunately she had gone through paypal so got the refund for the error, my old card was saved on her uber account, although she had said don't save, so now my bank account been charged for the same transaction on Christmas eve. I call that fraud.

review: If I could give no stars I would. My 34 dollar steak was waaaaaay overcooked and the pasta was dry and had next to no sauce. Completely inedible. I guess this is how you weed out the good delivery places from the bad but man does their customer service suck.

review: Thieves, they steal your money and don‚Äôt have good customer service to solve any problems. Do not trust them.

review: Uber eats double charged my mum for practically ¬£80 when that wasn't the price that was meant to be charged and half the order was missing, tried talking to the delivery person about it and all they did was walk off uber eats is awful now, really went downhill idk what changed but I don't recommend them.

review: Order time kept on increasing. I contacted restaurant who said food has been ready for a long time and they're waiting for a driver. review: They say free shipping and $15 off order but they charge extra when you try to use promo they scam people into paying them what a ridiculous company

review: I have been you using the Uber eats now for quite a sometime even I do have Uber one currently. The recent order was totally disaster. Before I order I put in the instructions section clearly where my flat located, however, the rider still couldn‚Äôt find the flat anyway I explained to him on the phone for 8 minutes he still couldn‚Äôt manage the find the flat then after 7 minutes talking on the phone he said come get your f*king food from near the where he was, and I said to him McDonald is only 4 minutes walk from my flat but due to rain and late hour I couldn‚Äôt leave the house because I was babysitting my little daughter anyway that was the main reason I ordered from the app otherwise I would walk and buy it myself.Anyway, end of the phone conversation he said come and get @f*king order I‚Äôm gonna take it back then he hang up the phone and cancelled the order. I contact with the Uber eats through them app and they are other joke side of the story, they told me driver tried to contact you make sure update your phone number and keep the phone near you. I sent them a screenshot of 8 minutes talk on the phone the live agent ridiculously said same thing. I‚Äôm not even too sure if they are reading the messages properly. I didn't get the food and I charged ¬£18.50. I dont mind about the money but the way they treat them customers is not acceptable. It was my last order from them from now on I make sure my family will not use them app. Please also give a little instructions to your driver, if they can‚Äôt manage the find the property they don‚Äôt need to swear on the phone to the customer. In addition, I do pay for the food to deliver to me my front door, which is what I selected on the app ‚Äúmeet at my front door‚Äù I didn‚Äôt choose a option meet me somewhere in the town.

review: Food delivered when promised. Courteous driver.

review: Cowboys, said they had arrived,  called me but didn't get to phone in time,  was happy for them to bring food back. But nothing. Also wouldn't refund my money,  so no food no money.  What an absolute joke. Deleted app. Will not use again

review: Quick delivery and very conviently especially when one just came out of hospital and have no one to go and buy food for you. I am very happy with the service. Thank you.

review: UberEats sent me someone else‚Äôs food order and then refused to refund my order because it goes against their ‚Äòstandard‚Äô, even though I presented them with proof. I am a vegetarian and they brought food containing meat that I could have become very ill from consuming. Their customer service is AI generated and just sends the same templated answers over and over again. They stole nearly $100 from me. From doing some research it sounds like this regularly happens to their customers. I will NEVER use this service again!Edit: After reaching out to their customer service for days and days (being hung up on and treated like trash) I did eventually get a refund, but I had to call them 3x and reach out 15+ times over the app. I will still never use their service again.

review: My last order of groceries were a mess. The last one today the delivery guy left everything on the flor. review: Disgusting customer service, they cancelled my order but still got charged tried many times to contact them got nothing. Finally got through only to be hanged up. Will never oder on uber eats again

review: Received wrong order so reached out to someone who ‚Äú couldn't deal with it ‚Äú so passed on to someone else never hurd nothing back so had to re contact them for them to basically send me what looks like a automated message saying in not entitled to any kind of refund.
name: KA

review: I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my extreme dissatisfaction with a recent experience I had with your service. On 04/01/24 at approximately 5:30pm , I placed an order through the Uber Eats app for delivery to my address.To my dismay, the food never arrived, despite the estimated delivery time having passed. I waited patiently, but there was no sign of the delivery driver. Strangely, the app indicated that my order had been successfully delivered, which is far from the truth. This has left me both frustrated and inconvenienced.What adds to my dismay is that I was charged for the undelivered order. I find it utterly unacceptable to be charged for a service that was not rendered as expected. I demand an immediate investigation into this matter and a prompt resolution. I request a refund for the full amount charged for my order.I understand that unforeseen circumstances may occur, but communication is key. A simple notification or explanation for the delay or non-delivery would have been appreciated.I urge you to take swift action in rectifying this issue to restore my trust in Uber Eats. Please respond promptly with the steps you will be taking to address this matter and process the refund.Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to a timely resolution.

review: My food delivery was nearly left again with thieving scum in other part of flats. If the delivery driver can't understand what number they should deliver to they shouldn't be in job

review: Scammers- no food no money, wish you bankruptcy.

review: 0rdered kfc through app but was delivered stone cold by uber eats, i emailed kfc care only for them to pass buck and give me a number to contact uber eats, i could hardly understand the call handler due to very poor and broken english with strong indian accent so gave up and tried again next day to be told 14 hours have passed so cant help!

review: I will be writing to complain.  I tried to order a meal from a restaurant to be told at the end that the order could not be accepted on Uber.  We ordered directly from the restaurant.  Shortly after the restaurant called us to say they had received an identical order from Uber and they called us as it was clearly a duplicate - they cancelled this order.  Uber then sent me an email saying that the order had been cancelled however the restaurant had started preparing the food  - so they were charging me the full amount plus delivery.  I had not paid for the cancelled order - but they decided to use the card details held for my uber taxi account to take the money. Clearly the food was not prepared as the restaurant kindly called us and I assume that Uber Eats pocketed the lot.  Will not be using them again, deceitful people.
name: CW

review: At least 3 out of every 5 orders are awful experiences and the rest are just plain unpleasant. Absolutely non-existent customer services of any kind, VERY long waiting times, having to pay the extra ¬£2.50 to ANY hope of getting warm (not even hot) food and still having a very high chance of cold food, the con of promising ¬£5 goodwill if the order arrives after the latest estimated time just for said time to change every 10 minutes, cancelling orders without any apology or explanation at all, refusing refunds for cold food or damaged food/groceries without any explanation as to why...the list goes on and on.The only reason I didn't delete my account ages ago is because I paid for the annual Uber One membership and I'm determined to get something out of it.

review: Don't use the McDonald's app to order food as they use uber. My food was baged at 10:30 and collected by uber at 10:31. I complain to McDonald's who say it's not thir fault it's unber. Unber then tell me that won't give a refund as it's within thire time frame. I would give both McDonald's and uber no stars but in order to write a review they give themselves 2 stars. I will never use McDonald's or unber again. To add insults not only did I pay for the dilvery I paid a tip. Don't be stung by theses Rip of merchants

review: My daughter ordered McDonald‚Äôs, the driver messaged asking for delivery directions she forwarded the directions, then food was saying delivered but had no food after calling ubereats the lady we spoke with was useless I then asked to speak with a manager and was told the driver was not at fault and even though we did not receive our food we weren‚Äôt entitled to a refund because the driver attempted to find us üò° absolutely disgusting

review: UBER useless, only word for a total mess this company is. There is no help, they don't fix problems raised, the dispatchers still ghost drivers illegally.Thier notifications are over the top. review: I purchased a monthly subscription of Uber one which I do regularly and for some reason they have charged me ¬£59.99 which is the fee for a year.I was going to order something but as soon as I realised how much they charged me I raised a concern with my bank.I am waiting for Uber to refund me my money  They are thieves, I don‚Äôt understand why they would do this. review: Useless! Hour and a half wait for freezing cold food that was thrown in the bin and offered a ¬£2 refund! Never using this company again!

review: Placed an order today 1/3/24 after receiving an email of a promo code stating you'd get $25 off your first 2 orders, so I entered the promo code and placed my order, after canceling the first order for some how not honoring the promo of $25 and some how still charging me the full amount of the order, called support to find out that after receiving the email this morning and after placing my order the promo code has some how been deactivated from this morning til noon, after already reading that the offer would expire 1/25/24, smh. Not too sure on what UberEATS has going on and I can totally understand if by some chance they were hacked and a target of Scam, but why is that you guys are scammers yourself (UberEATs) and ripping off all and what could just possibly be loyal potential customers?

review: I will never order from Uber Eats again!I placed an order for groceries from Asda which went through and payment was immediately taken from my account.Five minutes later, Uber Eats told me that Asda said I called them direct to cancel the order. THIS WAS A LIE!!!!!!Trying to get any help from their VERY UNHELPFUL help centre was like trying to get blood from a stone!!!I had to go on Facebook to publicly share my predicament before they started to take notice. They asked me to share my call history so they could see if I‚Äôd called Asda to cancel my order!! Absolute cheek!!!They eventually refunded me after I stood my ground and accused them of being thieving halfwits!!!Absolutely disgraceful service!!!!

review: I'm very dissatisfied with the service I received from Uber Eats. Its been issue after issue and they never seem to resolve anytjing. Most recently, my food was not delivered. I contacted Uber eats and they told me it was not their issue. That I had call the restaurant. Both Uber Eats and the restaurant tried to blame each other, and I never got my money back. Which I don't understand, because this driver is employed by Uber Eats, so it was their problem. They don't care about their customers, all they care about is the money. And that's very evident with their lack of customer service. Its extremely hard to get in contact with anyone, and when you do the customer service is absolute trash. I will definitely be transitioning over to a different app, never using them again.
name: RM

review: I would give zero if I could.  I have ordered from UberEats several times in the last year but a couple of months ago I placed an order and then realised I had missed out a side dish.  I cancelled the first order, called the restaurant to make them aware of it and placed a second larger order with the same restaurant within minutes. The restaurant was aware of it. I have not been refunded for the first order.  Today I have seen an explanation saying that no refund is due because the restaurant had already started preparing the order.  That is total rubbish as the restaurant is one of my regular local places and I simply increased the order and did not change it.  What a bunch of thieves!  They don't even have a complaints procedure I was told after waiting on the phone for 20 minutes for customer services.  I would highly recommend you don't use them.  JustEats is so much more decent. They have a phone line you can call if something goes wrong and a refunds policy.  I am escalating this to my credit card company and will post this more widely on social media. Hope you are taking note UberEats!

review: Disgusting customer service. Ordered through McDelivery, they couldn‚Äôt find a driver and food arrived almost an hour after being prepared. Nor does it meet food hygiene standards to reheat. Quality issues too AND items missing that we paid for!!!!! But nobody wants to help. Uber eats says it‚Äôs McDonald‚Äôs.  McDonald‚Äôs says its Uber eats. Big lesson to not use again AND spread the word. Trading standards contacted plus my bank.

review: Awful customer service. Doesn't listen or value their customers whatsoever. Have used Ubereats for many years and will never use them again. You‚Äôve lost a good customer Ubereats! Shame on you.

review: Painfully slow. Every action took an age; I got offered a promo of ¬£5 off, which it accepted and then eventually after trying to pay it decided it was no longer valid. review: Again ordered a shop order with iceland and said driver had my order. It then said ordered delivered however I am still waiting for it. U need to employ honest people who don't scam us and u. Maybe do a background check on them. I will be posting the driver all over social media unless you sort this ASAP. I'm never using your company again after today as you are not honest and thief's. I'm also going to complain to my credit card company to get refund as you are not doing anything productive.Update I was given money back but no food so put as neutral 3 star. review: Poor delivery service. Drivers leaving items in restaurants to poor customer services. I ordered food which didn't arrive 3 days ago and it still hasn't been resolved. Can't even get a reply half the time. Will be deleting the app now

review: I used to love Uber eats until recently.Firstly the driver tried to double charge my order. Then when it popped up with the tipping section, it automatically decided its own tipping amount and constantly attempted to take it from my bank account!My bank blocked my card for fraudulent activity, after contacting Uber to try and resolve my issue, they told me to just pay the tip amount and that I can't use it now until I do! Fraud in Uber!

review: have now stopped using uber eats for my grocery deliveries.  Items missing, broken, and bad substitutions (OK, that is probably Sainsbury) - but when things go wrong, there is no way to correct it, or raise the issue.  Their system reports I have placed no orders to contest!
name: JG

review: I would not recommend Uber Eat. I live in Manchester and the service here is poor. It was very often I missed some items from my order. Anyway my money was refunded. But not last time. My order was delivered to the wrong address, I could see it on photo, provided by driver. He left the order outside the door. I have never selected the option to leave my order outside. I was always waiting. The driver tried to contact me, I sent him a message to remind my address. The Uber Eat customer team decided that I was eligible for a refund. I sent them the picture, made by a driver. But they somehow refunded me a half an order. I sent them emails and every time different agent respond and every time differently. It is not possible to contact Uber team and you'll hardly find a complaint section. I only could get a webchat. My issue still not resolved.I will never order again by Uber Eat. If you have an option to order strait from restaurants or supermarkets do it, it is cheaper and less stressful. Anyway, if you decided to order from Uber Eats, I recommend: make screenshots of the cost (how it looks first time) and items on your order, the time your order takes, try to contact a driver by message and take screenshots. If a driver making a picture - you need to save it. All of that it you will need to provide as an evidence for customer team. Or your money will never be refunded.  Hope my review is helpful.
name: SW

review: They basically scammed me.I placed an order and never got it delivered I also have proofs from the driver however uber eats is refusing to refund me their customer advisors are unhelpful and only communicate via saved responses I reported them and waiting for actions to be takes absolutely ridiculous and I will not be using them again.

review: Food was delivered early & was at a good temperature! Very tasty üòã & happy with everything!

review: Unacceptable service! I placed an order on the 14th of December 2023. The driver never showed and my order was not delivered. On the app he submitted the order as delivered, and my money was deducted. I immediately contacted support to log the issue, and on the 15th of December 2023 I received a confirmation email stipulating that they have issued a refund and that I can expect the money being refunded within a few business days. I followed up yesterday ((2nd January 2024) due to the fact that the money has not been paid yet. They sent me an email saying that they cannot assist me due to the fact that my complaint is more than 48 hours after the order was processed. Trying to explain to them the situation over email, but they keep on saying they cannot assist and will be closing the communication line. There is no other way of getting in touch with them. It is like a one sided communication line where they have the authority to take your money without providing the proper service. This is unacceptable and insane.

review: BEWARE!!! I would give no stars if possible. Uber eats cancelled my order and then took it upon themselves to order and charge me for partial items. review: Great service.  Easy to use.

review: Great service, on time and food was still hot

review: This company takes your money and literally doesn‚Äôt deliver. review: I placed a order over an hour ago but nit received it, it seems you have taken my money but not placed my order I have no way of contacting you to put a complaint in as it keeps asking what order im on about but you haven't placed the order just taken my money, I want my money back. review: Uber inflate the price for food and delivery costs for their profit while making the service worse. When things go wrong they offer terrible communication and pathetic compensation. They are a non producer and are not needed.

review: Uber eats.You are the worst.2 times already your pathetic company let us down...........  PLEASEEEEEEEEE people don't order from this company.We lost R400 again.What a joke...

review: Avoid as a plague. 2 out of my 3 orders turns to be not completed, missed part of my food. Uber eats don't care, I will never use them again and warn my friends.

review: I had placed an order on the 30/12/2023 for my 4 year old who wanted a happy meal, I ordered via the app and the driver never showed up when the app said it did, I phoned uber eats customer services about this and they read a script that there policies do not allow refunds for no-delieviers if the app shows the food was delievered.I had explained to uber eats that I run a business from home and I have commercial CCTV on the premercies and that I had scanned the CCTV equiptment to show that no driver had turned up and I have psysical photo graphic and video evidence that no driver turned up at the property that my 4 year old daughter was up set.Uber eats stated they simply refuse to send a replacement or refund then they said have a nice day that was it, they did not seek to remedy this and had shown a breech of contract and stated that the consumer rights act 2015 did not apply to the company as this is irelevent to them, they then said they just stick to there polices regardles.I would recoment people stay away from UBER EATS as they are a companies that believers consumer law does not apply them and there fore there is no protection for consumers using uber eats, I know it was only 8 pound if your money gets taken and you spend over ¬£40 then you will not get this back should no food turn up.

review: Do not trust them with your card information. I ordered groceries for delivery and never got them due to the delivery person who got an attitude because she didn't follow directions. I went to Ubereats to get my refund for purchases never received. I was at ease at first once I got it back. Shortly after, I got an notification about a pending $77.69 that I didn't spend at all it was actually $55.69  . But obviously due to items not being available it went down. When i got the notification about the $77.69 came through $24.84 came out of my account. Now if anyone knows math I had $15.00 left after $24.84 came out. Add it together it was deducted from the refund. The first person I spoke to put me on hold for 10 minutes, and someone else picked up the call. Everything went left when she tried to discredit the receipts I was able to prove. She wanted to argue and say I was wrong. I called back a little later and someone actually did try to help get this resolved. Keep in mind all my information is private and no one else outside of me had it. There is a investigation into my missing funds and with the transactions as well. I won't be using this company ever again. It is beyond sickening how they treat customers using their services. Save yourself the headache and seek other means.

review: The initial experience was satisfactory, but there has been a gradual decline. If everything goes smoothly and there are no issues with your order, then all is well.
