Items are frequently missed or incorrect. In cases where a main dish is missing from an order, a refund is not provided for the entire service; only the missing item is refunded. This means having to pay for their service twice if you wish to order a replacement meal for a family member who missed out.Additionally, getting assistance over the phone or through chat proves to be challenging. This has happened to us too many times to be anything but a recurring trend

review: I tried to order with Uber Eats on Dec 27th, 2023 for the first time and wanted to use the Coupon that I received for $30 off for the first order with FIRSTEATS30 that expired on Dec 31st 2023.When going to the checkout, Uber Eats automatically applied an offer for ‚Äúno delivery fee‚Äù instead of the coupon for $30 off. We tried several times to apply the $30 off coupon code and each time, Uber Eats applied the free delivery offer instead. This is called bait and switch and is illegal. There was no way to opt out of the no delivery fee offer.  I wanted to document that and tried taking a screenshot. By accident I placed the order for the full price, with no $30 discount. I called the restaurant immediately to stop preparing the dishes. It took me about 3 min to figure out how to cancel the order on the app. Then I started a help chat with 3 different agents Roshinikumar, Manuel and Aamir. All 3 said they are not able to refund and are holding back $51.71 from a $63 order because they claimed that the restaurant has already started to prepare the food.  I informed them that this was not the case. Later, I spoke with another agent on the phone who called up the restaurant and refunded me the ‚Äústolen‚Äù money. This multi million or maybe even billion business had absolutely crappy customer service and did not stand up to their offer to give $30 off for the first order.I will NEVER EVER recommend this business and NEVER order from them. This is a shame and a big discrace!!Better customer service is definitely necessary! Following through with offers is a legal requirement, that is basic consumer law!

review: This is meant to make ordering convenient but unfortunately, the app is not customer friendly enough.I ordered food (Order 4501), the address I wanted it to go was showing as too far. I was given an option to to extra which I agreed only to find out the order was approved for my address in the app. Every attempt to change it proved impossible.I contacted the courier only to find someone else who served as intermediary between me and the courier. Finally the food was delivered on the main foor to the address in the App without pressing the buzzer to alert me or enter the building. It was left on the street and the order wasn't there by the time I got to the door.The funny thing is that I'm expected to pay for an order I never received.
name: KJ

review: Abysmal experience, sadly not the only time. Food arrived with the container completely empty and spilt in the bag. Immediately contacted them to make them aware with images and they will not refund a penny. Thieves with no morals.
name: DR

review: The food arrived within the estimated time. The driver was friendly too.
name: KA

review: I wish I can give zero stars.Let me start by saying after ordering nearly 500 orders via Uber eats and more than 1000 rides with Uber, I have now deleted my account with them.Today I ordered food for my kids from Greggs. I put the order in at 2.20pm and about 10 min after they say the delivery guy is picking up my order. When it was about 2.45pm I wanted to cancel the order because I can see in the app that the delivery guy has been at the same spot for the last 15min and of course now by the time food now gets to me it cold and not fresh. The ETA time keeps on moving longer and longer. Bare in mind I have a child with learning difficulties who is waiting for his food.By now I got another ETA update which now said that the ETA is at 3.15pm which by now was nearly an hour since I initially made the order. When I initially made the order it said on the app that the estimate delivery was 25min. I now went into the chat app of Uber eats explaining to them the situation and asked for my delivery to be cancelled because it‚Äôs taking too long. The Uber eats app is not good at all. You send one message and then they will send you 5 to 6 messages at the same time which does not give you a chance to read all. I saw the message do you want to cancel and I said yes stating my reason and letting them know that the driver has been at the same spot which is not even at the restaurant for more than 20min. I then went through the thread and saw due to me cancelling they are charging me about ¬£19. The food that I ordered was ¬£20. These people whoever dealt with my case has no shame. After they took my money without any investigation regarding the ETA closed the chat which did not allow me to chat any further.I then called customer service which was no help at all. I then sent them an email aExplaining that the ETA kept changing and driver was at the same spot for more than 20min and that I only saw that they will charge me after I went through the chat thread but they responded saying that I wanted to cancel and so they did and at the end of the response they said ‚Äúno response needed‚Äù. How horrible and disgusting is this customer service. They did not even bother to investigate why the delivery driver accepted the job but stayed on the same spot for more than 20min. These horrible people did not even consider that that money they took was to buy a meal for my son with learning disability.No investigation was made regarding the driver.Many times I‚Äôve ordered and I can see the driver took the job but the driver would take their own time to deliver. Many times my order is wrong, many times I receive an order where the food is spilled but I don‚Äôt really complain but today this company has made a fool out of me and took money from me, money that was meant to buy my son a meal from his favourite restaurant. I am extremely disappointed by this company, their customer service and their  delivery service.We are paying a fee, we are paying the drivers so why are drivers allowed to pick up your order when they feel like doing so. Why were their no investigation into the delivery guy‚Äôs ETA or why was he at the same spot for more than 20min. Uber Eats needs to know that their service is not free. We pay for the food and delivery service so why are we treated as if they are doing us a favour and as if the service is free.As said I am so disappointed and disgusted with this company.
name: VT

review: I have never received such utter rubbish customer service - had an order not mine driver took it back - explained to Uber eats and I was refused my refund as I gave my pin!!! How is that my fault??? I tried to call the customer service number and was advised I have to email!! So much back and forth!! And I‚Äôm out of pocket
name: AS

review: Great job and incredible experience Thank you so much for your hard work
name: CA

review: I was impressed with the timing. it was on time. However, with a name of a male as my delivery rider, I was shocked to see a female delivering to me. I had a Jason to deliver. Surely, a lady does not bear Jason. Or maybe I thought. Unfortunately, when asked to review, it was the face of a male. So I was right that my rider should have been a male. Not that it made any difference, it is just that if Jason was not prepared to work, he should have logged off. Or is this something that is normal?

review: Please use thuisbezorgd. Uber eats are absolute scammers with a lack of customer support. Disgusting company

review: As an app it is easy to use and claim back money when things go wrong. However, there should be a way to make more general enquiries and complaints. I ordered from local restaurant that delivered a beef burger instead of chicken burger (as a Hindu that doesn't eat beef this was really upsetting and not acceptable) but was only refunded a low amount and really I would have expected the delivery and fees as well as I paid over ¬£5 for those and ended up hungry. There is no way to make restaurant aware of the mistake and how upsetting and disappointing it was and had to just deal with it. It's for this reason that I have little trust in these apps and hardly use them.

review: Customer service is none existing in this day and age to know have a singel phone line to talk to some one and a live chat that takes 30 minutes to respond is perthetic. As for the delivery's it's pot luck weather you get what you orders or delivery to the right place to start with.

review: Where to I start‚Ä¶ ordered at 1:21 and arrived at 3:07 stone cold and inedible. Took 3 drivers to acc be able to get my meal‚Ä¶second driver car broke down and didn‚Äôt think to cancel them collecting it for it to find another driver, ¬£4 delivery for a freezing meal I couldn‚Äôt eat oh and time of preparation on food was 1:57 so it sat over an hour‚Ä¶
name: Melissa Lewis

review: faster to get the mealeasy to orderfriendly

review: An item was missing. I contacted the help centre and they just offered a refund of GBP1.88, which is far below the price of the missing item (3.65). There is no way of contacting support or initiating dispute once the issue was so called "resolved" as ruled by UberEats. This is blatant cheating.

review: Good service

review: Please do not waste your money on this delivery partner. They do not hold guests at the heart of their business. If you have an issue with a delivery, say goodbye to your hard earned cash because they will not offer any credit, refund or replacement for your missing items.If I pay for something that I never receive and you refuse to refund my money, that is theft. Uber Eats can NEVER explain themselves. Their customer service team simply copy & paste non-sensical paragraphs whenever you have an issue, failing to actually resolve the issue. Why bother to even employ customer service representatives at all? I'd have better luck with ChatGBT.Even when you provide solid evidence for missing items, Uber Eats do not provide any advice, assistance or explanations as to why they're gonna keep your money in these circumstances. And the truth is they do not care.What a truly dreadful dreadful company. It's shameful.

review: last minute change of address - not a problemordering - easyquality of food - great

review: Delivery was prompt. Pizza was hot.

review: Absolutely pathetic. Ordered two meals and got just the chips and drinks. ¬£18! Spent half an hour speaking to customer service who told me il get a refund of the missing items. ¬£4.20. you can't even buy a big Mac or quarter pounder on its own for ¬£4.20, never mind ¬£2.10. I feel for the poor customer service reps having to stick to scripts that are immoral and in my eyes, illegal.
name: WI

review: 6¬£ for a loaf of bread from the grocery store next door ffs. Misleading advertisement, once you place an order an advertisement pops up ‚Äúquick you still have 10 minutes to grab anything from grocery store‚Äù and once you fall for the trap and add anything from the grocery store you will be charged for it‚Äôs delivery fees separately. With every order trillion advertisement appears asking you to join Uber one (or whatever it‚Äôs name was) monthly plan to save money on your current order, once you fall for the scam and  join, they don‚Äôt refund you any fees as promised. After you join the monthly plan, another add pops up ‚Äúquick now join the annual plan to save more money on your order‚Äù they cram all the ads together so you don‚Äôt know what to choose and just pay your money. Expensive delivery prices the cheapest was about 4¬£ in my area, I pay a quid or two in Deliveroo so no thanks Uber Eats. There‚Äôs no way to cancel an order literally immediately after you place it. Very difficult to speak to a human, no phone numbers around, if you have a complaint you‚Äôll be stuck with a bot that will take you to the outer space before guiding you how to file a complaint and wait for couple days to get replies.More importantly, poor poor customer service experience, no sympathy with customers and poor emotional intelligence, they give zero care about the customer, literally like speaking to bots, perhaps their bots interacts better.I tried this app once, and I still regret it. Account deleted and I recommend if you want to save your money just avoid.
name: ME

review: McDonald‚Äôs messed up my order, which once it has left the store comes under the jurisdiction of Uber eats, I phoned McDonald‚Äôs who gave me a phone number to ring, bare in mind this was Christmas Eve, I rang the number while waiting for the reordered food that I had to again pay for as well as delivery, Christmas Day & Boxing Day were busy so I decided to ring them again on the 28th only to be told that you only get 48 hours to ask for a refund. I hadn‚Äôt been told this by McDonald‚Äôs, and the fact that I‚Äôd rang and it hadn‚Äôt been answered on Christmas Eve made me think they were not working. Moral of the story is Someone Owes Me ¬£12  and I‚Äôm not going to shut up about it DO NOT USE UBER EATS
name: Cheryl Carter

review: ¬£35 of takeaway delivery made early this morning, my son's treat for the family, was stolen. Driver choose to leave the takeaway on the doorstop outside the open porch, he did not ring the bell or knock on the door. Cheekily he took a photo of the delivered goods then within minutes the food was gone. Surprise Surprise! My son complained but Uber have refused to refund my son! Won't be using this service again as appalling, not the first time this has happened. I'll be telling family and friends to avoid at all costs.
name: YB

review: This is the third time that my order from McDonald‚Äôs has been wrong with missing items I Uber eats have refunded twice but this time have refused this is not on they have taken my money but not given me my goods.  It‚Äôs not like I order much how come out of 3 burgers they always miss one off and when you ask for no pickles you get extra pickles it‚Äôs ridiculous.  Poor on McDonald‚Äôs for missing the item(s) and bad on Uber for not refunding.

review: My experience is they really don‚Äôt care they will take your money and leave you angry this morning I got food and the drink spilled and they even gave me the wrong order in one items no refund was giving and of course my friend was hungry and wanted food so I said fine but if this is cold I will be angry the food was taking so long I messaged support and they said if you have issues with the food come to us so as expected the food was freezing cold and I got the wrong order as expected no refund so they will just take your money and not care in the world but I will be fighting for my money back until I get it cause I‚Äôm not giving them a cent more in life and I really would hope everyone else goes with just eat way better company I would give Uber eats minus 100 and I‚Äôm surprised they are not sued 100 times a day

review: I got an Uber One subscription. I used it for the first time for food delivery. I was charged 2x for the tip. I am generous and tipped the driver 20%, and it's not about the money. This is basic customer service. I cancelled my subscription and will never use Uber again.

review: Don‚Äôt deliver the food as no driver available they say we try to find you another driver. Please do not use this service very poor would most definitely not recommend feel as if I have been robbed of my money

review: Ease in ordering. Nice delivery person.

review: Do not use them. USE JUST INSTEAD. Don't waste your time or money. I made a mcdonalds order and I accidentally left my mom's address on it. I suddenly realised when I ordered and I tried my best to contact Uber and the driver picking my food. Uber have no way off contacting so that was a big fail and they must of changed my driver atleast 5 times for me to message every single one of them. Everyone of them wasn't interested. When I saw my food was on the way I phoned the person delivering and spoke to him in the app. He got to my mom's address but he didn't go all the way to the top of the grove where my mom's lives as I was watching him on the map. He was waiting at the bottom. He didn't once try and deliver it and Uber have said they are not refunding.My mom was in waiting for the food as she was going to drop it round to me.Do not waste your money

review: Worst delivery company out of all of them. Quite happily take your money but rarely receive your order. And refunds are never an option.

review: Mcdonalds arrived cold AGAIN and with missing items. Izhar Mohammed the supervisor said the guidelines were met I.e. delivered in 1 hour the temperature of the food was irrelevant wot a joke. McDonald's should never of changed to uber eats shocking delivery and service !!!

review: The delivery person provided excellent service, and was friendly! If I could request service from a particular driver I would from that gentleman each time.

review: While the convenience of the using the app to get the food when you want is there, The downside of using it is the many fees that are added on top of the already jacked up prices compared to ordering from the restaurant directly. review: The worse. Numerous times food left outside with no knock on the door so food was cold when found. To then be told by uber eats I'm sorry the food wasn't the temperature you expected it to be. No refund. Then another time driver tried hitting on my girlfriend and Uber did absolutely nothing about it. Terrible. Terrible delivery service.

review: Very often delayes happen, the charge is ridiculous, for a near by restaurant they charge delivery + ¬£2.99 for service or even more ! They take no blame if they bring you cold food.

review: Order cancelled either by Uber eats or the restaurant on 26 December after waiting for an hour. ¬£26.97 is missing from my Uber credits and that is the exact amount of the cancelled order. I don't understand how they are different from a chatbot. You might as well fire the whole team and implement a chatbot that answers from the FAQs.I still haven't get back my ¬£26.97 until now. I am a paying Uber one member at the moment but will make sure not to join again in the future.

review: AVIOD AT ALL COSTS!!!I was charged for an order I didn't make.  I tried to contact Uber through their help section but no way of raising this issue.  I just kept getting message that refund window had closed.Uber, I don't want a refund, I want the money that you stole from me!I have now cancelled my account and my only option is to try to get my money back from my bank as its a fraudulent transaction.

review: The delivery driver we got didn't want to deliver our food into the building (we couldn't leave the apartment.) He then cancelled the order when he was outside and took our food. Called customer service and they told me that they have a policy that if a driver disposes of the food (puts it in the trash) then they get away with this behaviour. Absolutely wasteful for the food and the customer service is terrible. No one in my family will be using this service ever again.

review: Recently  I found out that you are supporting  israeli  genocide on Palestinians and its just make me sick to even use yours app.
name: Izabela TK

review: First and last time using uber eats. I placed the order online to buy the family some kfc as no-one was up to cooking. The order was placed at 9.10pm with an eatimated delivery of 10-15mins, with an note stating delivery at 10.15pm at the latest. The estimated delivery time changed repeatedly until it was 10.15pm and still showing as processing. Then the delivery time jumped to 10.35pm with the explanation that they couldn't find someone to deliver - so for the full hour they had no-one assigned to our order but just kept us waiting. For an exhausting amount of time we tried using the help section to cancel the order or speak with someone, but got nowhere. Ubereats does have a designated phone line but you will not find a number for it anywhere online (dec23). Eventually, we phoned the Uber taxi service, which Uber makes a point of telling you is geared for travelling customers. Funnily enough, it recognised the mobile number we used for the order and the answering service said it was transferring us to "uber eats". I do believe there is a degree of "spin" at work here, as we were then told the wait times were extensive and advised to call back later, seconds before putting us through to a rep, where we were able to cancel the order although we have to wait up to 5 working days for it to reach my bank. Disappointing and frustrating experience. Avoid unless you have time and money to waste.
name: Aunt Pol

review: I will put a negative review everywhere. Online, on Uber Eats, on Uber and everywhere else I possibly can. This experience has been HORRIBLE!!!! I‚Äôve done everything right and nothing has been resolved. Horrible service. Disgusting. Never again.

review: I am so disappointed with this place and some of the people that deliver the groceries.I ordered groceries yesterday just bcz it was raining and I have a baby only reason I ordered grocerie.So my bananas looked disgusting that I went today to exchange I also got lemons with mold and was charged the price of 12 pack of coke for a 2L bottle of coke and half of the things this person wasn't able to get not even baby food.I don't understand why they hire people who can't find the items on your list and than you have to replace or get your refund and they charge big fee to replace items which I think they shouldn't do that because your already paying the delivery fee and other fees.I am very disappointed and I'm honestly not going to use their service for groceries anymore these people are scammers and hire lazy people who don't even check the stuff and still want tips.DON'T USE THEIR SERVICES.

review: Said that the food delivery had been delivered to a completely different address (which did not even exist in the app).  When claiming the money back it asks 'Have you been charged'  the charge was in 'pending' on my credit card so I said no.  By the time the charge went through, the app said that it was too late to claim.  So, always say you've been charged.  From previous experience, the support is terrible.  I am currently claiming the money back through my credit card.  My wife used them in the last fiasco, they ripped me off in the past and I said I'd never use them again, but my wife decided to and yet again we were robbed.  AVOID.  They are the complete opposite of the taxi firm who I have always found to be very good.  There are plenty of other food options available, use one of them instead.  I have never had any issues with deliveroo or just eat (or any problems have been sorted efficiently and quickly).  Uber Eats is very poor.

review: We decided to splurge on having Chinese food from P.F. Chang's for our Christmas Eve meal while watching "A Christmas Story". The meal was tasty and our driver, Shanna delivered it perfectly on time as stated.  Had leftovers for the next day, too.

review: With them for some years. However today was the last straw. My food came completely drenched as the drink spilled. Fries were cold, clearly the person using the app was using other apps also. It‚Äôs only 5 minutes away even by bike. Tried to use their system to take a picture and it kept saying image not valid. Tried on their desktop. What a joke. They should also really look into their cyber security. Not good enough.

review: The Macro tracking is a o Kay.  But the sensitivity of the app at the exact time the order has been picked at a pharmacy ,Will put the user app victim to 40 dollar cancelation fees.    Yes  three times this app has intentionally victimized me by canceling and removing all of order .    That forces another driver purchase and the other driver to be very peturbed.

review: The driver did not follow instructions I asked for a phone call when they arrived they sent me a picture of my food sitting outside of the building that was not mine. I really would like a refund. It‚Äôs not the company it‚Äôs the driver that is the problem. I‚Äôve order before and they did what was asked. I should have gave a tip money wasted. Never again

review: My coffee tasted great! The speedof delivery was fast !

review: Very easy to order and good communication with ongoing progress.

review: I placed an order to be delivered from McDonalds on 1 Dec 2023 - it never arrived. I received a message via my online account nearly an hour later to say it had been delivered, when it had not.  I never received any communication from the driver nor did the driver answer any of my calls (before the delivered message was received) as I wanted to find out how long they would be/if there was a problem or delay.  I sent a text message to the driver asking what they had done with my order but got no response.  To make the situation worse, uber had also overcharged me.  I contacted help support and told them my order never arrived and wanted a refund.  They only refunded a quarter.  I send a number of other messages but the support team were dismissive stating the matter had been resolved and a refund given.  I wanted a full refund as I got no goods delivered. To date (28 Dec 2023), this matter has still not been resolved. Trying to take the matter further and who to make a complaint to is beyond a joke.  I have used uber eats before with no major issue but given this issue and the poor after customer service, I would not recommend them or use uber again.

review: Your service made me glad cause when I request to come near my doorstep he came to my house and I thank you'll for you friendly service thank you,‚ô•Ô∏è

review: Refusing to refund because THEIR DRIVER failed to deliver my order!!! He claims he was outside my house for 26 minutes waiting, my house is COVERED in CCTV and has a Ring doorbell and nobody even came onto my street in the hour I was waiting for my order, let alone knock on my front door. Absolutely fuming! On the notes the driver said he couldn't find my door number on the door. Stranger again as the door number is on a 12 inch plaque under a wall light right beside my front door. First and LAST time I'll use these crooks. Taking the matter further as it's blatant robbery. Customer service is appalling also. AVOID AVOID AVOID.

review: Uber eats destroys someone's birthday celebrations.There's No Zero Star options there, l should have select that. I have ordered a KFC through Uber eats. Interesting fact is when l contacted uber eats for refund, they mentioned their dedicated staff have followed all guidelines that's why they can't process the refund too.I want to make it more clear if possible try to track down the person who was assigned for that delivery. It happened in Uber Eats Gloucester.

review: We ordered food for our autistic son on the mcdonald's app. After the delivery time being continuously pushed back with the order status "picking the order up" for about 10-15 minutes and the driver on site for this entire duration, our sons food was finally showing out for delivery. This was then followed by the delivery time being pushed further out due to the driver going to a different address. I am under the assumption the driver had multiple deliveries to make, our food arrived. The food was stone cold. I phoned customer service which was of no use at all. I tried to escalate this and although I was put through to a "manager", he was a waste of time and breath speaking to. He kept quoting they couldn't do anything as it was delivered within a reasonable time and he was following his guidelines. When I asked what the guidelines were, he went on to quote the delivery time. When I told him again it was delivered after this time and the tracking was apologising for the order being late he still insisted that this was reasonable. We have used uber eats directly and through mcdonald's quite often due to our son and on the previous occasions when we have felt the need to call they have good. After this experience we will no longer be using there service and would advise anyone else against using them.
name: Amy Morgan

review: It's Christmas eve. I'm stuck in traffic and missed the big Christmas eve meal. Also in an area I've never been and open Uber eats app to order food for pickup. I arrived at the restaurant and order was waiting nice and hot.
name: LT

review: Ordered food nearly 3 hours ago! Delivery time kept getting pushed back so just rang the restaurant who have said they never received the order from Uber Eats!!!They've happily taken the money but not delivered!  Almost impossible to speak to anyone from Uber Eats. Won't be using them again!
name: SC

review: After a bad experience with them a few years ago I thought I'd finally try them again after getting a 40% off code posted through my door. Lo and behold, the code didn't work! Also I signed up for a free month trial of their loyalty service and randomly got charged 72p. Not much, but it's broken my trust in them yet again! I don't care if they send me a 100% off voucher now, they can forget it. Every single other takeaway delivery service blows Uber out of the water. Borderline scam.
name: PM

review: Order showed up half complete. Restaurant told me to contact Uber Eats. Uber Eats could refund me for my missing food, but not send a driver to deliver the food. Despite the fact, that the restaurant had told me that the food was waiting to be picked up. Try Deliveroo. Try JustEats. Try cooking. Don't try Uber Eats.
name: Michael Cunningham

review: Today December 27 we did not make no orders to Uber eats and it shows in my sons account that there are two orders this morning from Uber eats. I‚Äôm hoping Uber eats will fix this issue in this problem ASAP.
name: PG

Overall, my experience with UbearEats has been deeply unsatisfactory, prompting me to advise others to consider alternative services.

review: Uber Eats has illegally stolen hundreds of dollars from me. On my most recent order to 7-Eleven (7451 S Gartrell Rd) which I paid $43.08 for and selected the option "meet at door" and to give a code to receive my order, it was cancelled... before the person ever arrived or was even near my house. It said it was contacted by the uber eats support team, I contacted them, they told me that because the order was started I cannot receive a refund? So because the order was started, and never arrived, after waiting over an hour, i cannot receive a refund when they never gave me what I paid for.This is a common theme for uber eats. Within the last years of order from uber eats they have multiple times, with proof of food not being delivered or receiving the wrong food denied me a refund. The conduct of uber eats and the guidelines they have their employees follow is ILLEGAL. They are told to NOT refund or even respond to customers after they complain.On my previous Better Business Bureau  complaints #20673331, #20437713 & #20454894 each time they claimed they contacted me via email or in-app and each time, did not. Uber Eats tries to deceive the Better Business Bureau and those reading complaints by claiming they reached out and resolved the problem when they never did, they just hope that the person stops responding to the complaint follow ups.If I am not refunded the money from this order and last 2 complaints I did not receive a refund for I am going to be taking legal action. This time, they admitted the food did not come and will not be refunding me, last time the drop off location was wrong, which they admitted, the time before that the submitted picture from the driver showed no food being dropped off, I was denied a refund each time. I NEVER abused the refund system having spent thousands and having minimal refunds given.

review: I want to share my recent experience with Uber Eats, and unfortunately, it has been quite disappointing. Firstly, there's a concerning practice where they charge an additional ¬£10 months after ordering, labeling it as a tip without prior notification. This could easily go unnoticed if you don't regularly check your bank statements.Moreover, I encountered a delivery issue where items were missing from my order, and despite contacting them, they refused to refund me without providing any explanation. I have preserved all communication records and screenshots highlighting their stance on not refunding even when the delivery was incomplete.To resolve the issue, I contacted my bank, and they refunded the amount, expressing displeasure at the situation. It's disheartening to see such practices from a service that many rely on.I advise everyone to exercise caution when using the Uber Eats app. Informing my family and friends led to them deleting the app due to similar concerns. It's essential to stay vigilant as it appears the app may be engaging in questionable practices.

review: First of all, their customer service is almost non-existent, it took me a lot of time to find a way to flag my issue.The problem was that I ordered food by mistake. The restaurant accepted the order immediately and I cancelled it right after. The whole thing took like 3 seconds, but UberEATS is not refunding me the money. According to them, once the restaurant accepts the order it means they are already preparing it, which in this case was physically impossible. It's like paying in a shop with a wrong bill and the cashier, that didn't even put it in the box yet, stands there with your bill in his/her hand refuses to give it back to you, saying he/she already bought supplies with it. Wouldn't you feel like you've been robbed?Additionally, this app used to have no additional fees. Then they started to charge a service fee, later a delivery fee and lastly the prices of most products are more expensive than they are in the restaurant's menu. You end up paying like extra 5-10‚Ç¨ for your order, and they have the nerve to offer you a "premium" membership to remove some of these additional fees, as if they are doing you a favor. They are greedy and unethical, and we are a lot of people feeling this way.

review: UberEats is an absolute nightmare, and I'm beyond frustrated with their terrible service. I've been waiting for a refund for an undelivered order for nearly a month, and their responses are nothing but a bunch of excuses. When I complained, they had the audacity to tell me, "It looks like you have already been refunded for this order." Really? Because my bank account begs to differ!According to their so-called "customer support," the refund should take 5-10 business days to reflect on my account. Well, guess what? It's been over 15 working days, and I'm still empty-handed. They conveniently blamed a mysterious "pending" amount on my bank statement, claiming it would disappear within 5-10 business days. Surprise, surprise ‚Äì it did vanish, but my refund is nowhere to be found.As if that's not enough, UberEats also managed to overcharge me for a repeated order and, to add insult to injury, charged me double for the tip. Are they serious? This is nothing short of a scam! It's clear that UberEats is more interested in taking your money than delivering a reliable service. Save yourself the headache and look elsewhere for your food delivery needs. UberEats, you need to step up your game and start treating your customers with the respect they deserve.

review: I placed a ¬£62 order for food for my family from McDonald‚Äôs - there was several items missing from the bag (McDonald‚Äôs fault i guess) but the food arrived stone cold! It had taken over an hour for the delivery. I had already paid a ¬£6.20 tip to the Uber delivery guy and ¬£3.99 for delivery - I called Uber eats to complain, the person on the phone I could tell was not taking a proper note of the items missing and he said said it would take 3 weeks to receive a refund for those items (NO REFUND RECEIVED and it‚Äôs been 5 weeks now), I asked for a refund on the tip and delivery charged because the food was so cold and not enjoyable - he said he cannot give a refund on that! I think it‚Äôs disgusting and a complete con! He kept telling me to contact McDonald‚Äôs too but on the McDonald‚Äôs app it says to contact Uber Eats! The guy on the phone at Uber Eats was just fobbing me off, I could tell straight away he wasn‚Äôt going to help just by the tone of his voice and carelessness he had. I could tell he wasn‚Äôt making a note of what I was saying. This business needs to be investigated because it‚Äôs fraud taking someone‚Äôs money and not providing a refund when due! Not legal.Absolutely shocking service, utter, utter disaster.

review: UBER EATS DON'T CARE ABOUT THEIR CUSTOMERS. I would give MINUS STARS if I could !!!!!  Yesterday I ordered a Mc Delivery from my local branch . Not for the first time items were missing. Obviously I rang Uber eats support line and told them the items that were missing. After being on hold I was told that for some reason ( I can only assume that because I have called on several occasions before about missing items ) that my refund was refused. I asked to speak to a manager and got the same response.  Uber eats was NOT prepared to reimburse me for a fault that was NOT my own !!! So the money for the missing items is basically THEFT .   given how poor the service is that I've received I would imagine that the attitude travels all the way up to the top. Trying to get some sort of resolution from UBER EATS is so difficult. Web sites make it as difficult as possible to complain. Trying to talk to anyone who gives a crap is impossible. AVOID UBER EATS at all COSTS . I have to say that MCDONALD'S CUSTOMER SERVICE eventually gave me some vouchers as a way of an apology, even though they are not responsible for refunds when food is delivered by uber eats, so credit to them.

review: Have used Uber eats for years, occasionally experienced slight issues but nothing on the level I received 2 days ago. So I ordered x2 meals from Rio‚Äôs , and a bag of mixed chicken. On opening the FIRST BOX MEAL, I noticed a piece of plastic sticking from underneath the burger, after inspection it turned out to be hard sharp plastic. I immediately boxed the meal back up, bagged ALL the food back up and contacted Uber eats to redirect the driver back to my property to collect this food. I notified Uber about the issue and also attached images. NONE of the food was eaten , touched, or tampered with I kindly re wrapped this up and asked for a full refund and for the restaurant to collect. I was refused a refund under their policy and procedures even though I asked them to collect this food. I‚Äôm absolutely appalled. You would never go out to eat, find contaminated food, with sharp objects and pay for that meal you would send it back to the kitchen. Uber have now taken my money, and are refusing to get back to me. And I‚Äôm here 3 days later with the food still bagged up, going mouldy, ready to be collected. I expect a full refund. This is disgusting. How dare you think I am entitled to pay for something I would not dare consume or give to anyone else to consume. Contaminated, disgusting food with sharp objects. I am appalled at the lack of service; every form of contact I get a different operated who have no clue what they are talking about. One of them even advised my claim for a missing item was rejected. I NEVER HAD A MISSING ITEM I HAD CONTAMINATED FOOD WITH SHARP PLASTIC OBJECT! I expect Uber to respond to me within a satisfactory timeframe and resolve this.

I‚Äôm not happy with your customer service at all.

review: Glitchy app not updated properly - refused refund for propblem with app. Difficult to get help with order issues, app purposefully designed to take you around in circles - hard to find or even ring customers services - I had to actually find a way to sneakily get through to their Uber Rider support to get a transfer to Customer Services (you can only ring when you have a live order).Full explanation of issue belowI made an order on my route home - the app was trying to deliver to my live location. I updated the app to drop off to my home address and placed the order. Unfortunately the app was still trying to deliver to the street I was on - the app does not let you update the order and theres no apparent way of updating order any other way. I had no choice but to cancel my food. I reordered and the app recognised second time that I'd updated to my home address. I want a refund for the first cancelled order - it was not my fault the app was not updating properly, and I also reordered immediately after so the food would not have been wasted as I reordered it - the specific takeaway also took ages with my order so was running behind so no food would have even been prepped on the first cancelled order. Explained this twice on phone and twice on app. Also falsely promised refund on phone. People on phone also seemed pretty disbondent.Chat feature also stops you responding to their responses.

review: If I could put 0 stars I would. I ordered my food at 2.43 and it arrived at 3.29 apparently this is a reasonable amount of time. Uber will not refund me even though I have proof it was late. Wont be ordering with Uber or McDonald's app again.

I ordered my kfc for my lunch, inserted the driver goes around to the wrong place, no one call me on my phone or anything, even though they say the driver has been trying to call me, which is a lie! so i end up no kfc and no money back for  my order, and a lot distress, and the customer service is not helpful at all and saying the same thing over and over like talking to a robot, void ubereats like the plague,seriously.

I was shocked when they billed one month early than annual was suppose to began. 2nd issue I was shopping at Walgreens for the 40% promo. A few times I removed & changed some items. Now all the items are for Christmas stocking stuffers, the items are holiday themed or have some memorable significance so I had selected the NO substitutions for the entire order. Somewhere through my checkout the order seems to have defaulted to allow for shopper to pick what THEY THOUGHT I WOULD LIKE INSTEAD!!!!I contacted c/s and they were no help. Quickly jumped to I would not get a refund. Wait I just want what I ordered, and for you not to stick me with charges for your cr‚àÜppy selections.3rd issue (different day) I ordered take out food of burgers & fries. As I was tracking my order I saw that it would be delayed because the driver picked up a delivery for another customer. Hmm you like cold fries & burgers?? Not me & certainly not what I expected. I was credited for the order and now with this Walgreens order it seems Uber has dug their heels in and will not offer help. Hmm so folks you're allowed to complain once and get a resolution but after that you're at the mercy of the delivery ppl or shoppers with no recourse from UberEats.  me

review: Im unsure what it is with Uber eats, we pay for Uber one however Uber eats always finds a way to work in a delivery fee or an exorbitant service fee. Come to learn they lie to their drivers about what percentage actually goes to them. They state 90% of the service fee goes to Uber eats. Come to learn it‚Äôs actually closer to 13% as for adding fees, we‚Äôve recently been introduced to the marketplace fee. Uber state this is to cover third party deliveries. However if the store already charged delivery what did this go to? Another article states it‚Äôs for credit card charges, which again are not something unless stated clearly customers are liable to pay.Honestly Uber eats need investigating by HMRC and Trading standards.

After a long call they decided to tell me because of my order history I can't have a refund so basically because I regularly have issues which is their fault they will just steal from me. review: Absolutely rubbish, disgusting service I ordered A delivery waited when he failed to turn up, I contacted them I was told that they came and he left the food and took a picture so they‚Äôre not responsible. I later discovered the wall that he claims he left the food on was on the main road three streets away as the road sign accidentally came in the corner of the picture , this is absolutely disgusting. The fact that Uber eats can lie like this is appalling , they randomly put a box down, take a picture pick up the food and drive off with it and claim they delivered it. I was strongly suggest not to use Uber eats, my experience was in the Slough Farnham Road area absolutely appalling behaviour.

review: I was able to order easily on the Uber Eats app and my order was delivered at exactly the time I ordered it. Very good service.

review: Ubereats is awful.  Use ANYTHING else than them!  I have made 437 deliveries with them in about a year! This is hundreds of dollars in fees! It used to be great, fast delivery, good customer service and since about March 2023 it turned bad.  I had some issues with some orders where I had to beg to have compensation on missing items.  I have NEVER made a false report! On December 1st I decided to treat myself and order for 44.68$ of Starbucks, at this point I am an UberOne member as well, and please note in my area Starbucks is NOT in the UberOne location so I had to pay full fee and delivery.  I received everything EXCEPT one item worth 3.95$.  I looked into the help section and the option "missing item" was not there.  So I contacted help who refused to refund the missing item.  I was not asking much.  I was asking 3.95$/44.68$ they refused.  I took the conversion in screenshot, called PayPal, sent it to them and they agreed that this was not okay and refunded the 3.95$.  On December 14 due to having automatic payments UberEats charged me that 3.95$ again.  I contacted them, they said they would transfer me to a specialist and it would take 6 to 12h. On the 18th I wrote back saying with the lack of answer I am filing with PayPal again.  Today I cancelled my UberOne membership considering after this event they removed all my promotion.  Once cancelled they answered basically "no refund" again and didn't let me answer and closed the chat right away.  I have now sent all those new screenshots to PayPal, filed with them and officially deleted my account. DO NOT USE UBEREATS
name: √ârika Leduc

review: The restaurant food was delicious. However, the driver was reckless with the packages, causing a great deal of the broth for our pho to spill onto our front porch.

review: Discount codes hardly ever work. The overall price ends up being almost twice as much than if I go pick it up myself. I don‚Äôt recommend using it to be honest.

review: I have ordered many times from Uber Eats, usually have ok experience but in the last order the service was disgusting. I ordered ¬£60 worth of food from them which when delivered, many of the items were cold and the drinks were half empty. I reported this to Uber where they stated their policy on this is to feed this back to the restaurant and that was all they were willing to do, they now will not respond to any message I send them, simply closing the case each time. I‚Äôve never known any establishment when an order arrives unsatisfactory to not refund, if I was in a restaurant and I ordered food and it was half full I would expect a refund. Pretty disgusting service if you ask me

review: The driver was excellent in his customer service unfortunately my order was not correct but it had nothing to do with the driver my name was on the pickup one thing that I had really choose Panda Express for was not in my order and I choose that item other than that it was a wonderful experience

review: Very disgusting service. I placed an order at 20:10 at 20:14 a driver was assigned and wasn't moving on the tracker then at 20:30 they removed the driver. At 20:45 another driver was assigned then at 20:46 they were removed. At 21:04 they couldn't find any drivers at all. I was advised by the restaurant to cancel the order. The order was cancelled at 22:54. Now I am being refused the order refund of ¬£36.01.

review: A rating of 1 is too good!I ordered a takeaway which never arrived. I waited outside my address for 10 mins once the resturant confirmed the order was out for delivery. At the end of the 10 mins I saw the bike pass the main road at the end of our road and it didn't stop. I have no missed calls and i have provided my call log to prove this. Yet I have been told I'm not eligible for a refund as the driver waited outside the wrong address for 7 mins without calling me! This is theft. If it was anything else being delivered it wouldn't be an issue a refund would be given. Never ever again and I will be on every local site warning them of this scam company. Terrible.

review: I ordered a McDonalds takeaway through the App.. this was delivered through Uber.. it didn‚Äôt arrive and when calling to find out what happened the driver said he stood out my address for 7 minutes. As I was standing looking out of the window this seems very strange. All I can suggest is he must have got hungry and fancied it himself.I never received a refund and will never use the company again.

review: My entire order did not arrive, when I finally managed to contact them , they refunded the wrong order, leaving me ¬£14 out of pocket. They refused to refund this and I am awaiting communication from my bank. I used to use them a lot - but never again.

review: Very quick to receive my order. However the driver looked like he lived in the streets. We expect people handling our food to be clean. Kindly encourage the delivery guys to bath and change their clothes consistently.

review: App would not take my discount code, of 40%  for 1st order of 5 orders, when I came out of the app and went back in it said the code had already been used !!  I was expecting a preview page before payment was taken, before i knew it an order was placd and fish and chips for 2 cost a whopping ¬£32, which is normally ¬£23 from our local chippy (we used that chippy). No mention of the service charge when ordering. Order was delivered quickly, piping hot and delicious
name: WE

review: Having created a delivery order with one supermarket on the UBER app, I had not noticed that there was still ONE small item (milk) left in the cart from a second supermarket. Proceeding to check out, I authorised payment for the main delivery, however the UBER app somehow placed a second order for the small item not required.  No where during the process did the app inform me of this, nor did I authorise the additional order / payment.  The main delivery arrived, followed shortly by the incorrect order.  For context, the incorrect order item value was ¬£1.50 - however after fee's and delivery charge it came to ¬£11!!! Which, even if it had been a valid order, would amount to theft!! I quickly contacted UBER via the chat function, and explained the situation.  Suffice it say, UBER was not in the slightest interested in resolving the issue, and repeatedly explained that the order had been generated from a device associated to my account.  They basically dismissed my concern out of hand, and were not willing to accept that the issue was caused by the app.  I am completely disgusted with the attitude of UBER in this case, and warn all users to be vigilant when committing their hard earned money to this company.  UBER could have easily resolved this complaint by issuing a credit note or refund, but simply were disinterested. Please be aware and careful.  UBER, you should be ashamed.
name: GW

review: Placed an order that arrived missing a happy meal, the happy meals I did have had no toys/books in and the cheeseburgers had pickles in despite requests not to (my kids are fussy) When I looked at the bag, the receipt mcdonalds had stapled on was completely different to what I ordered. I flagged this up instantly with uber eats. They ignored my initial request so I followed up 2 days later to get a response that said because I'd had some refund recently, for equally wrong orders, I wasn't entitled to a refund for this. It was a default response that didn't take into account the discrepancy with receipt etc. I replied and have since been completely ignored for the past 2 days. Terrible customer service. I'd included images of everything, so it was impossible for it to not be true. I've cancelled my uber eats subscription. Good if the meal is right, nowhere to go or to complain to if it isn't. Could not find a complaint procedure anywhere for their service.
name: HP

review: If I could give it no stars I would. I didn't receive my phone as the delivery man left my food at the wrong house. But because he took a picture of my food at the WRONG house I was still charged and they won't give me a refund. Hard to communicate with anyone. Won't be using again.  Deliveroo much better

But this whole experience left a very bad taste in my mouth.Once i started looking online about Uber reviews i felt i made a huge mistake by ordering from this company. Looks like issues like this are common place. Just hoping i have done by job by warning others. Be careful when you order food from Uber.

review: I am extremely disappointed with my Uber Eats experience with KFC. The delivery was a disaster from start to finish. Despite placing my order promptly, it took over an hour for the driver to even pick it up. By the time the delivery arrived, a whopping 90 minutes later, everything was cold ‚Äì a clear indication that the food had been neglected. To add insult to injury, the items weren't even properly sorted, resulting in a mixed-up mess.What's more infuriating is the lack of support from Uber Eats. Despite reporting the issue, they only refunded me for the mixed-up items, completely ignoring the fact that the entire order was cold and inedible. This is unacceptable, and it reflects poorly on both KFC and Uber Eats. I won't be using this service again, and I strongly advise others to think twice before trusting them with their meal deliveries.

review: Most disgusting company I've ever had to deal with. I am part of Uber one, on two occasions now you've credited my account due to mistakes made by yourself (as your promise to your Uber one customers). The first ¬£5 was credited because items were out of stock and my order was cancelled and the second time was due to the order taking too long so I had ¬£10 in my Uber cash pot. I placed an order and used ¬£5 of this cash towards the order but upon looking at the invoice the ¬£5 wasn't actually credited to the order it was just stolen from my cash pot. I messaged you about it and you relied you have 'decided not to give me the ¬£5 anymore'!!!!!! I've then been to check my account today and it appears the other ¬£5 has now been taken as well. You make promises to your customers when part or Uber one but then decide afterwards you don't want to give them the credit promised? If you didn't want to give it dont make the promise and don't give it. But the fact you've put it into my account and then stolen it back is absolutely disgusting. This will be going to consumer rights and I'll be contacting citizens advice of where I stand with this as in my eyes it's theft of my money you had already given me then decided to take back for no apparent reason or explanation from yourselves. I will be boycotting everything to do with Uber and will not stop until resolved.

review: If I could give them a 0 star I would, absolutely shocking customer service from the driver that was tasked to deliver my McDonalds food last night; it's not the first time I have had issues with this company delivery service, but last night takes the mickey. I clearly listed my address and postcode (a residential address, might I add) correctly on my order, (no one else except uber has difficulties with my address), yet the driver's app that he uses sent him to the wrong location. When he called to ask why I was not at the destination to accept my order, I informed him that there was no-one at my house and I asked him where he was. He rudely stated that he was at the steel works entrance (3 and a half miles away from where I live in the middle of an industrial estate). When I explained he was in the wrong area and tried to give him directions he flat out and rudely stated he would not be delivering my order as it is too far out of his way. I had to argue that I had clearly stated my correct address when placing the order and that he should complete the delivery to the correct address as required but he just told me he would not deliver as he would not get paid the extra mileage - how is this my issue? He went to the wrong address, he is at fault, yet he was trying to blame me - He simply told me that he would not deliver and that the order will be cancelled and I should take it up with McDonalds then hung up the phone. So i was left out of pocket (as Uber will take up to 15days to refund me - your customer service line is just as useless when I tried calling them alongside McDonalds by the way), with 2 very hungry children. I will be avoiding the company at all cost in the future -as will everyone I have spoken to who have had similar issues - clearly this company does not care about its customers.

review: Acc horrible and wouldnt give me my refund, do u understand how angry a hungry female can be

review: I was a new customer to uber eats and the service I received was abysmal. I placed an order via online aster placing order I noticed my address only said the city. I contacted the driver many times with address. I messaged him. I have proof of this. When he finally called he hung up after a few seconds, because he couldn't speak English. I informed him he was not at my address. He wrote a message back and using translate I was able to communicate.  He informed uber does not pay him enough and he would not deliver my food. As he would have to do more work to deliver my order. I did not recieve my food order. I asked for a refund from uber and they refused. I will never use there service again.

review: I've been using Uber Eats for a while now and have not had any significant issues up until this point. I had been using the 3 month free trial, and decided to cancel the automatic renewal since it was nearing the end of the period. They gave me an offer of a $1 renewal for the next month as I was opting out, so I decided to accept. Big mistake. After checking my membership again, I noticed that I am still going to be billed the full $9.99 today DESPITE already paying $1 for the next month. The customer service is an absolute joke and simply asked why I wanted to cancel despite me already explaining before transferring (which apparently will now take 6-14 hours to address, it is very possible I will be billed again by the time this happens). On top of everything, they refuse to let you cancel a renewal 48 hours before it occurs. Why is this? Needless to say, I will never be using this service again. Don't fall for any bait and switch offers that this platform gives you.

review: Just a note to say that hurry up to warn everyone that it‚Äôs time to stop ordering from Uber eats and use the other food apps till a very good one comes along STOP ORDERING FROM UBER EATS. Let‚Äôs create some change to do better and get better! I‚Äôm a single sick mother , ill at the moment but i‚Äôve just managed to do all my christmas shopping , waiting on my next pay and have of 15¬£ in my account so i decided that i will get some food as i was home alone and can hardly get out of bed , I ordered a meal , realise that it was taking long so decided to call the store who was then apologizing that they don‚Äôt have the item so i should cancel the order and get a refund. I did what i was asked and now Uber is refusing to give me a refund of 12¬£ that i was charged. I can see a lot of people suffering from this , I saw that we can sue through small claims court , also i hope that everyone who has this problem does that. Stop ordering from them and check on facebook if you have been through this , There will be a group on how to go about suing them and getting your money plus more back. Hope everyone has a great day and thank you for reading

review: The app is easy to use, and they've got a ton of restaurants on board. I dig that their delivery fees don't break the bank, and I'm all about tracking my munchies in real-time. But, gotta be real, a couple of times my order played hide and seek with some missing items or took the scenic route to my place. The app can be a bit wonky too, throwing in a few tech tantrums. Despite those speed bumps, Uber Eats is still my go-to for lazy, delicious meals. If you're into saving time and not stressing over cooking, I'd give them a thumbs up.

review: They charged me ¬£10 over what their original receipt said. I screenshot this receipt. I agreed to pay 2.49 for delivery and not ¬£10 for a delivery round the corner. Please keep an eye out for your digital receipts and what is actually requested out of your account as this seems to be a common complaint with Uber eats. I have screenshots of both receipts. The customer service then tried to lie to me and say this didn‚Äôt happen and refused to let me provide the screenshots. This company is disgusting and the the fact they blatantly lie and gaslight people into thinking they are wrong is a joke. review: Refusal of refund after no delivery was madeUpdate: Uber Eats promised a refund. As soon as I'll have confirmation of it, I'll update again. As a sign for good will, the review is currently at 3 stars instead of the 1 star from before.Original review:I had ordered a Subway sandwich as I am heavily pregnant, was in a bit of pain and thus not feeling ok to cook. For some reason the website had changed my address so that the delivery driver was at the wrong house. We had a phone conversation for about 11 minutes where I also gave him the new address. He was adamant I come to the site to look for him even though I repeatedly told him I'm not ok for going outside as I was advised not to do so when not feeling ok. He then left my order on the street under the rain where he was. I ended up without dinner.When I contacted customer support, they now said that I'm not eligible for a refund. I find this not ok at all and it will be the last time I ordered (it was the second time in total). If the website had properly shown that the geo location was wrong, I would've corrected it but it didn't show up. If the delivery driver had bothered to type the new address in, everything would've been fine. If I had been physically able meet him at the site, I would have done so. But no. They rather want to keep my money for a service nor done than be kind to an expectant mother in physical pain a few days before the due date.I am disappointed.
name: LI

review: As a customer I don‚Äôt think that their duty ends once the order is delivered. They‚Äôve to make sure that they‚Äôve done it properly. review: Well fortunately I actually got the 100 dollar Uber eats card via Caesers Rewards Sportsbook and Casino for the tier level I achieved and that's what will make this review civil as it will be, had I subsequently purchased the card with my hard earned money I would be absolutely beside myself and I would be attacking the company with every single breath in my body for a number of ridiculous reasons but I didn't pay for it with my cash therefore I would be wasting additional time in my life to do anymore than I am , but I feel like I might be able to help someone else who very well might be oblivious to the deceptive value of the Uber Eats Corp  and there criminal like unchanging of already extremely high prices of fast food , and general on the go meals they offer , but I will focus on one single incident and that was the meal I elected at a popular sub restaurant Firehouse Sub l, as I contemplated my first meal purchase it was clearly obvious that the option of purchase and delivery of the meal was a out of the question, so I was forced to utilize the pickup option only to get the shock of my life within the arena of fast food ordering since I was new to this form of ordering I chose to wait and place my order within the establishment because my attempts were stiffled with each way I tried to make the order complete and it seemed as if I was doing something incorrectly because the price was so much more than that of the establishment had I ordered it as I always had with cash so once at Firehouse it became clear that the ordering process would be much more different than I could've ever imagined, but I had paid nothing for the Uber card and yet I found it difficult to continue with the order once I realized that the pizza meatball sub that I love so much had a surcharge amount additional to its original price and for what I have found to be nothing more than a sheer luxury of having a plastic card with the Uber logo upon it because just days earlier I had this exact same meal of sandwich and soda was roughly $17.42 was now costing me $22.47 it was clear that the privilege of having the opportunity to purchase the meal with the stylish and sleek design of the Uber Eats card was just a mere 5 dollars and 5 cent which ultimately was nothing at all seeing that the card in hand made me feel as if I was the late Anthony Bourdain deep within the üáÆüáπ Italy on a dangerous excursion in search of the perfect slices of pepperoni,  even though I was merely deep within the hills and my very own nightmare of the great state of West Virgina on a cols tuesday night , Uber Eats should be ashamed of themselves but i grant you there anything but!!!!! I will never use them in any situation ever!!

review: I can't believe you guys do this here in Portugal! I can't! You offer something for a price (and this should be honoured!), then the next screen says about half portion and full portion, being the full portion more expensive than the offer. Man, if you offer 8 past√©is for 10 euros, it's 8 past√©is for 10 euros! How come you then charge more for 8 past√©is?! The worst is: you don't even mention, on the second screen, how many past√©is are a half partion and how many are the full one! This is totally confusing and misleading.It doesn't exist! It's illegal! How does the government allows that?!What about the fries? You don't even mention how much (quantity, grams) they are. How can you just sell something without clear information? review: After waiting over an hour for food from a restaurant that is a) fast food and 2)less than 10 minute drive from my home, I contacted uber and they refunded my order. The issue I have is the a hole driver who was waiti by at the restaurant where my food was ready for ages, hoping he would get more pick ups from same place. When I contacted him via text, he ignored my question as to when I can expect collection and why a 10-15minute delay was being added to my delivery time that went from 17:50 to 18:35. When i later text back to say ‚Äòyou keep delaying my order‚Äô his response was ‚Äòyes‚Äô. This thieving sc um knew exactly what he was doing because when I then contacted uber (finally able to get to a human via chat after 10 mins of frustratingly trying) the agent cancelled my order without a fee and at that EXACT moment, my order got collected from the Barnsley peel st KFC. I have no idea if the drivers can track or get notified when you speak to an agent, but its a great coincidence that the moment my order got cancelled he suddenly collects it. I hope he chokes on it and the haram food he steals from customers comes back to find him. I will never use uber eats again ever and have told my family to do same, this incident was on my mums uber account as we were at hers and the kids wanted a treat. review: Financial Fraud! Orderd Mcdonals, Double cheese burger, single cheese burger, 6 mcnuggets meal medium with fries and drink. Only the drink arrived, i have evidence that Mcdonalds only gave the driver 1 bag as it states 1/1 on the bag when there was actually 2 bags, 1 for food, 1 for drink. So all food was missing from order. Reported to Uber Eats who issued a partial refund of ¬£7.58. Bare in mind the total of the order was ¬£16.14. Therefore they expect me to pay ¬£8.56 for a medium fanta orange, price of ¬£2 on the menu on the Uber Eats app, due to someones mistake. Emailed via the app multiple times with very slight and poor responses. Therefore messaged on facebook, to be told that the partial refund is not eligible for adjustment. Very poor customer service. All i request is my money back for a service that I payed for and was not provided. DO NOT USE UBER EATS!!!! Will be publishing all chat screenshots and evidence to all social medial shortly and have also fraised this as fraudulent activity with my banking provider.

review: Muhammad Shabir delivered our McDonald's order on 9 December 23 in Coventry. Not only was he rude and unprofessional, he did not even bring the order to the door claiming he "did not know the address". The flat number was detailed and I provided notes for the driver to tell him where it was. When he called me, he told me he was outside parking. I said okay, my partner will collect it. Hung up. He calls a few minutes later, must've forgot he called because he was bad mouthing  me saying "I don't know the woman must have fell asleep". He reiterated a few minutes later after I repeatedly said hello that he was outside. I clearly said to him I would send my partner out now to him. He was basically hurrying us up when he had been there nothing short of a few minutes. He told me "speak slowly and kindly to me" otherwise he'd cancel my order. What the actual? When my partner went out to collect, he had said to him that they were on time limits with the deliveries and my partner reiterated that you are paid to bring it to our door, not to the car park.This man was rude. I don't know how he's employed. Never had any problems with UberEats before, drivers find my flat very easily no struggle.

review: Missing items then 15 working days with no complaints department. WHAT A JOKE ORDER AT YOUR PERIL. 15 working days equates to 3 weeks. Spread the word and get these clowns shut down.

review: I would have scored zero for the customer service I have just been provided if I could. I was due a refund on the 16th November for a meal being delivered stone cold as their driver was lost for an hour. Refund has not come so rang to chase it. First Lady would not let me explain, kept butting in, even when I asked if I could explain without her butting in. I ended up asking for a manger who was worse than the First Lady. No customer service skills what so ever and no resolution to my refund. Refused to provide any proof the refund was sent, first said contact McDonald‚Äôs shop, then tried advising it is an issue with my bank, now I have to wait 48 hours and then ring back. Unbelievable.

review: I placed an ordered through UBER Eats for my mother today from Arby's Glendale location mind you it was $68 plus a $12 tip. I have never had an issued with Uber Eats until today, the driver named Wynona stated that she was enroute with our order, I go outside to look and of course the order was not where in sight,  plus when I made an attempt to call her, and of course she did not pick up the damn phone. So I contacted Uber Eats Customer Service and the female was very attentive plus she reimburse us with Uber Cash. This is the kicker, this Wynona had the audacity to say that she dropped the food off at an apartment building, first of all, I do not stay in an apartment building and I told that representative that her ass need to be fired, when you decided that you wanted to steal from my mother, now I want to give her a beat down. If you see the name Wynona RUN! Well, I used the Uber cash that was reimbursed to us, and was able to order our food and received the food earlier than expected.

review: I always use Uber eats, I have Uber one and all my friends get their food inspiration from me. For a while I thought I had an Uber eats addiction. HOWEVER, in the last 2-3 weeks I‚Äôve had some serious issues and no direct support‚Ä¶ I ordered something the charge was pending on my bank account but the store-the food- the order disappeared from the Uber eats app. Then I ordered something else a week later and the driver brought me someone else‚Äôs order! My order was ¬£25 and the order received was worth ¬£10 when I told the driver it wasn‚Äôt my order he refused to take the order back and told me to take it up with Uber. I reached out to Uber and they stilllll charged me for the meal I never got!! Not to mention I have dietary restrictions and nothing in the order I could‚Äôve eaten. Now in Uber eats it says my order was ¬£7 but I have screenshots of everything. They‚Äôve scammed me so many times I‚Äôm gonna have to write them off and tell everyone I know about this awful experience 2/10 customer service & my issue is still not resolved to date.

review: The Customer Service Team is absolutely shocking, what has happened in the world for the customer experience not to be at the forefront of a company's agenda. As soon as I ordered my meal this morning little did I know the aggro I would get over the next couple of hours, I would rather have gone hungry if I'd have known. Only half of my food arrived, I presumed after calling the team I would either get it sent to me again (wishful thinking) or get a refund. I got a quarter of my refund owed to me. After ringing back due to their mistake, and after speaking to the manager she could not do anything else for me. They had a guideline to follow and that was that and as they had refunded a small amount back they couldnt do anymore. I asked how was a guideline being followed when the majority of my items had not been delivered and also not refunded. The manager should not have this title!So not only did I lose out on food this morning I also lost money. I would never use this company for anything ever again; that is how shocked I feel with regards to their aftercare. They need to re-think their stratagy in what they are hoping to achieve and complete re-training. All I wanted to do this morning was to eat my breakfast, thank you Uber for ruining the one job you had to do, the main reason for your existence; deliver all of my food.

review: Uber eats driver couldn't be bothered to bring my food to my door and parked at the end of the street, I'm 8 months pregnant and unable to walk outside the house in the icy weather, he leave with my food and uber wouldn't give me a refund for not receiving the order, absolutely disgusting behaviour from a company basically stealing from its customers

review: Ordered a McDonald‚Äôs breakfast at 10:23pm, the local McDonald‚Äôs is less than 10 minutes away. Kept getting notifications of delays (up to 2 hours!!). review: Ordered McDonald‚Äôs and food took 2 hours to arrive. The driver spent over an hour driving around half of Manchester with my food in the car after collecting my order. When order arrived the food was colder than the drinks. Ordered a large meal and the chips weren‚Äôt even half full. The drinks weren‚Äôt the drinks I ordered either. Rip off fees for terrible service

review: I don't know whats going on at the moment with all courier companies for food delivery but it is outrageous. I usually use JE but moved over to UE after awful experiences. The same thing has happened with Uber, I placed an order last night for mcdonalds around 7.20, by 8.45 the order had not even been collected by the courier, i had 4 different drivers assigned and they all cancelled, eventually after a very long wait i got to speak to someone on live chat who cancelled my order and as a 'gesture of goodwill' cancelled the charge (they tried to charge me the full food order to cancel?!) it really is unacceptable, i'm diabetic and i was really needing to eat at this point, almost 9pm and still no food. I had to make a microwave meal in desperation/quickness. They gave me a ¬£5 voucher because my order guarantee time was missed which i've (stupidly) used again this morning on breakfast, thinking, surely, breakfast at 11am is not going to be terribly busy from an independent little shop in town centre, apparently so, i'm still waiting and a driver has not been assigned again (after 3 already cancelling so far) i honestly will never use UE again. estimated delivery time from my order is now 12.45, ridiculous. it's not even the drivers necessarily who are at fault here, something is very very wrong.

review: disgusted with service.used uber for long time, they are getting worse!oredred mcdoanlds through app, forgot the main burger of the meal- Big cheesy. contacted uber recieved a ¬£2 refund as per their guidlines, was left with chips and drink for cost of nearly ¬£10, left with no dinner. As per guidlines thats all the customer service agent would advise- would not use again just eat much cheaper and understanding

review: Ordered ¬£24 KFC on Sunday - my food ended up on the other side of the city.  I cancelled it and was told I would have to pay the delivery charge, but instead I've been charged for the order.  The driver was trying to deliver my order to McDonalds? In the city centre?Bizarre and will never use Ubereats again.  They also make it impossible to contact them to speak to or communicate with a customer service representative....Sharp practice.

Customer service are nice but useless as you get told to write a message in the Help section as they only deal with ongoing order issues! Shocking!

review: I've been a loyal customer of Uber eats since the beginning. Lately, they lack customer appreciation and service. 5 out of 10 of my orders will be incorrect and 5 out of 10 times uber will do absolutely nothing about it. They are a rip off and don't care about their customers anymore!!! My last order was chicken tenders and 4 different sundaes. I only got the chicken fingers. The restaurant closed, so I couldn't even reorder. Even if i was able to reorderyou get slammed with all there fees. It takes forever to find a live agent and when you, they do absolutely nothing to help. I got a "refund" but i am still paying service fees?? For what service??
