review: I received a $20 off promo code in my email. I used it in the app within the time period and it accepted it. Once my order was pushed through and I checked the receipt there was no promo or discount applied at all. I called right away and was instructed to send a screen shot of the promo code from my email to be refunded. I followed up after not hearing back within 48 hours. 4 days later I still had zero response so I called back. I was told there was an issue in their system and the code has been de-activated which is hilarious because the promotion is still being advertised in my app while I type this ...on the phone call I was told that I could not be transfered to a manager or supervisor as non were available since they were all busy helping other users. I offered to wait and said I did not want to get off the phone until I had a refund resolution as I really need the funds back. I was told that the case had to be escalated to a special team and that id hear back in 1-2 days. I've wasted over 3 hours of my time trying to get money back that I am owed. I would have never placed the order if I didn't receive the promo code. UBER EATS SCAMMING PEOPLE. For this 3rd phone call, after being on the phone trying to advocate for myself for over 40 mins I was hung up on by the rep. I cannot contact support via chat in the app or report an issue in the app because anytime I try to it just goes to the help center articles with no other option to contact anyone or submit any issue. I have an android - pixel 6. This is probably the worst customer experience I have ever endured. If you haven't tried Uber eats yet, trust me, don't waste your time and especially money!!!

review: It‚Äôs a great experience to use Uber Eats for the first time. It‚Äôs awesome

review: Fabulous - easy to use and select from different options and especially like the ease of instructions to driver for delivery location. Driver was prompt and very friendly

review: I was charged ¬£111.98p for a meatball ft long meal. I have requested a refund as I was clearly overcharged & have been told they have throughly looked in to this & I was charged correctly.I have now been left short for bills & likely face charges. I will be closing my account when I eventually get my refund from my bank as you crooks are not willing to do the right thing.

review: Great experience! The food was good and still hot. 5 stars!

review: Placed an order at 6.15pm it‚Äôs now 7.40pm and still have 30 min to wait for my order to arrive Uber is asking me to be patient and that I‚Äôll to pay fees if I decide to cancel Looks like my order has been ready to be picked from restaurant for about an hour now - not sure how I‚Äôm supposed to appreciate a pizza that sat somewhere for two hours Just poor service and poor service  customerEdit : Uber eat cancelled the order at 8.15 two hours after I placed the order Then placed another order with another restaurant and was called by Uber in us with the most arrogant customer service demanding that I‚Äôll go downstairs to pick up my order after I explained that I live on my own with an injured leg or I would get charged for it - wow Uber you are taking this to next level 8.49pm still no order delivered
name: Catherine Taha

review: Had a fraudulent $1.2k order placed on my account from Texas (we live in Canada and have NO relations to Texas), and none of the: 'premium' support, Uber support Twitter account or reaching out directly within the app/site helped. I spent OVER a week reiterating the issue with representatives of their team (new ones every time since they never stay connected to support chats/emails/DMs), and was told every single time that I would either: a) get a report filed to get assistance from their technical support team, b) that someone I knew must have been using my account and that it was a miscommunication, or c) that they looked into the order and came to the conclusion that the purchase was 100% valid. The absolute BEST their customer service did was: offer $15 in credit....I mean, honestly. My family has TWO separate uber one accounts and we will be cancelling all and deleting our accounts. If you're ever concerned about security, and how customer services may help you with it -- they won't. I had better luck with the police and my bank.Let me just say, as a final note, I work as a cloud security engineer at a large company and am in AWE at the blatant disregard for security and issues related to fraud/cybersecurity that Uber seems to have as a whole. I should have known since 2018 (when they finally announced their customer account data was hacked in 2017 -- yes, a whole YEAR later) that they would not change their ways.Please reconsider using any Uber apps.
name: EK

review: Easy and fast!!! Plus a lot of different restaurants to choose!!! Awesome!!!
name: AR

review: Ordered through the McDonalds App to be delivered by UberEATS. Twice my order hasn't been delivered despite a notification from McDonalds to say it has. Phoned customer service and got a refund quite easily but no follow up as to what happened to my order. Will not be using uberEATS again.
name: EF

review: Great, fast service!
name: GA

review: Please do yourself a favour and not use UberEats. I ordered a Costa through them, I was given one inedible incorrect item, one missing item and lastly a coffee with no lid and the contents in the bag it came in. I contacted them straight away for them to only offer a refund of half of what I paid. When I asked them to justify these reasons I was told they would investigate it and get back to me but for now half of it had been processed and would be back in my account in the next few days. 1 month later, I never heard back from them and I also never received my refund. I have since tried chasing my refund to be told because I didn't notify them within 48 hours I am not eligible for a refund though I have receipt proof they told me they were refunding half of it as they already did the admin and adjusted it on my order when I originally contacted them on the day I received my order! I have since heard from them by my constant chasing that they will not be adjusting my refund to the full amount though won't explain their reasons and are also now refusing to refund me what they once stated they would. Honestly one of the worst customer service experience I have had. Whenever this gets resolved, if ever, I will be deleting this app and never using them again.

review: Did not receive complete order - what was delivered was delicious
name: KL

review: I'm a first time user and I will be an active user now It was easy to use and had alot of good restaurants andThe delivery service was quick and on time food was hot keep up the good work !!!!!
name: JA

review: I had the worst costumer service I‚Äôve ever experienced with Uber Eats a few days ago. My driver did not take half of my order at the restaurant and did not match the picture of the driver at all. They offered to reimburse the missing meal, which they did, with no regards at all for the security purpose or the HOUR I wasted in the customer service chat being bounced around to FOUR agents, who could not do anything. Three of them simply closed the chat on me without any explanation. I was polite and explained my problem factually. Someone was supposed to get back to me and three days later, still no answer. I canceled my membership and will be ordering with other services from now on.
name: AR

review: PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE USING UBER EATSHorrific! worst service i have ever received - I placed an order for food (¬£23) received a happy meal LOL!.  I advised uber that the food did not arrive and submitted a claim for refund.  Never received the refund, contacted uber every day and was ignored every day.  Contacted on social media... ignored!! I received a message today saying unable to refund as over 48 hours DESPITE CONTACTING THEM EVERYDAY SINCE THE DAY OF THE ORDER.SCAM - PLEASE BEWARE.  I'M NOW BEING IGNORED BY LIVE CHAT AND SOCIAL MEDIAWILL BE CONTACTING TRADING STANDARDS AND CITIZENS ADVICE ALONG WITH THEIR REGULATOR!I WOULD GIVE THEM LESS THAN 1* IF I COULD!!!
name: ST

review: Yesterday, I placed an order via Uber eats for about ‚Ç¨15 and asked that the food delivery be received in person. I got a notification that courier was close by and within seconds got another notification with a picture showing that food delivery was kept on the floor of the street, less than 1m to the entrance of a garbage house. I was utterly shocked and immediately rushed to the entrance of my office to see if i could see the courier or the delivery. As expected, the delivery was NOT there.I filed a complaint to the customer service and they fradulently responded that the courier waited for 10 mins before dropping off the food delivery on the floor of the street right next to a garbage house.I demanded for proof of all delivery notifications with time stamps, but they ignored my request and maintained they would NOT issue a refund.This happened in Berlin, Germany,I know there are people who are also victims of the fradulent activities of Uber eats and i intend to pursue a legal action against this company.Anyone with similar experience and evidence of denial of refund from Uber eats should contact me so we can file a class action suit against this fradulent company!
name: JO

review: I ordered a McDonalds, the stickers on the burgers put a time stamp of 8.53pm. I was alerted by the app that the driver had picked up the meal at 9pm. I had paid the extortionate price for priority delivery (power cut, food off at home). I then watched the driver make multiple stops around my area and then 35 mins later reach my house. My food as you can imagine was stone cold, no saving it and went straight in the bin. I complained and Ubereats refunded me out of a ¬£16.39 bill only ¬£3.28. I am absolutely disgusted and fuming.So in return i spoke to one of the drivers to find out what is going on, why is uber eats failing customers and then not refunding them.The driver told me that Ubereats does not pay a wage people can live on and the place to be is actually Deliveroo, who provide a proper wage. Obviously you are going to deliver the food you get the best pay on first. Since deleting my Uber eats app and changing service, i have had zero issues. I was shocked at the turn around of service. The biggest surprise was also the cost, so much cheaper. Not multiple service charges like uber eats calculating ¬£4-6, before the delivery fee is then added. I still want the rest of my refund! But i am now saving so much money and enjoying hot food via another service. So will never have to deal with this company again.
name: JL

review: Great deals but the worst service you will ever experience.They will not send you back your money even if it is their mistake. review: This is the worst customer support and service experience ive had in recent memory. We wasted 2 hours waiting for food (that was never going to come!) and about 20-40 minutes trying to reach an honestly inexcusably bad customer service. All while in between we were being assured that our order is coming and the uber driver changed so we had to wait just a bit longer! Turns out the store was not even open!!! We ordered food from a store that was closed for the day and they kept telling us the order is waiting to be picked up!!! Forgetting about that, imagine that someone does not have enough money to place a new order. The representative did not even give me time to react as he/she proceeded to refund in 3-5 days. Never even asking if that would be okay or giving any other option such as "add it to my wallet" so that someone without more money can order straight away. But i guess they don't care if you cant afford another order and cant feed your guests!". Later I'm met with this cold apathy where the customer service representative doesn't even allow me to get a word in edgewise and proceeds to quickly try and make an excuse in the end that obviously was a lie (since the store told methey were not even open at the time). I had a friend over from abroad that day and we wasted our evening waiting on food to start a movie and hearing excuses and frankly a refusal to communicate by both the store (who again, turned out to be closed) and Uber. Upon 2 more contacts (no live chat available) I received 2 half assed apathetic appologies each 48 hours later. Not even a coupon or something lol. They will ruin your hangout and wont even care :)

They said to wait 15 days, no refund, called again, said system issue, the will re request it and to wait a further 15 days and if no refund then to contact McDonald's. Still nothing, contacted McDonald's and to be told that it's nothing to do with them as Uber Eats handle the payment. Called Uber Eats back and made a complaint.  Have had no contact with complaint or refund. Will never be order through anything that uses Uber Eats. I hope you actually read this. Any time I call, cannot even understand most of what the call handler is saying.**Currently 13th Jan and still have not heard anything from complaint.  Useless company **

review: Horrendous service. We'd not had a knock at the door and it was 20 mins late so I went to ring up to ask what was happening and saw a text saying it had been delivered. When I went in to the app it showed a pic of a McD's bag next to our shed in the garden. I went and retrieved it from the far end of our back garden. So the lad had walked through our gate into the back garden and rather than walk the further 15 paces or so to the house door they just left it there next to some rubble and breezeblocks. I rang to get a refund and the lad said he couldn't give a refund because it had been delivered on time! Even though he'd not gone anywhere near our house (the place he actually was meant to deliver it to!) and the delivery hadn't been done he said he was unable to refund because if its on time then that makes it fine! He didn't seem to want to allow me to take it further as after 3 times of asking he'd still not told me what the complaints process was and/or how we could discuss this with a manager (at McD's or Uber Eats). I've had loads of deliverys with them before but neither our family or any of our close friends/family will be ordering from them again. The worst thing is I tipped them before the delivery on the app, what a mug! If I could I've have given 0/5 as this was not worthy of a point and their response to my phone call about the delivery makes them even worse. Well they're now going to miss out on a lot of money though being out of order because I'm letting everyone know how poor this is and never to order from Uber Eats.

review: Going to preface this with its not going to be constructiveI ordered through the mcdonalds app which have the food delievered by ubereats. Roll on 45mintues later i recieve a text message saying my order is delievered with a picture of the inside of someones house not a doorway. Fk uber eats and Fk "Clayton G" you absolute scumbag. Useless company, useless staff just useless all round.

review: Really the worst kind of customer service you could possibly have. The app made an error and added an extra item for me that I couldn't remove and this extra item was charged to me. Trying to get this taken care of, to refund a single item, has been a kafkaesque nightmare of the highest order. They have a chat bot first you need to get past which keeps kicking you out of the chat, then when you finally get to a representative they keep giving the same answers and saying they can't do anything, all the while making you wait for ages. Finally after spending close to half an hour of your precious time trying to get an error caused by THEIR app to be fixed, they say they will forward it to a team who will get back to you and close the chat in your face. Almost every 2nd time I make an order with this company I regret it. Then I promise myself I won't order with them again, and usually I last 2-3 months or so of not ordering with them, but then I kind of forget how bad it is and make an order, and then it turns out, it's not just as bad, it's worse each time! They literally somehow manage to make the already bad customer service experience worse each time!

review: If I could give them minus stars I would. Ordered through the McDonald's app for delivery, when the order arrived there was a burger missing from it. Contacted McDonald's who told me that as the order was fulfilled by Uber eats it was them I had to contact. They told me they'd refund for the burger, which they did but the refund was for ¬£2. The burger alone cost just under ¬£6. When told that this wasn't acceptable, the guy on the other end of the line became very hostile and started yelling at my boyfriend who had taken over speaking to him. When asked for a copy of the recording of the call (you're told before they pick up that calls are recorded) we were told that they don't have access to it. Asked to speak to a manager or someone that could deal with the issue and got hung up on. Won't be ordering through them ever again and have deleted the McDonald's app. Absolutely worthless company who are robbing people blind!

review: Terrible customer service/chat had 3 groceries delivery that failed in single day. The tracking in app was useless. Timer keeper going up for over 3 hours. Finally opened up chat/support and they said the order was still on its way will be about 15 minutes. 30 minutes later opened up chat again and then they said there is a issue on store end they have accepted the order.They finally cancelled the orders and transferred me to another agent to see why this has happened then omg they keeper asking for an order number. Looking inside the app and emails no order numbers for the 3 orders I stated that to them numerous times and got the same copy paste answer asking for it . I have had more luck in getting my 5 year old to listen then getting anywhere with Uber support. I then stated I was closing my account and removing the Uber one. They then miraculously found my orders without an order number and offered me a 3 pound voucher for my troubles. By this time al the local grocery places was closed so I told them to close my account as this was unacceptable. They then told me to check on google on how to close my account. Totally unacceptable from Uber eats

review: I tried to do something nice for a friend. She was going through a rough time in her life so I wanted to surprise her with groceries. She lives with her grandmother. Her grandmother, didn‚Äôt know the order was coming. I received a notification on my phone The Uber driver clicked ‚Äúdelivered‚Äù on the ap. I thought the food was delivered. I called the grandma later to check up on the order to ensure she received it and that raccoons didn‚Äôt and she said she didn‚Äôt accept it. Once the Uber driver came to the door the grandma declined the order because she didn‚Äôt know they were meant for her and she didn‚Äôt want to take someone else‚Äôs food. I called Walmart, they said the food was not returned. The Uber chat was useless to say the least. I contacted them, the customer service rep said there‚Äôs no refund and nothing that can be done. I said let me talk to a manager. She said sure I can do that but they‚Äôre going to give you the same information I am. I said, so it‚Äôs a dead end solution you‚Äôre giving me? And she responded yes. She said the Uber driver can take the food if declined and told me to read under the terms and use of Uber eats. I said this can‚Äôt possibly be what‚Äôs written under Uber eats terms? Management later called me and said the same thing. Useless and not helpful. They said the driver tried to contact me. I said there are no missed callsOn my end. They said they had record of the contact being made. I asked for those records. They said that option is not available. I asked to speak to a higher up. They said that option is not available. $98 down the drain. Uber Eats is the leading brand in deliveries. They know this. They knowinglytake advantage and abuse there power. This is middle class people who they‚Äôre knowingly taking advantage off. They have a major surplus of customers. They don‚Äôt care about keeping customers. That was made apparent to me. They made me feel dumb. They were NOT helpful. No refund was provided. The groceries never made it to my friend. They said everything was done on there end correctly and made me feel stupid for trying to do something kind. The app has been deleted.

There are no numbers to ring to speak to REAL people who can help me. We will be taking this up with my bank to open up an investigation into the fraud and unwillingness to help from Uber. I will never use this app again.

review: I will never use Uber eats again. The company are scammers.They use the pending method to scam customers. It is an I.T glitch which they are taking advantage of to fraud customers and gaining double payments for the one transaction. My account was debited on day of transaction which went into pending on my mobile banking app! That reflected on my balance on that day for the goods. Then 5 days later my balance decreases again for the exact same amount. I contacted my bank and they advised me that only one payment has gone out to Uber eats however my remaining balance monies does not reflect that. Please be aware this is a loophole in the system an It glitch which they have cottoned onto Uber eats are fraudulently taking extra money from their customers without their knowledge and without their consent. I will never use the company again and I strongly recommend that no one else should unless they want to fall prey like me and be double charged for the same items. Absolute con company no wonder they are such a wealthy organisation when they are pulling stunts like this.One extremely unhappy customer
name: RR

review: The service is terrible! I have had a number of small issues, but the one that tipped me over the edge was yesterday. Me and my wife had our first child and needed to order some essentials. I placed the order and was informed it would be here within 30 mins. Roughly an hour later, nothing. Called the shop where my order was being collected, they stated the delivery person attempted to call and deliver but bought the shopping back. So I call Uber eats customer service line to be informed that the driver tried contacting me and waited 7 minutes for me. This is not true at all!! I have no missed calls on my mobile device or voice messages. No one pulled up outside our house or knocked! So I had to leave my wife who was still recovering from the birth with our little one and get the essentials. Awful service, awful customer service. This needs to be addressed if they want to keep running. I will not be using this service again and recommend others don‚Äôt either.

review: taking ages to find a driver and when it find it he has 1000 stops before he gets to me with the food , ill never use again

review: After years of giving Ubereats loyal and frequent service, I have finally decided to stop using it cold turkey. I advise avoiding  Ubereats unless you have no other option. They are notoriously bad at refunding legitimate mistakes on their end (ex. missing items, wrong items, and legitimate safety concerns). I have let these things slide over the past year(I really should have stopped using their service months ago).  But this past couple months with mistake after mistake and not being refunded, I was basically throwing money in the trash can. Yesterday was the final straw for me. I chipped a tooth on the food I ordered on the app (there was something hard in the dish that shouldn't have been in it). I had to throw it away and now deal with a chipped tooth which is more time and money and an overall upsetting experience. I explained the situation to Ubereats and they did not refund me one penny for this order that cost me almost 50 bucks that went in the trash and resulted in a chipped tooth. I will no longer use Ubereats. Additionally their customer service is awful, they do not help you with legitimate concerns or do any investigations when it comes to safety, they did not even refund me for this situation at all.

review: Cold and stale food with no help to resolve the issue.

review: Uber Eats Ôøº Can we talk about how poor Uber eats customer service really is on Friday Dec 1. I ordered from Wingstop and immediately contacted them to cancel my order because I got a call from my sister saying that my mom has had a heart attack so I went to cancel it so I can go to her. The first thing I tried to do was just to cancel it in general, but I had to use the chat bot thing in order to do that, so it asked me what are the reasons why that I am canceling my order and I said that I ordered it by mistake because we didn‚Äôt really have an option for saying that you had a family emergency so I just put it as a mistake, but it wouldn‚Äôt take it and the app kept bugging like it was delaying everything so I just ended up asking for a representative to speak to, an actual person they contacted me with was Nanci. Mind you before Nanci even got on the chat. It took an incredibly long time, maybe five minutes before I even got in contact with her and then as I was talking to her explaining as to why I went to cancel my order her replies took at least 2 to 4 minutes now I worked customer service for a very long time and I know how to cancel orders it doesn‚Äôt take 2 to 3 minutes or 2 to 4 minutes to get on the chat and be like hey I can totally do that for you. It doesn‚Äôt take that long so then after I dealt with her and got fed up with Her, she referred me to some team that could further help me but that team response would‚Äôve took 6 to 12 hours. Why would it take 6 to 12 hours for them to cancel our order? By the time that it would take 6 to 12 hours my order would already be there and I wouldn‚Äôt be home, so I called customer service they weren‚Äôt any better. I called them and they had me on hold for 11 to probably 18 minutes and then I got in contact with Nel or Mel I can‚Äôt remember which one but it was one of those two and she put me on hold probably like two or three times and was saying how they can‚Äôt give they can‚Äôt cancel my order because the food was already in route. But if they would‚Äôve canceled it from the gecko, the food would not have been in route, so they purposely delayed and stalled in order for my food to go out so they wouldn‚Äôt have to cancel so they could still get money. So then I asked her if I could speak to her supervisor and she replied how they would say the exact same thing to me as she did and how they wouldn‚Äôt be able to get in contact in contact with me for at least 24 hours so then I asked her for her employee ID number, she said they‚Äôre not allowed to give those out. I think asked for her last name and she wouldn‚Äôt give me it either. Then I heard back from another lady I can‚Äôt remember her name but I do have screenshots of everything so I will be inserting that into the post but she  contacted me and said that she saw that my food has already been delivered and there‚Äôs nothing else they can do.they purposely stall you so they don‚Äôt have to cancel it so we don‚Äôt have to get money back and they want your money. They don‚Äôt care if your food is on the way or not I highly highly highly suggest not ordering from them no more unless you want to get scammed constantly.Again please don‚Äôt order from them! They‚Äôre horrible and only want your money! They don‚Äôt care about customers service at all! Please spread the word!

review: The delivery took 2 hours food wasn't fit for purpose  won't be using uber again or the kfc it came from

review: Absolute con men. Cold food and almost impossible to complain. When I finally got speaking someone, I was advised that the cold food was acceptable as the order had been delivered within an hour (57 minutes). Avoid.

review: I received my exact order by friendly and courteous delivery persons. Awesome!!!!

review: Would give them zero stars if I could, past two hours have been a disgrace, STILL not managed to speak with anyone, uber driver cant find my address, when I've never had a problem with ANY deliveries in the past, decides to phone me, says he's at a shell garage nowhere near me, cancels the order, then I get a message through saying it's been delivered, so I challenged him on it, to which the reply was I cancelled the order and I'm too busy with the next order to sort yours, so instead of doing your damn job and delivering what you're supposed to, you give up, cancel the order and I've had to phone uber eats, no answer obviously because they're crap, tried calling PayPal and cancel transaction they're closed today, tried phoning the mcdonalds I ordered from dunno how many times, again, no answer, all in all a disgusting experience, don't know if I'm even getting a refund, I will be posting this complaint to them directly with the driver details, as this was handled absolutely horrendously, even if you have an issue with address, you rectify it, don't just move onto the next order, absolute joke. Will not be using them or anyone associated with them again, that's for sure. *Update* driver has now blocked my number, I phoned back to say to him to send me a message to confirm he cancelled it because he told me on the phonecall. I will be chasing this up Uber Eats .

review: They never deliver the whole order and when you try to contact support, it takes you to an automated voice message that provides no help. Even though their delivery service providers or partner restaurants screw up the order, Uber takes no responsibility and provides the bare minimum as a refund to customers. There is no mechanism to counter this and get in touch with their customer support to understand what happened and come to a proper resolution. Overall, Uber functions like a scam and their only job is to scam innocent customers out of their money. More than a few times I have placed orders with Uber where I only received a partial delivery and I had to waste additional time in order to get any kind of a resolution. Recently, I ordered a pretty expensive meal and half of the things on the list were not delivered. I tried to get in touch with the Uber delivery person & customer support and there was no response. I got a partial refund, CHF 15 less than what I should have been refunded and when I tried to get additional help on this issue, I was just getting redirected to the page where it said Uber had already refunded me. There is no recourse. This is really a scam guys. It is better to order locally and directly from the restaurants rather than pay Uber. There are absolutely no benefits. All you do is waste your time, money and efforts.

review: courteous and prompt, friendly

review: Missing items worth ¬£10, and take a long time to respond. Planning not to use them again.

review: As the title says, do NOT save your credit card or other payment option in this app.I'm from Spain, somebody got into my account and ordered a 1499$ worth MacBook in San Antonio TX, US in a CostCo.Uber eats didn't ask for any confirmation SMS code or anything. I just realised that this happened because I got an alert from my bank that this movement was charged on my card.I managed to install the app and cancel it on time, so I was lucky.In any case, I think that if all my orders are below 50‚Ç¨ in Spain and you receive an order of 1499$ in the US, this should have raised some alert in Uber eats and should have blocked it out at least asked for some SMS code or similar.Since I managed to cancel it I tried to contact the support team and they didn't reply for one week, and now that they answered, they didn't even read the comments, just replied that they don't see that amount charged... When I already explained that was cancelled on time.From a serious company I would have expect some promise to improve the security, maybe some apologies and even try to find who made this order, as that lesson had to enter a physical address for the delivery.To sum up, beware of keeping any payment method on this app

review: Stick to Deliveroo - way better customer service than Uber eats. Food always arrives cold and they do not give refunds when food arrives cold/ wet/ inedible. Food also takes a very long time to come and they are unable to source drivers at the right times. Don‚Äôt bother using.

review: I waited 2 hours for my food to come just for them to CANCEL it because there was nobody to pick it up. Then when i asked for a refund they said they already gave me $5 credit so they wouldn‚Äôt refund me. I spent $15 and they give me $5 credit and no apologies whatsoever. terrible service.

review: I live in London and this used to be my go-to food delivery, and it was fine (cold food, rude drivers at times). With Supper, the food came hot, well presented (I think their bikes are stabilised so the food doesn't get thrown about), and the driver was SO NICE! While I will continue to use Uber elsewhere in the world, for London I'm never coming back and shall be using Supper. Absolutely no comparison in quality for me.

review: Ordered breakfast and drinks from Costa. Order arrived very late and was cold. After waiting a long time I tried to contact them to cancel the order and the response I got was, ‚Äòyou can cancel if you want but, you will be charged the full amount, what do you want to do‚Äô? Not much option then. The food was that cold the bread was hard. The whole order for ¬£30 went in the bin. Tried to make a complaint but customer service are terrible. In the end I was only refunded ¬£10, why ¬£10 when the order was ¬£30? Disgraceful, will never use again.

review: The level of sheer incompetence of this company is overwhelming. I ordered mcdonalds through uber eats and mcdonalds failed to comply with additions to burgers which were paid for and also just failed to even add a burger into my order. The food arrived cold. I advised Ubereats that despite the food being cold my issue was one the special request and the missing burger and request a refund of these. They responded and advised no refund was forthcoming because apparently I had had adjustments in my orders before. I advised them I tend to order from mcdonalds and their level of incompetence is matched by ubereats, ergo, there were issues with previous orders. Please let me point out happy to pay for what i receive even if it is cold. Not happy to pay for items not received cause I didn‚Äôt receive them. Sounds like fraud. Complained many a time, requested information on their complaints procedure and also their regulatory body and was shut down. In a nutshell, uber eats represents the companies with whom they are partnered to. If mcdonalds does not fulfil my order correctly then I request a refund from ubereats. Ubereats seems to think that they can get away charging for items not received. Shocking. Actually morally disgusting really. You can‚Äôt even get past their low level rubbish customer service to anyone with a slightly larger brain who can better assist. I shall report them to the ICO for failure to comply with my request.

review: We ordered 110 euros worth of food from KFC and the delivery guy (Tariq) stole our food by stating that the food was delivered when in fact it was not. With a few clicks, I found the Uber Eats number, and they refunded the amount to our account . I hope he gets what he deserves.

review: Minus 5 starsUselessTurned up and wouldn‚Äôt give us the delivery? Totally useless

Anyway at least my bank refund the full amount.MAKE SURE YOU REPORT IT TO YOUR BANK FOR REDUND. MY BANK REFUND IT IN 1 HOUR !! review: üò´üò†üò´ Missing Food item from MY MacDonald‚Äôs app delivery order. My MacDonald App states contact Uber For ALL past/delivered orders! Call and on hold for 25mins to then reach a young lady who obviously didn‚Äôt know the job and didn‚Äôt care !! And understand I was NOT rude to her!!  She said item should be refunded in 15 days. What a scam !!!! Oh, and she says repeat the entire process again if I don‚Äôt receive my refund (what about my food. I paid ¬£6.30 fees and delivery charges but the main item was missing and I‚Äôm supposed to pay another ¬£6 for delivery when it‚Äôs NO FAULT OF MINE. You did NOT supply the service I paid for AND THEN‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..UBER CHARGES ME AGAIN - NO REFUND YET TAKES MONEY OUT MY ACCOUNT THAT WASNT AUTHORISED !!! And yes, I sound like a f**king entitled Moron. Makes no sense when the bigger companies just don‚Äôt care. Think I‚Äôll give Just Eat & Deliveroo ago. UberEats‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ Shame On YOU !!! Shame On YOU !!! Shame On YOU !!! Give me my money bank please. Thank you

review: I used to order food often from Uber Eats. It was by far my most used app for food in general. Today they lost themselves a customer.Not only the platform is extremely unreliable and inaccurate on its estimates (ETAs) ‚Äî which means your 20 min order easily becomes 1h ‚Äî but trying to solve an issue with your order is nearly impossible.Customer support is nonexistent. Whatever they call a ‚Äúhelp centre‚Äù takes ages to respond, which means there‚Äôs no addressing an ongoing or recent order. If you‚Äôre lucky enough to get a response, they‚Äôll simply automatically apply whatever solution sounds best for their business rather than for the customer, therefore simply ignoring the problem itself and dismissing your concerns. My order was ridiculously wrong, which I realised as soon as I entered my apartment. I tried reaching out and it took them almost a full day to get back to me. So there was no returning the order, no getting a new order or ordering something else. No option. The only thing I had was a ‚Äúwait for our response‚Äù, which in turn came through an automated solution that I did not agree to. But here‚Äôs the catch: even if you don‚Äôt agree to the solution, they‚Äôll just go ahead and do it anyway because they don‚Äôt care what you think. After that, good luck trying to get anything else done. The case is closed. And so is my account now.

review: I am compelled to share my horrendous experience with Uber Eats, and the lack of customer support has left me utterly frustrated.I recently placed an order through Uber Eats, and to my dismay, the food never arrived. The order mysteriously vanished from my 'past orders' on the app, leaving me in a state of confusion. Desperate for assistance, I embarked on a futile journey to seek support.I tried reaching out through three different phone numbers, three email addresses, and even attempted to navigate the unhelpful website and app. Unfortunately, none of these avenues provided the assistance I needed. The app couldn't locate my order, and every time I managed to connect with a human, I was transferred to a different department, only to have the line abruptly disconnect.Feeling exasperated and out of options, I resorted to creating a Twitter account just to seek support. It is disheartening that I had to resort to such measures to address a simple issue with my order.The most frustrating part of this ordeal is the apparent intentional difficulty Uber imposes on customers seeking a refund. The lack of a streamlined support system and the constant runaround from one department to another is unacceptable.Uber Eats needs to seriously reevaluate its customer support infrastructure to ensure that customers can easily and efficiently resolve issues. No one should have to jump through such hoops just to address a missing order and seek a refund.I sincerely hope Uber Eats takes notice of this review and implements improvements in their customer support system. As it stands, my experience has been nothing short of a nightmare, and I caution others to be wary of relying on Uber Eats for their food deliveries.

review: What made my experience great was the ease of selecting a restaurant and the menu. The restaurant had exactly what I wanted. review: I am writing this complaint review to express my extreme frustration with the difficulty I encountered while trying to reach Uber's customer service. As a loyal customer, I expected a smooth and efficient process, but unfortunately, my recent experience left me feeling incredibly dissatisfied.Firstly, it took an unreasonable amount of time and effort to even get through to a representative. The long wait times and constant automated messages only added to my frustration. When I finally connected with a customer service agent, the language barrier became immediately apparent. The representative I spoke to did not have a strong command of English, which made it incredibly challenging to communicate my issue effectively.The most frustrating part of the conversation was when I had to provide my email address. Despite spelling it out phonetically multiple times, the representative seemed unable to comprehend or accurately record the information. I had to repeat my email address over seven times, which was not only time-consuming but also incredibly inefficient.Furthermore, I am deeply disappointed with Uber's refusal to refund my order. The food I received was stone cold, likely due to being delivered on a bicycle in freezing temperatures. This not only compromised the quality of the meal but also posed a potential health risk.As a customer, I expect to be treated with respect and to receive assistance from knowledgeable representatives who can understand and address my concerns effectively. Unfortunately, this experience with Uber's customer service fell far short of my expectations.I hope that Uber takes this feedback seriously and takes steps to improve their customer service and refund policy. It is essential for a company of their stature to provide efficient and effective support to their customers, especially when issues like food quality and delivery conditions arise.

review: I received a poor quality order and Uber Support Service didn't help me, they just asked same questions many times. It seems like mocking

review: I ordered food for my children and was told 20 - 30 minutes. Then after 30 minutes I learnt my food is going to be an hour which caused me to be alarmed because I had to go to work.I then learnt my the rider whose name was tahir is coming on a bicycle which not only alarmed me but frustrated me too because it dont matter if the food is in an insulated bag its still going to be cold after an hour and half coming on a bike in the freezing cold.I managed to call the rider and he could barely speak English he kept saying " brother brother 25 minutes I coming " then after my delivery time was extended again.I was appalled with uber eats service ok they refunded me but caused alot of aggravation, frustration and disheartening.As a customer I should be given the option if I'm ok with food being delivered on a bicycle. I dont mind a scooter or even a car which it normally comes in I'd wait extra time for it but a bicycle is unacceptable.I can not trust uber eats now because if they got riders on bicycles in the freezing cold I'd rather not order from them.I have no issues with rider he was trying to do his job but its unacceptable coming after 2 hours on a bicycle, a person has family obligations, work obligations etc and if riders are coming on bicycles for uber we'll I'm done using uber.

review: Gave us the wrong order after waiting for ages for it. It wasn't even a meal for myself but for my kids due to that fact I'm dealing with gallstones and in alot of pain that I have to take morphine and just needed to sort out them dinner so ordered them McDonald's for a treat too. I know for a fact the other order wasn't far away but I don't know the address so couldn't swap it back but your driver can't be asked to fix the mistake he made. I'm getting fed up with taken a risk with Uber eats. I get missing items, wrong items or you just don't deliver the food and then put on the app it's been delivered. Sort it out. I don't understand how some of the workers managed to keep their jobs with making so many mistakes. I'm in a terrible amount of pain but now I need to quickly sort out dinner for my kids before bedtime. This is so unfair, waiting around for this. I'm so disappointed. I hope you never get gallstones so can't  experience the pain I'm in. This has putting me in the hospital multiple times due to the pain making feel like I can't breathe. The order we did receive wasn't even enough to feed my 3 kids. Plus it was a one off treat as I find McDonald's too expensive now to get. I'm so disappointed, so disappointed... Do better.

review: They‚Äôre unapologetic thieves who claim they ‚Äúthrive‚Äù off of their policies and zero customer service after not delivering food, all this from rude rep Riya.

review: Great service and experience! Highly recommend

review: If the order is processed as expected and you get your food, great. If things go wrong be prepared to say goodbye to your payment and/or your food. The customer service is non-existent with Uber eats. They make it very difficult to resolve any issues - the agent will stick to a script regardless. The restaurant called me to say they didn't have the item I had ordered. They offered me the choice to order something else or request a refund via Uber eats. I opted for a refund. Mistake. Uber eats refused to engage with me. So be prepared to lose your money if the restaurant doesn't have what you order. The app is deliberately set up to minimise any customer service contact that you can have with them. Each time I sent a message and got a minimal response, I was requested to rate the response but it disappeared when I clicked on it. Possibility that the agent did this to avoid low scores. Avoid at all costs. Just Eat has better scores.
name: SA

review: Delivery was dropped off as estimated, Driver took his time to contact me and delivered food in my hands.
name: XR

review: 2nd time ordering. 1st time waited an hour and a half before driver cancelled. Today driver said they waited 8 minutes for me to answer the door. They didn't. Do these people know how Ring doorbells work? Customer service ignore you. Deliveroo is a far superior service.
name: Sara James

review: I ordered food with Uber Eats, the driver contacted me to tell me that he was in the carpark. I tried to call him to guide him to the right place and he cancelled my call. He then posted my food as ordered on the app and didnt deliver. I contacted Uber who said that he had tried to contact me 5 times and he followed the protocol so i would not get a refund. I explained to them that i had spoken to the driver and was able to provide proof of our text conversation and that i had tried to call him bu thtey werent interested. They refused my refund or a re-order of my food and said that i hadnt spoken to the driver. They refused to give me an email address to send proof of conversation to and refused to escalate my call any further. I then contacted them on their social media pages and they also refused to help and advised me to call the same number that i had been in touch with even after i told them that they were very unhelpful. Absolutely hideous service!! Apparently we should order food for the delivery drivers to eat
name: Tina Waterfall

review: Absolutely shocking service! IF YOU AN ISSUE FORGET IT... THEY DON'T WANT TO KNOW! Ordered my food, paid over ¬£50 driver got lost, I spent 10 minuets trying to help him find me, he said I'd gone over my 7 minuets so he had to go to his next drop and basically I had to forfeit my food! Despite my proof showing I had the driver on the phone for 10 minuets their support centre have said it's my fault and I won't get a refund! Tried to contact customer support through facebook and pretty sure I was communicating with a robot! So now I am ¬£50 down and they wont do 'jot' about it! Stick to Just Eat or Deliveroo......
name: SH

review: Impossible to make a complaint. McDonalds blames UberEats, UberEats doesn't show my order when I log in because it was placed via McDonalds App so they deny all responsibility. Drinks arrived half full in a soaked bag. Food was stone cold. Dog ended up eating it. Made a complaint but I doubt I will get anywhere because they have made it impossible to know who is accountable. Better off just going and getting it yourself, not worth the hassle or the rink.
name: SI

review: I ordered through the McDonalds App and these stupid address "use current location" wouldn't allow me to enter my full address. I assumed I would be able to input my address at the end. However, the order was placed and it was delivering to a road name, in the wrong place from the wrong restaurant. Can you call Uber eats to fix this?? No you cant!! The man on the phone "didn't understand" why i was calling them when I told them the delivery address was completely wrong. Then tried to blame me for entering it incorrectly when I didn't even get to enter it! God knows what will happen now.
name: JO

review: Good service
name: MB

review: Everytime I order a McDonald's something is always missing, got another order last night and reported missing items and I got a response saying we have noticed on the last few occasions you have reported missing items and to take a picture, how can I possibly take a picture of something that is not there
name: DA

review: Great service and the App is very efficient kept me updated all the way to delivery. Will definitely be using it in the future.
name: JO

review: If your order is wrong, cold, missing etc then don't expect it to be replaced or refunded. they are crooks who dont reply or fix issues on orders and the restaurant (hells pizza) doesn't want to help either. Hells Pizza made the mistake on the order but forces you to go through uber, which doesnt reply to messages. You are left with no option but to find dinner elsewhere and waste your time arguing for a refund days later.

review: I made a scheduled order for 12.30 pm today. I made this order before 11.30 am. The order was cancelled but I was charged for the order as well as a tip. I called Three Kings Takeaway and they never received the order. They told me to call Uber Eats.I contacted Uber eats chat and spoke with:Puneet, Mahak, Sanjeev, Vijay and Sanjeev. They either transferred me to another agent or said I had to wait 5-10 business days for my money back. They did not find out why my order was cancelled or offer another order to be sent out. I wanted help with sending the screenshot to them, they didn't help with that. They just sent a message that my query would be dealt with in 6-12 hours. How is that helpful? I am so furious with Uber eats! Customer service should be accessible and efficient. People are waiting for orders. To have no explanation and resolution to a cancelled order is unheard of. The worst service ever!
name: Personal Care Tips Vae Boyce

review: My partner ordered food from The Famished Wolf in Mount Eliza. The app said the store closes at 9pm. We got a notification at around 8.30 to say the food was ready. We drove to the store only to find that it was closed. We then proceeded to contact Uber eats to let them know that we were charged for our food without ever receiving it and they proceeded to say, ‚ÄúThank you for reaching out to support regarding your missing order refund request.We have reviewed all available information relating to this order including order fulfillment details and have determined that, in this case, your order is not eligible for a refund based on the information that you have provided.If you have any additional information to support your claim, please share this with us so that we may take this into account in a further review. If sending a photo, please send a single image containing all items delivered and the order receipt.Thank you for your understanding.Now following this the next day we contacted the store and they honoured our order and provided us the food the following day which was very nice of them to do so but Ubereats, pick your game up. Very very poor customer service.
name: PE

review: Delivered as promised by a very friendly delivery person who let us know when he arrived.  The 4 digit code is a great idea.
name: Gary McClain

review: I ordered McDonald‚Äôs about an hour ago through Uber eats. I‚Äôve been sat in the living waiting for about 30 minutes waiting for my order to arrive. Only to find out that the driver didn‚Äôt knock at the door nor did he ring the doorbell. He took a picture of the food on the street which wasn‚Äôt near my house and said he had arrived which I later found. He apparently waited for 10 minutes but tried to contact us. The number Uber had was out of service as I recently had to change my number (The driver who rang that number would‚Äôve heard that it had been disconnected/ out of service) absolutely unbelievable. Now I tried to contact Uber using the app but they are saying I am not eligible for a refund?!! The driver couldn‚Äôt even do his job or bother to even get out of his car and come to the door. The instructions said to leave the delivery outside my door if i don‚Äôt answer NOT ON THE STREET!! ABSOLUTELY UNBELIEVABLE AND UNPROFESSIONAL!

review: Promt, precise, professional
name: AB

review: Worst company for deliveries ever! I waited for 1.5 hours for my food, arrived cold because the driver was incompetent and drove to one end to the city and then back to me. Their customer support is worse. No accountability or apology. I am now wanting to cancel and order and they said they will charge me the full fee. Use Deliveroo! They are much better! Uber eats is the worst customer service in history!
name: ES

review: Terrible keep saying my account not eligible for refund an this the second time my order was cancelled by the restaurant or delivery driver an now I‚Äôm just ass out they took my money no food or anything I cannot believe this ü§¨
name: Shyanne White

review: Never again spent ¬£20 for 2 meals and I ended up with 1 burger and bloody two chips what a rip off. Can‚Äôt believe it can‚Äôt even get a refund. Bad customer service and money grabbing tramps

review: Rather starve than try to deal with uber eats again.

review: Order arrived quicker than expected, good communication about progress of order, would use again!

review: Aside from a wonderful delivery person, the food being amazing, my only negative criticism is the inaccuracy of inputting my address. The app will not use ‚Äúmy location‚Äù to accurately pinpoint where I am and when I enter manually, it does not recognize. The area is not new, it recognizes the house, but not the physical address.

review: I ordered Five Guys through Uber Eats.Order never arrived.I could see on the map he went to the WRONG ADDRESS.Tried calling him on his mobile and got recorded message.To add insult to injury, I checked my bank statement and saw that I was charged TWICE - but received nothing!¬£78 FOR 2 BURGERS THAT WERE NEVER DELIVEREDWont be using UberEats again.

review: Truly unreliable service. This is only the third review I have written on a company. The other two additional reviews were complimentary. The last few orders I have placed with Uber eats have taken over an hour to receive and the delivery fee is outrageous. Unfortunately I cannot leave my office for lunch and was not prepared for lunch the last few weeks. I am amazed at the fees being charged and the long wait time for delivery. There is no support from the company and you have no way of knowing the driver is delivering to another town before you receive your order

review: This was my first Uber Eats order, and it was great! It was fast, my order was correct, and the driver was very nice.
name: JE

review: No customer service whatsover. Their modus operandi is to ignore the customer. No help, no taking responsibility! Rubbish service to say the least
name: RR

review: Efficient to navigate. Good service and food.
name: TG

review: Never had a problem with Uber eats. However as a loyal customer I expected some respect. I ordered an order that never came, despite notifications being on calling the delivery driver 7 times and attaching it when I asked for help on the app what I got is the delivery driver followed the policy but not one call I received from the driver. This is not how you treat a loyal customer and this is certainly last time I will be ordering from Uber eats. What‚Äôs worse the driver sends a picture of the food but not where he placed it or no decency to message and say I left it in this place.

review: Mcdonalds food arrived cold Delivery driver doing multiple delivery's at once . Took 35 minutes from dispatch ,(1hr 5 mins from order )to arrive even though its only 2 mins travel in car. Refused refund as delivered 1 minute before refund could be given.

review: My Uber eats driver dropped my food off at some random location. And then closed the order so I couldn‚Äôt contact him. I had Uber one. Canceled and deleted the app.

review: Received drinks only and no food. Had to drive to the restaurant to collect my food and when I contacted customer services they told me I could not get the delivery charges or tip refunded. Driver was extremely unhelpful and would not go back for the food. Will not be using again.

review: You disappointed me because you give a promotion 45$ works for three times for new accounts. It worked just once.

review: Placed an order with McDonalds app which is fulfilled by Uber eats. 3 items were missing so called customer service line (happens occasionally, in which case I call for a refund). When asked for a complaints contact, told there was no one else I could contact. Not good enough, money has been taken but items have not been provided. Will not be ordering again to avoid being robbed further!

review: Ordered a delivery from McDonald's through uber, missing items,totalling ¬£10,plus food freezing cold and just chucked in bag,phoned uber,said they would issue a refund within 15 days,just received it¬£4,what a joke.

review: First time ordering a delivery from Macdonalds Cumbernauld G67 using uber eats. Food arrived quick . Contacted Macdonalds to complain and was fobbed off and told to contact Uber eats. After an hour I got ¬£1.37 refunded  .Some delivery driver had his hands in my Food and Macdonalds and Uber are not interested . Never again will I use UberEats

review: The delivery was ok but tipping the driver not good. I didn‚Äôt select nothing but u still took 6,25¬£ for tipping the driver. Till when I realised it was too late. Not happy at all

review: I used Uber eats for a delivery when I was out of town in a hotel. My order was wrong and I had no utensils to eat with. I called the restaurant straight away as they are the ones who messed up my order. They told me to call back the next day to speak with a manager about my refund as it was about to close. When I finally got a hold of him he stated I had to get a refund from Uber eats as that‚Äôs who I paid and they would go to the restaurant. I then started contacting them and they didn‚Äôt want to refund my order. They only refunded me part of what was missing and then told me I was past the refund time. I explained I was in contact with the restaurant at first as I thought they were who messed up my order but then I did contact Uber eats. And if I was past the refund time why did they refund $12 of the $50 order then. That was an insult. I won‚Äôt use Uber eats again. Not a reputable company at all.
name: Crystal Mitchell

review: I am compelled to leave this one-star review after a truly frustrating experience with Uber Eats. After placing an order, our delivery person spent 30 minutes unsuccessfully searching for our building. Despite my attempts to assist through phone calls and in-app messaging, she left without delivering our meal. To add insult to injury, when I cancelled the order due to this confusion, Uber Eats retained my payment instead of issuing a refund. My efforts to explain the situation fell on deaf ears as their customer service showed a complete lack of empathy and understanding. This experience not only left us without dinner but unfairly out of pocket too. I am extremely disappointed and will think twice before using Uber Eats again.
name: Simone Luciani

review: Ordered ¬£25 worth of food. It was delivered stone cold and was inedible. Mcdonalds just blames UberEats.... UberEats just blames Mcdonalds. Issue never got resolved and I'm still ¬£25 out of pocket. Never again will I use this shambolic restaurant or delivery service.
name: JA

review: I received my order on time and I was kept informed regarding the progress of my order. My battery was low and I waited for my order outside.This is my first time getting a driver that handed me my order with a smile and was humble and polite.I was quite impressed and it obviously shows that Uber has the best of everything.Thank you for an amazing service .
name: CS

review: Garbage. Driver couldn‚Äôt find my house, didn‚Äôt get my food but won‚Äôt refund my money. Called their helpline and spoke to rude staff who put the phone down. Won‚Äôt be using again.
name: GB

review: First time I've used Uber Eats and I was very impressed by the choices available and speed of delivery. It opens up a much wider choice and range of places to order from, and our food was delivered really quickly by a very helpful driver. It arrived in perfect condition and the food was delicious. I will definitely be using again.
name: KA

review: Driver turned up in time while food was still hot
name: MW

review: Pretty much easy as it can be. I totally want to use it more often..
name: EA

review: ABSOLUTE SCUMBAGS !!! BRING MY FOOD COLD TAKE FOREVER TO BRING it , HALF MY ORDER MISSING AND THEY DONT EVEN REFUND IT ! WILL be CONTACTING MY BANK AND GETTING A FULL REFUND TRUST ME SCAMMING B@st@rds !!!

review: I was amazed that UberEats could do the shopping for me. They stopped at Vons and got what I wanted. The driver was courteous, upbeat and cheerful making sure I could handle the items since I was wheelchair bound. UberEats is a great service that I will use again.
name: JO

review: Love Uber eats. Amazing
name: CA

review: Been having consistent issues with things missing from orders recently. Have been using Uber Eats exclusively as my takeaway delivery service the past 2 years. Therefore, I'm officially using Deliveroo instead now and haven't had any issues.

review: Uber Eats are absolutely useless, not only do they change the delivery times of your order so many times you lose track. They also don't deliver your order! And yet they mark as delivered. Ordered KFC and was never delivered, although they sent a confirmation email to say it was! Useless service will not use again

review: Crap!!! Scam artists. Don't be fooled by there ¬£10 introductory offers, they will sting you with service fees and delivery charges. An absolute sham of a company. review: Very helpful support, clear and easy to understand.

review: Very professional Lymarie. Arrive on time! Meal was great! Send this message to Lymarie.

review: Really Impressed all the way thru; from ease of placing order, to check out to delivery. First time  but Definitely not the last! New favorite option!! Thanks

review: Everything really safe and fast.

review: One of the worst places to order anything from could be waiting for hours while the driver drop of next deliveries and pick up other orders by the time you get your food is all soggy and cold I won‚Äôt accept it and send it back simple

review: Terrible, i cannot change my name unless i upload my id and bank statements, i do not deliver or drive with uber i am a customer, i set my name to what i use online not knowing the drivers who deliver my food will see it and id me by it, the fact i have to register to deliver with uber to change my name is appalling i asked why i cannot change it without these, the support ignored me and closed the case

review: Yeah, I've been scammed.Restaurant took my order and I had the app open to track it. 10 minutes later they said they couldn't deliver. Can't even leave a review of the restaurant to warn people because the Uber Eats app shows no record of my placing any order. Avoid being scammed like me and don't use Uber Eats

review: The timing of the delivery was great, however, the amount I was charged was pricey. At more than $17 for a meal that was a little over $15... And that was with a 50% discount...I won't be using Uber again, unless I'm in desperate need of food.

review: What a Joke of a company! Wife and I are staying in a Premier Inn, Great Yarmouth. We are both profoundly Deaf so cannot telephone order a meal like most people. Around we go in multiple circles with the payment palaver. Uber needed to verify our bank account which is fair enough.... They took two payments amounting to ¬£1.02 but failed to go further and make our food order acceptable. Absolutely NO contact number or email address or anywhere to try get back out ¬£1.02 or for food order to go ahead... Don't use this company the hassle is stressful and not worth it.

review: UberEats has become very unreliable; food is missing, food is spilled, too late, the food is cold. Now you have to pay additionally, if you want to have your food delivered directly. They are squeezing our more money, but the services are deteriorating.
name: WO

review: The company allows drivers to pick up multiple orders and unless you are first drop your food WILL arrive stone cold. when you report that your food is cold 9 times out of ten then do nothing about it or they give you a partial refund. if i wanted cold food i would order a salad. on top of that if you choose to pay the extra for priority your driver will then sit there and wait for another order so your food sits there getting cold regardless. cut the shut and stop priority and just get people their hot food that they've overpaid for anyway
name: CM

review: Delivery was timely.In ordering, I wasn't sure if my order was proceeding.Also, was not given confirmation of my payment- had to check my bank records.Great to get groceries, as Woolworths and Coles online shopping had closed for the day.Overall a good experience.
name: BC

review: Abysmal. I ordered some food from my local McDonald's on Saturday the 25/11 and received a shopping bag from Co-Op. The amount I spent at McDonald's was ¬£25.08 and what I received in the Co-Op bag was ¬£10.40, so not even monetary similarity. The pictorial evidence I was supplied with was the courier holding up a co-op bag in front of my house (not in any way similar to a McDonalds) but this clearly isn't enough to warrant a refund from Uber. I spent over an hour trying to negotiate the customer services lines with calls that would just go round in circles regarding my complaints history all of which have been made within reason, i.e. past incorrect orders.So in effect, I'm being penalised for the ineptness of the local couriers.
name: MD

review: Dont bother with Uber Eats anymore.Just tryed to get a Philadelphia Cheese Stack burger refunded that was missing from my order on 21st November that costs about ¬£5.99 and after 20 minutes on the phone they say they can only refund me ¬£2 saying it was the portion of the refund when everyone knows a missing Philadelphia Cheese Stack burger costs more than ¬£2??So Macdonalds in Selby mess up my order,Uber who i use regularly dont want to refund me for the missing item and guess what i wont be using Uber again for anything all over a ¬£5.99 refund.You couldnt make it up.The customer service agents and customer service manager were absolutely shocking.Was it my fault i didnt get what i ordered.My Uber Account is getting closed now.
name: DA

review: Become a member they say. Save time and money they say. Then as a reward for customer loyalty the company refuses to address a concern regarding, and I quote, You account is linked to 10 to 15 devices.". Which by the way is a violation of the use agreement. Kindly explain how the company cannot be concerned about a customers account security when customer repeatedly states he/she utilizes ONLY ONE (1) device to connect to their account.Thanks for they half off a yearly membership but I have cancelled and deleted my account.

review: Working graveyard...I've always had to put off eating an actual meal for dinner until my shift was done.  Even then,  id still have to prep, cook and then clean up. The convenience of having the UberEats app helps me on those days when I'm just too exhausted to do any of that rigmarole.

review: Only giving one star as its not possible to leave zero.food cold, over an hour to deliver from time on receipt. Missing one item completely and three other items a very small portion almost as if eaten on way.Customer service absolutely no help.Avoid at all cost.

review: Order delivered was missing items and there refusing to give refund, absolute disgusting customer service I'll never use this shiiit show of a company again üëé

review: Worst customer service experience, liars!I placed an order which had buy one get one free promotion going on. Immediately after placing the order, I realized the promotion did not apply and I was overcharged. I called the restaurant and they said they cannot do anything. I contacted Uber eats support, who on chat asked for screenshots, and when provided, said price will be adjusted and I should wait. The charge finalized and price was not adjusted. I contacted them again, they told me they cannot do anything because I contacted them after 48 hours! I explained multiple times that I had contacted immediately and was told to wait and now I am being told that I should have contacted immediately. After getting same message again, the chat was ended by Uber. It is not about the miniscule charge of extra 10 dollars but a matter of principle, they are a money greedy company with shady customer service practices. Going to delete this app and switch to grubhub.

review: Food was cold hash brown was soggy coffee cold also! I asked for redelivery it was denied and refund that was also denied! The delivery guy went to the wrong apartment because he said ‚Äú HE said ‚ÄúGOT LOST AND WAS CONFUSED ‚Äú!  Here‚Äôs a picture of the food that I didn‚Äôt eat for breakfast! DOORDASH IS THE BESTEST! They go out their way to SATISFY THEIR CUSTOMERS! I WILL NOT USE UBER EATS AGAIN AND I DONT CARE WHAT PROMOS THEY HAVE!
name: DM

review: This review is based on my first Uber restaurant delivery. I found the app easy to use, the ETA was accurate and the driver was professional and courteous, (and his vehicle was clean). It was a nice touch that I could track the driver. I will definitely use UberEats in the future.

review: Food arrived over an hour late and when it did turn up, was stone cold. Tried to raise a complaint with ubereats and spoke with 7 different agents on online support. review: Waited an hour and a half for food, never showed up  changed drivers 4 times just to be told that uber cancelled our order and there is nothing we can do

review: I would give a zero star if that was possible. I received the worst service today from a total psyco who happened to be a customer service agent. What a shame that a company like this employs untrained and rude agent like the one I spoke with tonight.
name: DU

review: Food arrived on time and in good condition.
name: SS

review: Uber Eats has become unreliable.  You can wait 45 minutes for your order and it‚Äôll be canceled at the last minute. Reaching a live agent is difficult and they will end the chat without providing any satisfactory answers. It‚Äôs a roll of the dice on whether you‚Äôll get your order.
name: CJ Sumlin

review: Delivery was great but to many added fees in addition to the delivery charge. I won't use UberEATS again.

review: Was delivered with care and nothing was damaged.

review: Found one of my fav restaurants and ordered my fav dishes, delivered within minutes and enjoyed it in the comfort of home.

review: Easy to use and quick service
name: ZE

review: Amazing experience and incredible service. Quick & easy steps in receiving a delicious meal.
name: AR

review: Good was so so wonderful!!! I couldn't eat it fast enough. Delivery right on time and food was excellent temperature as well.
name: TB

review: Uber and UberEats has been great, delivering in a manner that's been nothing but professional. Timely and courteous deliveries and rides from excellent drivers.
name: BB

review: Disgraceful company! Food takes ages and arrives inedible yet won‚Äôt refund even though food has gone in the bin! App deleted won‚Äôt be using ever again.
name: EA

review: Ordered a ¬£28 mc delivery through the McDonald's app in the evening then proceeded to wait for confirmation of delivery driver on route,  when he was nearing our home he messaged to say he couldn't find our address even though I could see him parked at the end of our street I messaged back to state this fact at which point he drove off towards the direction of the McDonald's he came from , I sent a message asking why he was driving back without delivering our order that was already 35 minutes late , then to our surprise he marked the order as delivered so we rang uber eats to be told sorry about the inconvenience and we would be refunded in 5 - 7 days , 15 minutes after this phone call just by chance I caught the said driver trying to place the 55 minute late "stone cold"  order in our front porch without even trying to knock as if to say it was there all along at which point I confronted the young man who apologised and took the order back with him that can be confirmed with our neighbours ring doorbell , just contacted uber eats again as no refund has been received to be told it takes 15 days as standard for a refund?? Yes seriously 15 days !!! I've been in customer services for 12 years and this is a world record time for a refund that I congratulate uber eats for receiving this ww honour but what a appalling service throughout the whole process I mean its not like delivering food is a new idea is it .... takeaways have been performing this service for 30 years so I'm flabbergasted that a huge delivery company can't get a order right as can be seen by their seriously low trust pilot score , anyway sorry for the rant but they are awful in every way shape and form , thanks for reading DG
name: DGuk

review: I have been a loyal paying customer to Uber Eats for several years & they have been so unprofessional with their basic generic customer responses in my most recent order issue that I raised with them.I placed an order & there was a missing item so I raised it with them via their help chat within the app, I was then attacked for raising similar issues with previous orders (due to those restaurants making errors either missing / wrong / damaged items - that is not on me that‚Äôs on them for not doing their job properly! Also my current order issues have nothing to do with any previous order issues!)I was then told they wouldn‚Äôt refund the missing item because I have multiple duplicate accounts claiming promos for new customers which I have never done.Half the time their promos don‚Äôt apply to the restaurants I use!At this point the meal was already ruined because the fries were missing from the meal deal, I no longer care about the refund‚Ä¶ I am now concerned that someone has created multiple accounts in my name & why have I never been notified of this until now when I have been a loyal paying customer for several years?!They‚Äôre happy to take my money with additional service & delivery fees on top which I don‚Äôt mind paying if they actually deliver what I ordered!I only have one Uber Eats account in my name, email address, home address, phone number & payment details so why are they allowing others to get away with creating multiple accounts in another person‚Äôs name then asking me to write to them with details of said duplicate accounts so they can delete them from the system?! I didn‚Äôt create them so how on earth can I email you details of them to delete them?! Absolutely ridiculous! This should‚Äôve been raised initially when it occurred so they could close accounts fraudulently using another customer‚Äôs name / details!I even tried to speak with Uber UK Support on Twitter & they were just as useless giving generic robotic responses!They‚Äôre not even listening to the issues the customer is raising & now they seemingly no longer care about duplicate accounts they mentioned to me as they‚Äôre claiming their team has ‚Äúresolved the issue‚Äù‚Ä¶ NO THEY HAVE NOT!!!They didn‚Äôt refund the missing item & are not clarifying details about these so-called ‚Äúmultiple duplicate accounts‚Äù in my name.You can‚Äôt even contact them by phone to speak to someone who can listen & understand what the issues are to even begin resolving them! It‚Äôs so messed up‚Ä¶ take your money & service elsewhere!You can‚Äôt blame customers for the failures of the restaurants who use your service, yes mistakes happen & things get forgotten or damaged etc (human error), but it happens too frequently with restaurants & Uber Eats don‚Äôt pull them up on it & instead attack their paying customers.They never used to be like this if there was an issue.If I was to dine in a restaurant & they messed up the order I would‚Äôve obviously be refunded so when I order a takeout the restaurants / Uber Eats should do the same. Restaurants should be held accountable if they mess up an order that is paid for. Don‚Äôt blame the customer because staff aren‚Äôt doing their job properly. Disgusting unprofessional behaviour!Update:They replied 3 days later to apologise & as a ‚Äúgoodwill gesture‚Äù gave a full refund.I didn‚Äôt ask for a full refund, I only wanted a refund for the missing item I was reporting. It‚Äôs the principle of the matter. I guess due to the situation being handled so badly they decided to give a full refund which I appreciate.However, when I tried to enquire further about those so-called ‚Äúmultiple duplicate accounts‚Äù I just got generic responses again & no further details. I assume they made an error & I‚Äôm getting nowhere with their support team to find out if they actually exist or not.Overall it‚Äôs not a good experience & just made me worry if my personal details were being fraudulently used by others.

review: I recently placed an order with Amigos Feltham through Uber Eats, and unfortunately, my experience was quite disappointing. The delivery was not only extremely late but also arrived cold, prompting me to have to use the microwave to heat up my food. To add to the frustration, the milkshake included in the order had spilled inside the bag.Upon contacting Uber and providing photographic evidence of the issues, the response I received was less than satisfactory: "We will be unable to provide a refund on this occasion. We understand that these issues do arise on occasion, but not often at this regularity."I'm puzzled by the term "regularity" used here, and frankly, I don't comprehend Uber's decision. In a highly competitive food delivery industry where numerous alternatives exist, it's essential for platforms to prioritize customer satisfaction. If this is the level of service and understanding offered by Uber, it's crucial for them to recognize that customers wield significant influence. Our choices as consumers shape the success of platforms, and when service falls short, we have the power to choose alternatives that prioritize our experience. The competitive landscape is vast, and as customers, we should expect and demand better.For the record Amigos is amazing and will not lose my custom. I cant say the same for Uber Eats.
