review: Company marks up prices of items to cover their 30% cut, often there are significant problems with orders that aren't properly addressed or even rectified, it is not worth ordering even with the 40% off promos because the 40% will only cover the taxes by the end of the minimum fee and you will most likely receive inedible or mishandled food/products in return, even when you do manage to get your order rectified and in some cases refunded, they usually don't even consider how much it impacted your experience(ex. You pay 24$+tip after charges for a subway meal but only the Sub was wrong etc, you will receive a computers determination of the original Sub price refunded before any charges, tips or anything. Which will most likely look something like 9.50$ for your 6-inch Sub. Leaving you out 15$+tip for some chips/cookies and a 500ml drink.) As close as you can come to highway robbery in consumers terms, highly recommend any other app as even food that is ready to be picked up will sit there while the driver is just outside on his phone(illegal while driving btw but what else are you supposed to do all day, your job?) or smoking in/just outside his car, rarely will they ever have proper food delivery bags anymore as uber can't exactly enforce it(or they choose not to) and your food is often just thrown somewhere in their car(a lot of the times on the floor because they take multiple orders and cram em all in there, which i want to state a lot of these orders would even be claimed by multiple accounts etc so a lot of the time your driver would drive right past you delivering your order just to drive across and deliver to a completely different address he had picked an order up for from a completely different restaurant in a different account, upon pointing this out tp Uber in their earlier stages, the support team with their tools would just say 'yea, sorry. We've helped direct the driver, he'll be there soon' as if he was lost or something and now your food is on the other side of the city in someones car dying(food literally dies it's the whole point of efficient service and standards) they don't care though because the restaurant usually gets stuck with the bill(thanks uber, really helping out small businesses with all the money you made during the pandemic and that 30% cut you take from them). People really don't realize how bad this is for restaurants and how it impacts the market(things we consume etc)
name: White Noise Z-White_Noise-Z

review: I‚Äôve been a customer of uber eats for awhile now. The beginning was great, pandemic times. They had their A game. Now- Zero stars if I could leave that. They give me a weekly code of 5 orders worth $40 spent for 40% off. That is a weekly basis promo. I barely order due to their customer service. I don‚Äôt use up all those 40% on a weekly basis. My August & September order is totalling to 1 each month and 2 in October. Uber is our last resort if Door dash isn‚Äôt available. I feel like Door dash is well managed than Uber. Anyways, I called today and was told the there was a breach, and I asked how was it breached? He said that the promo code was uber used or over used, then why send it to customers then? It‚Äôs on the fine print, sure! But why bother send it out if you will take it back? Uber eats doesn‚Äôt know how to look after their customers. Use Skip or Door Dash because Uber customer service will just annoy you!

review: UPDATE: UberEats now refusing to refund this order saying the driver tried contacting me. I have checked my details are correct - they are, and also can show no missed calls, and door cam footage of my husband waiting outside to receive a delivery that never arrived to our address. COMPLAINTI placed an order with a local restaurant this evening and the delivery address was incorrect (it had defaulted to the restaurant's address for delivery which should have been clear to any one that it was incorrect!) I was unable to change the address by either talking to the restaurant or attempting to contact one of the 3 different drivers who showed up on the app; when I was finally confirmed a driver, I sent him a text message as he never picked up his phone; it kept going to voicemail. Driver never contacted me despite me leaving 2 voice mail messages and a text (he replied to a text to say he was going to deliver to the address I sent him, he did not); I now have a message saying it was delivered - however it has not been delivered. Also, it is impossible to get a hold of a live rep; I had to call the restaurant support line to eventually get connected to a rep, with whom I was on hold for 15mins and then he hung up - he had all my details yet never reached out to me to ensure my issue was taken care of. That is an extremely poor customer experience.How this situation was never resolved despite me trying to get in touch with Uber Eat's customer service, who then cut me off when I was trying to resolve it on the phone, or following the steps on the app. Fortunately the restaurant is amazing, and when we called them, they rushed an order through which we ended up picking up - a hassle we were trying to avoid as we're both unwell. Turns out, even the restaurant has issues with Uber and will be stopping working with them.

review: Once a driver gave my food for 4 people to another drop he had before mine which was for 1 person. The drivers name is Nilima Indrajeetbhai. A female. I called the restaurant and they notified me that a male collected my order. So now uber eats are promoting fraud and stealing.

review: My food took over an hour to arrive, the shop said they cooked it almost an hour ago and had been sitting there the whole time. I don‚Äôt want to pay for fish that has been sitting a room temperature for an hour. Oliver eats will not help. I will not be using this app ever again

review: This is a review after months of being an UberOne member, and being frustrated not once, twice, or three times. But every other order I've had over the last few months. I consistently am unable to communicate with my driver. I leave extremely clear delivery instructions, and for the drivers who speak my language, it goes off great. For those (every other) who do not, I end up needing to cancel my order completely. Every time I call them (as directed by uber eats) they will pick up and say "No english sorry." I live in a big city apartment and there are directions necessary to find me. I don't order uber eats to spend an hour trying to find my food, and to be completely unable to communicate with my drivers is unacceptable. Please provide your drivers an AI tool that can translate directions. Otherwise, it's a service I have stopped using.Additionally, every time I reach out to suport about these issues I get snippy responses such as "I suggest you reach out to your driver" which I do try to call and unfortunately I don't speak a second language. I will work on that, but don't deem this my fault.

review: I am an Uber One member and I didn‚Äôt get the ¬£5 credit from the late arrival of food as the membership promised. Actually there are no clear instructions on how this promise from Uber Eats works and it was so unfortunate this happened on my order in a Friday night that the food arrived a lot later than the estimated time. I thought I would get the ¬£5 credit automatically but NO. I started to look for support as I found this was something I should be entitled, but I couldn‚Äôt find any contact point from Uber Eats‚Äô site or app. Support service is not open to public which is the worst from the customers‚Äô point of view. I tried by luck to get them answered the call by calling numbers from Google search results on Monday. Got someone answered the call but they were not helpful at all and they repeatedly said to me they were unable to give me the ¬£5 credit as my ordered was placed more than 48 hours ago and marked the issue as ‚Äúresolved‚Äù though it was not. I then asked them for contact as I couldn‚Äôt find one from the site/ app‚Äôs Help section, also asked him to point out where from the instructions/ terms say Uber One members need to report the late arrival of food in within 48 hours to claim the ¬£5 credit, he repeated the same unhelpful answer, e.g. use the site/ app‚Äôs Help section, over and over. Next they ignored my chat no matter what I asked. When they don‚Äôt value the customers, not responding and disappeared like this, I found so helpless. It was kind of cheating as the rights from what they promised can‚Äôt stand.

review: I live in manhattan in a doorman building.  I had ordered from Murray's Sturgeon today.   My building has a  doorman and one entrance on the listed address spanning an entire NYC block.  Uber supposedly requires a pin# to deliver an order.   I didn't answer my phone quickly as I was on a call.  The driver dropped my food in front of a closed door around the corner, not on my street.  He/she took a picture of this, which I later found.    They refused to refund or redeliver. Ultimately, I got a credit of $25, about half the order.    Dropped at the wrong location, didn't collect PIN#,  wouldn't refund or redeliver.   Hundreds of orders on seamless and other services, never this type of problem. Bad service, customer service people not authorized to resolve issues properly, restrained by policy.

review: In the delivery instructions I advise that I am disabled and cannot walk so rider/driver must bring food to my door. I live on the third floor in a flat. Every time I get a phone call saying I need to go downstairs and collect my order. When I explain I can't, some of the riders/drivers have got pretty aggressive with me. My latest experience was terrible. I was told by the driver if I ask him, he will bring my food to me. He only missed off pretty please. He kept talking over me and wouldn't listen that I couldn't walk. He eventually brought my food to me and saw I was disabled. He said some people say they're disabled just to get the food delivered to their door! He also said Uber only give them so much time to deliver. It would only have taken a few minutes to get to my flat in a lift. I have complained to Uber and they keep asking me for more details. I have given them a lot of detail about this and past service, yet they've again asked for more detail, hoping I'll get fed up. I'd give them zero stars if I could.

review: When it comes to correcting an order and getting a fair treatment for cancellation, this app is problematic. First it‚Äôs nearly impossible to find a way to speak to a live agent via the app and find a contact number. I had to use google and contacted a rider support line. Secondly the app showed me a cancellation refund (minus an admin fee) but then charged me for a full cancellation. I had attempted to cancel the order because it didn‚Äôt accept an address change. But oddly enough when tried placed a fresh order at the same restaurant with the same changed address it accepted the order and attempted to charge my card which fortunately didn‚Äôt go though as they had deducted the cancellation causing the balance to drop. I really don‚Äôt want late night stress when I‚Äôm dealing with a food order struggling to find customer support, trying to change an address or navigating though a poorly laid out app.

review: I ordered for the first time yesterday as we were at work and had very little time to sort something to eat, I ordered through the mcdonald's website and it's told that the delivery would be in 15 minutes. The front door was wide open and we were moving things around the front door so was never out of earshot. It gets to 25 minutes and we are wondering whether delivery is so I go back to the website and it said it's been delivered, I try to find some information on it and I can't find anything that tells me where my order is, so I try speaking to the virtual assistant chat bot, which was absolutely useless. It did not understand what I was trying to say and rather than putting me through to somebody that would help it just kept putting me back to the beginning. I find a number for uber eats who apparently deliver this, I called expecting to just either get told where my delivery was, that there was some kind of mix up or get a redelivery. I call and I'm left on hold a number of times and I'm getting frustrated because the whole idea of this was that it was the save time, I explained to the person on the phone that I can't just be waiting on the phone, they did not offer to call me back they just kept me on hold. When they finally came back to me they told me that they were enabled to give me a redelivery or a refund, when I questioned this they said that they had proof of delivery. When I asked what proof of delivery they did not answer me initially, but later on they explained that they apparently had a photo, but they would not describe this photo at all. They also said that the driver had tried to contact me twice but I had not received any calls.I asked him to send this proof of delivery and they have said that they are not able to, and that I have to take it back to the mcdonald's chat bot.Feeling very frustrated I walked the length and breadth of the industrial estate I work on, to see if anybody else had taken delivery. No other places on the road were open apart from a self-storage place.My phone the local mcdonald's that would have delivered this and they told me that uber eats are the people that should be dealing with this, yet we ordered through the mcdonald's website so our "contract" is with mcdonalds, placing me in a position of perpetual run around.Something that was supposed to be saving us time had me messing around for over an hour with no resolution.Absolutely do not recommend, I feel that I've been had by crooks, and I do not expect to be in this position when ordering from a company like mcdonald's. And for that I'm absolutely astounded!
name: CE

review: I ordered food from KFC via uber eats at approximately 7.45pm, I was messaged by uber eats saying my food would be here between 8.15 pm and 8.30 pm, then it said no later than 8.45 pm, however at 9 pm I received another txt from a different  driver saying he was just picking the order up. He arrived at 9.20 pm. The food was ice cold and Uber chat wasn't interested in my complaint.  Useless. Don't use them.

review: It came really fast and food was hot and driver was very pleasant

Even Sent multiple pics for evidence but we're still given same bot repliesWhat's worse is I pay monthly as an u er one member. Have promptly cancelled this and am lodging formal complaints to my bank and relevant consumer bodies

review: The shopper was great. She kept in touch when items weren‚Äôt available. It was a great experience.  Then, I saw the charge and noticed that the promo my daughter-in-law had given me was not deducted from the balance, and I called their customer service, which was not easy to find a number in the first place. It just went downhill from there now I have about $200 worth of charges on two different credit cards that I had in my wallet and four out of six people that I‚Äôve spoken to you were extremely rude.  I was hung up on twice trying to speak to the supervisor. I finally got one supervisor who I thought was great and he fixed everything. 10 days later I‚Äôm looking at those two credit cards and the charges are all back, including the credit he had given me and the charges were on a second credit card. I called back had a fairly difficult time getting a supervisor, but not as hard as the first time. Then I got a supervisor by the name of Gabriella, who talked like a robot and repeated the same thing over and over and was no help at all. She ended up hanging up on me.  I called back. Ask for another supervisor was told I‚Äôd be called back in an hour and if they were busy, never received a call two hours later I called back again and spoke to another representative. Asked to have a supervisor call me and was told it would be five minutes and they would call me. I never received a call back. I will never ever use Uber eats again or any of their services for that matter and neither will anybody I know because everybody will hear the story. Good luck in Uber Eats, because you have terrible customer service the worst I‚Äôve ever seen, I happen to work for a company who won the JD power award for customer service so I definitely know what does customer service is and what horrible customer services

review: Complete and utter cluster. As an individual and as a family, we do meal delivery services on the regular. In fact, I work as a physician at a nearby hospital, small community, no more than 4,000 in the community and all restaurants within 5 minute of small community hospital. Never, not one single time, have we had any issue with either DoorDash or Grubhub or even delivery from independent local establishments.Working as a physician, along with all the night staff, I have crazy 12-hour shifts, typically 7p-7a. That means, upon arrival, myself and my nurses need to sort out meal plans early or the clock will beat us and we will run out of options. Thought I would give Uber Eats a try, for the sake of completeness and to give everyone a trial comparison.Big, big, HUGE mistake. Where to even begin. Place an order for the local Steak 'n Shake and execute the tracker so I can follow progress. It is about 8:15 pm at the time. Up comes the tracker and after only a very brief time shows my driver is at the restaurant picking up the order. This status remains unchanged for the better part of 30 minutes. Finally, as we push 45-60 minutes, the tracker reads "Oops, finding another driver". This is after 45-60 minutes and now we don't even have a driver?!After about 30 minutes of "Oops" persisting, the net result of this is very obvious, Uber doesn't have a driver available in this area, we are at one hour, clearly not going to make it before the "absolute latest" time, and my options are dwindling. Total time greater than one hour, "Oops no driver" time greater than 30 minutes. It was abundantly clear that the food was not going to be delivered in time, let alone probably not at all.I contact agents via the Uber Eats online chat and try to relate this and the urgency in resolving the issue so I can move on and still look at dining options for the night. All I got was a bunch of canned "we're sorry for the inconvenience" and reading from prepared scripts. I was still about 15 minutes out from the drop-dead time, but it was completely clear where we were headed for this and, if we get this resolved now, I can place another order with another delivery service, my only chance for eating anything other than a Crustable from the vending machine.Still...canned responses, scripts, etc. The suggestion was that "the food is technically not late until 9:15 pm and it is already prepared, so we cannot refund unless it is after 9:15". The thing is, it only would take about two minutes to realize that no delivery in > 1 hour and persistent "Oops, finding another driver" means that it just isn't going to happen, quite clearly at this point, so do me a favor and consider and a half to be late enough to give me time to still find something.Even the suggestion that a burger, fries, and shake made over an hour earlier would still be edible is pretty absurd. It is quite clear, Uber didn't have a driver anywhere near this small town and left me hanging for about an hour and a half while I was the only one apparently smart enough to figure that. When 9:15 did roll around, the status still read "Oops, finding another driver". No meal tonight, on the damned computer much of the first two hours of work, and the complete failure of customer service to make any effort to actually understand the problem and address the problem.Took me exactly two times to realize that Uber Eats either lacks the footprint or business plan to successfully practice this model. Among the most abysmal customer service experiences I have encountered for some time.
name: Steve Perkins

review: Great food and prices, some deliverys did not come with the Milkshake we ordered, but did get the right amount of refund back for it.

review: They do not believe in following FDA Food Safety Guidelines as outlined by United States Law. When my food has sat out for over 2 hours, they refuse a refund even though it is not food safe and could send a person to the hospital. If you want to have safe food, you have to pay a premium price. This should be illegal - you are charging customers extra should you "not want Uber to break the law" and send your family to the hospital with food poisoning. It is not the restaurants' fault - the fault lies solely with this negligent company. I am reporting them to the FDA and encourage everyone to do so. In case you've never worked in the Food Service Industry - any meat or dairy product that has sat out at temperatures over 40 degrees for over 1 hour is considered dangerous and not food safe. Food poisoning bacteria begin to grow on the food after this time and at these temperatures. They also lie and tell me that their drivers always use heating/warming bags, but never once in about 60+ orders has an UberEats driver used such a bag to keep the food hot. This website asked me for "date of experience" but this is a recurring problem and the Customer Service Agents refuse to address the illegalities of their practices or refund money for unsafe food. I have had multiple orders be picked up and driven around town for literally over 2 hours, to arrive ice cold and unsafe. Their answer is to "show a photo" then say it looks "good". That is not how Food Safety Inspections are done, by photo. The 'food safety clock' starts ticking the moment the potentially hazardous (if improperly handled) foods have left the refrigerator, not the store, as well. Every restaurant adheres to this or gets shut down when proper food regulations are in place. Uber doesn't care and they will NOT refund you in the case of food safety issues. When orders are wrong, the refunds are only for a portion of the missing items, as well. I had a missing order that never arrived a week ago - I did get a refund but they let the driver who kept my food keep the large tip I had left when placing the order, too. Never again. Call your local government about these practices and the FDA if you have also been wronged by this company. I am just glad that I have not gotten sick because I know when to toss it out, even if they just robbed me for $50 or more.

review: The discount made it actually affordable to eat. The food was great and delivery was simple and efficient. I love that you can message the delivery driver in real time so that made things much easier.

I have repeatedly asked the company for an itemized accounting of the cost paid per item, and have not received a response. From what I can calculate without an itemized list of what I actually paid, I was charged $90 for what I committed to paying $45 for in groceries. Another difficulty in calculating the exact difference was the fact the store was out of stock on 12 items ordered and still my total bill went from $80 up to $90 with me receiving 12 fewer items. review: It used to be 4-5 stars. I've been with them since the beginning. They have increasingly gotten worse. Their time estimates are basically bait and switch. They'll give a short estimate to encourage you to order. Then in tiny subscript there will be a second "delivered latest by" time after you put the order in that puts a second estimate 20-40 min after your initial time estimate range. Now every 3rd order, I'm getting deliveries that actually deliver 20-30 min past this "latest by" time, getting close to 2 hrs sometimes. Then to add insult to injury, they put your account on review if you complain too much, because their broken system encourages inaccurate delivery estimates, and regularly breaks them. Basically they bait and switch you to order, then deliver in 2-3x the time estimate and give a pittance for compensation. I'm just going to stick to in restaurant delivery services, pickup or give DoorDash a whirl.

review: I recently ordered the Green Thai Curry with rice and I must say, it was an absolute delight! From the portion size to the flavor profile, everything was on point.First and foremost, the portion size was incredibly generous, making it perfect for two people. It was more than enough to satisfy our appetites and even left us with some leftovers for later. Value for money? Absolutely!The Green Thai Curry itself was a burst of flavors. It had the perfect balance of creamy coconut goodness and just the right amount of heat. Each bite was a harmonious blend of aromatic spices and fresh ingredients that danced on my taste buds. I appreciate a good Thai curry, and this one exceeded my expectations.What made this experience even more special was the handwritten note that accompanied my meal. It's those personal touches that set this business apart. It brightened my day and showed genuine care for their customers.Kudos to the team for creating such a delightful culinary experience. This is a hidden gem that deserves all the recognition it can get. üåüüåüüåüüåüüåüThank you for making my day, and I look forward to my next order!

review: We ordered grocery from Waitrose on 25 September (20EAD was the order number) and waited over an hour for the delivery to arrive. Whilst checking the delivery person through Uber Eats app, we saw that he stopped nearby our house and marked the order as "delivered". We were waiting for him door open but noone came. We immediately tried to call him but he didn't pick up. I also tried calling him from my mobile as well for more than 20 times and he didn't reply. After explaining the situation to Uber Eats, they wrote back saying that the delivery person was outside our house for more than 7 minutes, hence we were not eligible for a refund. In total, we waited more than 1 hour for the delivery which was not delivered at all.This makes no sense as the Uber Eats app asks for a code which we need to provide to the delivery person. And how come the delivery can be marked as "delivered" without obtaining the code from us. And it is not acceptable for Uber Eats to believe the delivery person without any proof of delivery.Very disappointing experience with Uber Eats. Such a shame.The next day we went to local Waitrose store to explain and they agreed to give us the fruit and vegetables from our order for free(excluding a milk, yogurt and bread, which is also weird).

review: I recently used Uber Eats in the UK, and here's my honest review. While it's known for its speed, there's a catch ‚Äì you have to pay an additional fee to get your delivery first. It's quick, but only if you're willing to cough up more money.On a personal note, I've been using Uber Eats since it first launched in the UK, and I've noticed some significant changes. Unfortunately, most of these changes have made it less appealing. The platform now charges restaurants over 30% of their sales, which likely leads to an increase in menu prices. On top of that, there are additional fees for delivery, and if you want your food to arrive faster, you guessed it ‚Äì another fee.The "discounts" they offer are often limited to certain struggling restaurants, which doesn't really benefit the average customer. Due to all these fees and increased food prices, I've made the decision to stop using Uber Eats. It's simply become too expensive for what it offers.My advice? Consider alternatives or grab something on your way home ‚Äì it's usually cheaper, more convenient, and fresher.

Like never again. App deleted. I won‚Äôt be hungry because of that Uber. At the end of the day, Uber is not an essential service.I would suggest others to follow the same. review: Driver's attitude was rude and unprofessional!He asked for code and when I gave it to him he put the wrong code in and told me that' he wouldn't  leave my order  without  the correct code"
name: DP

review: A dreadfully unprofessional and dishonest company. I've recently joined UberOne because they had an option to pay more for delivery to my door. That's correct, you read right! A pay more option to get my takeaway delivery to my door !! Marvellous innovation; I seriously don't know how I managed before.After several feigned attempts at my orders from unprofessional drivers who can't seem to find an address and read the delivery note instructions, I opted to start paying extra for a guaranteed delivery service to my door... or so I thought!Rather than go over the copious times I have had drivers abandon my groceries wherever they see fit, let us move on to dealing with Uber agents after such a mishap. The support or complaint service, or more accurately, the lack of support or complaint service.You will be forced through a chatbot, leading you in circles with another "help" following the link message. Feeling frustrated with the chatbot's lack of response, the last option was to call the main Uber line and was treated with thank you for being an Uber one member. Right up to being "passed" in circles to the right department or receiving, "I'm sorry about your situation, let me help by writing down your notes and sending you a message with a link because they will deal with your complaint." ... Receives automated chatbot message link, saying phone call was resolved, how good was our service.Do yourself a favour, and don't use Uber Eats. It will be a coin flip on each order whether you receive your delivery, with a chatbot and dishonest call centre employees just waiting to "help".
name: CU

review: It was very convenient and very expensive but if you want if fast and hassle free you gotta pay the piper.
name: EV

review: Customer service on ubereats consistently send the same generic copy and pasted e-mail when you have a delivery of some terrible cold food and close queries without even speaking to you. shambolic customer service.
name: LM

review: Very tasty food and plenty of it. Delivered within the scheduled time frame
name: AD

review: Horrible. Do not expect a refund if you are displeased even if your order comes after the latest arrival time. Do not recommend.
name: LI

review: Ordered two meals and the main burgers didn‚Äôt arrive. Contacted and for spending ¬£30 on two meals they refunded ¬£2.79. Complete con. Really bad. First time using Uber eats and the last. (Burger King the restaurant made order from)
name: RE

review: Vile thieving company six items that were missing from my order that asda confirmed were supplied by them so called thieving driver and he kept hanging up contacted uber eats and refused to help disgusting company.
name: MA

review: Great experience! Very easy to order and food was delivered quickly.
name: KE

review: I have to use this company when ordering from the PETERBOROUGH HAMPTON BRANCH Via Mcdonalds App - At first the drivers were good and promtly delivered my orders. However after a while they started doing multi drops and I ended up getting my meals cold. But, the worse was to come the drivers started just not delivering at all. On one occasion the driver came to my door and then just drove away I took picture of his number plate on his moped for proof, then on the last occastion the delivery the driver simply delivered it to the wrong adress in wrong area. When i called to tell him he said he would contact uber to get my refund but I dought he did. I called CS at uber-eats on two occastions to report non deliverys and they say the money takes 10 days to go back into my bank - Been 30 days, so far no money has been returned now I am down 50 pounds with nothing to show for it. My advice is to to avoid using uber eats if you can your food may go missing as well as your money !!!!! AVOID ALSO - Mcdonalds you are seriously harming your reputation as a company using uber eats as i will not order for delivery again.
name: Vrillon Aura

review: This company is so unspeakably dog feaces that I have had to change this numerous times, so I will adjust this for brevity so it can maybe be of some use to anyone who stumbles across it.Before I try to briefly break down the steps I have experienced, here is the takeaway, this company is so bad that they stopped monitoring their complaints email address, removed a complaints section from their website and they have trained ( for lack of a better word) their staff to hangup/disconnect the live chat if you ask about a complaint procedure which literally violates governmental regulations put in place to ensure minimum standards for post-sales support 1: I attempted to place a small order using guest check out as I did not have an account2: I got to the check out stage, approved the payment via my bank app, for some reason uber declined the transaction on their end.3: I tried again, benefit of the doubt, figured maybe it was a one off website hiccup, this time I get a message saying I am not allowed to place the order as my card is associated with another account, a blatant lie, the first of many4: I went to the wrongly titled "help" section where it turns out all they do is tell you to create an account, an account is mandatory to even be allowed to try and talk to anyone5: I bite the bullet and create an account6: I talk to "support" staff who say " I can see that your concern is not related to this account. Kindly write to us from the concerned account", absolute lobtomites. You create an account to talk to them and they tell you they can't talk to you about that account. Genius training the "support" workers get clearly7: When you try to explain what your problem is about, that you do not have another account they say "I am directing you towards the relevant team and they will be addressing your concern accordingly". What this actually means is, "I am too stupid, with too little training to be of any use whatsoever so I am disconnecting the chat now"8: Given the above I have tried to file a complaint which is impossible. The only email address I could find generates an automated reply saying it is unmonitored, there are no details on their website on how to file a complaint, the phone numbers floating around are evidently also unmanned.It's a joke. More expensive than any other service of its kind, more fee's than any other service of its kind, worst support literally ever to have existed, I could go and visit a comatose patient and there would be more brain activity and I would be more likely to get help than wading through the idiocy that is the entirety of ubereats "support"
name: J.

review: I ordered an Uber eats order for $23 that wasn‚Äôt delivered. Their support connected me to the driver 3 times, no answer. I submitted a report and got Uber eat credits which immediately after they restricted and suspended my account. I never used Uber ride, only Uber eats and they stole $23 from me. It was my first report and I‚Äôve ordered a total of 6 times no issues before. So this company doesn‚Äôt like giving refunds  and will suspend your account over it. I guess they rather deal with chargeback because I‚Äôm going  to have to call my bank and see what they can do.
name: Mj

review: I broke my ankle on 6th August I  choose to live solo but with broken ankle it's been tricky . Thank God for Tescos and Amazon .I've used uber eats on probably 12 occasions.  I am sick of the drivers lying they are at my flat when I'm at the door with broken ankle and crutches and they are not . They are argue that where they are is where Google has sent them . Today the delivery guy arguing he is there when I'm there at open door and he is not .I have to hop out of the door on crutches into the courtyard . Try and kneel up steps to shout him as God knows where he is . He finally came to gate arrogant and argumentative.  Realised he could lie anymore about being at my door . He laughed at me and took my shopping away .Absolutely disgraceful

review: On two consecutive  orders items were missing  or mouldy.  Though a refund  was given I still had to go out to shop. This makes a delivery  service  totally  redundant

Which I obviously wanted to cancel when the others were unavailable but couldn‚Äôt.Customer service were no help at all, basically said tough! So bear in mind there‚Äôs no option to cancel a supermarket order. Have deleted the App & won‚Äôt use again.

review: Have not used uber eats for 3 months due to all food arriving cold decided to give them a whirl again last night and yes they are consistent arrived stone cold not attempt to ring the door bell The driver looks like he threw it at our door bag ripped and all food on the floor Uber Eats are refusing to refund never again app deleted

review: Delivery took from 11:20 to 1:03 to be complete. But even after this wait, the order was not actually here. The driver took a picture of where they left the order and it wasn‚Äôt my residence but another home in the area. I used the help prompts in app and was guided to call the courier. They did not answer. I contacted customer service with all of this information, and even provided a picture of my own with my address in view,  only to be told ‚ÄúI wasn‚Äôt eligible fore a refund‚Äù because their systems indicate the dirver reached the delivery point. Finally after questioning the logic and reason and the fact that the delivery person‚Äôs photo proves they did not come here, they granted my refund ‚Äúas a one tike exception‚Äù. So now, they are doing mw a favor by not charging the customer for something that was proven they did not get. It‚Äôs disgusting how frustrating it is to even get customer service. This is beyond shoddy. And I take ot as a sign to just end my relationship with these services period.

The company can do much better if they ensure that at least 9/10 times their customers receive their food, that they‚Äôve paid for you know?

review: I have been a uber eats driver for just over 4 years.. my ratings are 98% but the pay is next to pathetic you will make just under ¬£1 a mile deduct insurance petrol and maintenance of vehicle you are working for 50pence a mile. They "claim" you make ¬£10 an hour what they dont tell you is only if your lucky. A Quick BreakDown¬£10 = 11 Miles of driving Minus Fuel ¬£3 Minus Insurance ¬£1 Minus Maintenance on vehicle ¬£1 Your left with ¬£5 and thats if your lucky!

review: Expedite and accurate. Well packing. Courteous delivery person.

review: UberEats is a godsend for me. On most occasions, I don't have time to leave my home, park and dine at one of the many great restaurants in my area. So, UberEats allows me to order the food I love and have it delivered quickly to me at a reasonable price.  I rate UberEats an A+.

review: Arrived quickly,the food was good. The driver was polite and nice.

review: I am a frequent user on Uber. Absolutely shocked and stunned by the appalling service I've received in the last few months. I ordered from a shop tonight, expecting my items that I added.... however, the shopkeeper didn't update his profile on Uber and the items I wanted were actually UNAVAILABLE..... however, they decided that they'd send me out the closest thing to Lemons which was Oranges (the sense of humour on these people) instead of refunding me for the items UNAVAILABLE.... they charged me the full amount and sent me items I didn't want or even eat. As I complained to Uber... I had a lovely robot tell me that they're sorry and they'll try better next time.... guess what Uber their won't be a next time.... also; please try cancelling an Uber order you've placed as its bloody impossible.... they've made it so hard to find and contact them, that your left with no choice but to foot the bill.....Back to the traditional method of walking to the shops for me....

review: Awesome - Time

review: Shocking service!! Use other delivery companies rather than this one!!!

review: I ordered a small fish and chips and a sausage from sunny frier chip shop Bromsgrove, Worcestershire, England.The uber driver was happy I'm delivering the food, which is good sign.However the food was cold and was tasteless due to the time taken to deliver it.I complained to Uber but was not offered and explanation or refundAvoid Uber and use another delivery service

review: What a bunch of arrogant unhelpful people at Uber eats.Ordered 2 pizzas costing ¬£29 with so called delivery from Uber Eats, 2 hours later still on pizza, the only way to contact them is via online chat which they said had been delivered then cut us off half way through conversation. ¬£29 for no food never using Uber for anything again.

Refuse to take a complaint, which is against consumer law. Refuse to come back to you. Just eat is so much better.

review: Shocking experience I was billed ¬£4 extra and when I took a photo ( three times they asked for the same one ) which proved this I then had to go onto my receipt ( which they obviously have a copy of ) and after 30 mins back and forth after they knew I was correct and I asked for tbf ¬£ beck they said it‚Äôs not there fault it‚Äôs the shop so nothing that can do ü§£ü§£ I should call the police and report it as theft because if somebody came up to me and stole ¬£4 off me in the street the police would take action if Uber steal it it‚Äôs legal üòÇüòÇ best thing is I pay for Uber one their prestige service ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ company‚Äôs a joke use Deliveroo

review: Absolutely disgusting service , I placed an order and I never received it , I rang them and they told me they couldn‚Äôt resend my food which myself and children were sat waiting over an hour for , and would not issue me a refund , the people I spoken too on the phone were rude and arrogant, I will never use these again , now I‚Äôm money down and still no food been delivered, I would not recommend this hideous company to anybody , robbing f*****s

review: Never using this app again. Our order never arrived even though the driver marked it delivered. When I contacted Uber eats for a refund they said the driver tried to contact me and waited for 7 minutes (then why had he marked it delivered???) and so they were not refunding me and to update my phone number on the app. My number in the app is and was correct. I have no missed calls, no messages on my phone or through the app. Each message I sent received the same response copied and pasted.
name: MF

review: I will never ever order through uber eats again and advice anyone who read this not to ever order through them because you will be paying for the store mistakes.I made an order on the 22nd of Sep 23 from kfc County road store. I ordered the 6 pieces chicken offer for round ¬£17.99 and added 5 chicken wings for ¬£5.99 I received this order on time driver was nice. Got the food of him then opened it and there was no chicken wings at all...I took picture of this and sent it to uber eats customer service who rejected helping me and told me just to rate the store service to help them improve their service in future.What the hell is this is like saying we do not care you lost ¬£5.99 mo problem just tell them you are not happy and consider this ¬£5.99 is collateral for the sake of improving the service.I advice you guys do not order again go order with just eats at least these guys never let their customers down.

review: Macdonalds fobbed me off to uber eats after a complaint about them tampering with food and selling out of date items. I emailed uber and called them 4 times in the first 48 hours without getting through. I finally get through today and am told it's over 48 hours so they won't help. If I had reached out earlier they could have helped. It's a serious complaint and they have just ignored it. The supervisor dodged everything and wouldn't even accept my proof of email as evidence I had reached out. Disgusting service from a shady company and I'll be on to Environmental Health on Monday morning.

review: We ordered and the order was cancelled but money was deducted from the account

review: Appalling customer service.  Uber Eats app charged me for Uber 1 membership when I didn't agree to it and refused to give the money back because "computer processors" and there's nothing they can do.  They messed me around pretending not to understand the issue for a week and I had to raise a complaint twice, sending the same information everyday. So it's clear they were just hoping I'd let it go. Its only 5.99 but I will pursue further because they can't steal money and claim nothing can be done.  Needless to say avoid this app - use deliveroo instead.
name: LI

review: Uber driver delivered my food to a completely different road. He refused to go to the address I put on the order. If It could be a bonus, he didn‚Äôt call me until after he started the timing and left me only 4 minutes to go get my food. I went out just to see that he is not there. I checked and the app said he was 5 mins away. I called and let him know that he isn‚Äôt in the right destination only for him to curse at me. In the end, I rushed to his wrong location, asking him to please wait I would go get it. He then ignore my calls and drove away. The photo he submitted as proof of delivery was taken on a completely different road from what I put on the address, and customer service refused to look at it.

review: I like ubereats they always come out with good coupons customer support takes like 3-6 hours to respond but most of the times there is no reason to contact them havent used just eat or deliveroo before so cant compare but i hav no reason to switch

review: I am a restaurant owner and this is the second time I have switched my tablet off as waqas(Uber customer service agent )followed guidelines and refunded money to customer who allegedly claimed not received the food, however in the review section customer claimed potion was small.I pointed it out that you can‚Äôt make a comment on an item if you did not receive it, clearly the customer lied to get a refund.Uber should stick to car technology. They are new to food business and unfortunately do t k is how to run it. Sad fact even the rep who is supposed to look after partners ignores phone calls.No contact with anyone.Looking at the bad reviews it seems even the directors of the company do t care as none is acting on these reviews

review: Was easy to order. Driver delivered quickly. Perfect.

review: Uber eats delivered the wrong order AGAIN.No dinner for my family AGAIN!  Worthless service!

review: The worst customer service i have ever come across. review: My husband was in a terrible car accident and we were in the emergency room for hours waiting for tests.  We ordered food for him (he was starving) and showed our appreciation for the doctors and nurses by ordering extra for them.  The food arrived fast - we were so grateful!

review: I had to make 2 orders before I got my order.. the first 1 was picked up by the driver, but then they chose not to deliver my food to me..But Uber saw what was happening and canceled my order and refunded my money.. so I reorder. Y food and the 2nd driver got my order to me without any problem.
name: SS

review: Terrible Experience: Never Using Uber Eats Again!Order Number: #3C953Order Date: 23/07/2023I had an absolutely horrendous experience with Uber Eats, and I feel compelled to share my frustration and disappointment. I placed an order worth ¬£28.18 on the aforementioned date, and to my utter disbelief, the meal was never delivered. It was a complete letdown, and I'm still in disbelief that such a reputable service could fail so miserably.Upon realizing that my order was missing, I immediately contacted Uber Eats to report the issue and request a refund. Little did I know that this would be the start of a long and frustrating journey. Despite raising a formal complaint and providing all the necessary details, my money was never refunded as requested. It's incredibly disheartening to be left out of pocket after a service failure that was entirely out of my control.To add insult to injury, the food was delivered to a completely different address than my own. Not only did Uber Eats fail to deliver the meal I paid for, but they also managed to deliver it to the wrong location entirely. This level of incompetence is beyond comprehension, especially considering that accurate address information was provided during the ordering process.The most disappointing aspect of this entire ordeal has been Uber Eats' abysmal customer service. Their complaint service is an absolute joke. It's truly disheartening to see a company with such potential fall so short in terms of addressing customer issues. My attempts to communicate with their support team were met with indifference, delays, and ultimately, no resolution.After this appalling experience, I can confidently say that I will never use Uber Eats again. The poor service, coupled with the complete lack of accountability and support, has left me feeling frustrated, cheated, and deeply dissatisfied. I urge anyone considering using Uber Eats to think twice and explore alternative food delivery services that prioritize their customers' satisfaction and take responsibility for their failures.In conclusion, my experience with Uber Eats has been nothing short of a nightmare. From the undelivered meal to the incorrect delivery address and their woeful complaint service, every aspect of their service has been a disappointing failure. Save yourself the trouble and avoid Uber Eats at all costs.
name: Ropafadzo Mshayavanhu

review: Easy to use and order through the application and time and tracking delivery is so nice
name: MI

review: Works well for me.The restaurant, Massimos, allowed me to eat in house.

review: We have been intending to try Uber Eats for some time. We were well satisfied with our first experience

review: Every time so far I have ordered food it has come fast and still hot! The drivers have been nice and respectful and the delivery fee isn't bad at all!

review: App was super easy to use . First time users also get great offers . Delivery was fast and the drivers were very courteous . Great experiences so far!

review: Ubereats driver wrote on my walk in marker pen my house number! Graffiti on my wall!!! Police will prosecute

review: Order was meant to arrive within 15-20 minutes, the driver drove out of our town - 10 minutes out in the opposite direction from the restaurant and delayed delivery by an hour - still never bothered to show up at the restaurant so we had to wait another 25 minutes for another driver to be assigned with absolutely NO SUPPORT WHATSOEVER from customer service who said they will still charge me 100% of the order - no apology, nothing. review: I seen an offer of 50% off fruit and veg from Sainsbury's available via Uber Eats. I ordered extra fruit and vege because of the discounts. After submitting payment I realised no discounts had been applied,even though they should automatically get applied. I tried to contact Uber eats and after 15mins all I could find was payment in progress and could take 24hrs. You cannot ask for anything until this is processed. I came back a few days later and the response was that I needed to contact within 48hrs.  Ultimately they ripped me off and did not want to help resolve issue. I have spent a lot of money with them. I will be taking business elsewhere

review: What a complete shambles. We ordered food for four people from McDonald‚Äôs, four main meals. Only to be delivered the complete wrong order. My order cost ¬£36 in total. We had someone else‚Äôs meal which only consisted of a single meal. Told delivery driver that we had the wrong order, she didn‚Äôt care. Avoid with a passion, delivery drivers who work for this company are an absolute joke. Worst thing was it was my daughter‚Äôs first pay packet and she wanted to treat her family. Will never be using this company again!
name: LY

review: $5 premium on each entre dish plus the fees is little absurd. I won't be using UberEats even with Uber Cash.
name: RR

review: Ordered through ubereats. The restaurant dispatched the order. The delivery driver never delivered any food. Was then marked complete.The kicker? Ubereats says the driver tried contacting me and waited before competing the order. I have a ring door bell and and have proof a driver never came to my home nor did he try contacting me. Despite being willing to share my proof, Ubereats refused to give a refund insisting the driver arrived and tried contacting. Very disappointing. While I have proof to show, they are not willing to show they have proof.Do NOT order through Uber eats. If the driver never delivers the order, you will NOT receive a refund for all the money you spent on your food. And they will flat out deny it even if you have proof.
name: AM

review: (Added to McDonalds as well.)McDonalds have ‚Äúpartnered‚Äù with Uber Eats to deliver food. I have found myself unable to use my kitchen for a couple of days, so I ordered McDonalds for lunch while work is being done.Food turned up freezing cold and solidified, with no means for me to reheat. Searched best way to get a refund, went through the correct channels to contact Ubereats. Uber refused to refund, as the order was ‚Äúdelivered within their given time‚Äù i.e before the last possible minute that gave.Went through to McDonalds via Facebook, and was given a ¬£10 voucher. Not the full cost, but I accepted it.Ordered again today, stupidly. Turned up even colder than yesterday which I didn‚Äôt think possible. Uber again refused the refund. McDonalds have also refused a refund or to acknowledge fault. They don‚Äôt have access to Ubereats‚Äôs transactions.I have reached out to CAB over this. It may seem like a small amount to get upset about, but the point is that two days in a row I have been forced to bin all the food, as no means to reheat, and will not be compensated with my money back. It‚Äôs unacceptable, and I would encourage anyone to avoid McDelivery, as both McDonalds and Ubereats provide unacceptable customer service.
name: LG

review: Absolutely shocking how bad there customer service is. Telling me they can‚Äôt refund an order than never arrived because it‚Äôs been more than 48 hours since I ordered it but it hasn‚Äôt been since they charged me so how can I request a refund if I hadn‚Äôt been charged for my meal yet
name: AD

review: Food was cold, looked and smelled old and slightly rotten. Could not eat, threw it away immediately. I need a refund now please.
name: JC

review: Do NOT use Ubereats unless you have an entire evening to throw away being frustrated and hungry. They‚Äôll reschedule your delivery numerous times, they won‚Äôt allow you to cancel it when that happens so you can‚Äôt make a new order, but they‚Äôll allow a driver to cancel it after you‚Äôve spent 2.5 hours of waiting. Original delivery time of 8:10. At 8:00, that changed to 9:20pm. The original LATEST delivery estimate was 8:55, and every customer service agent refused to look into the matter until that time and I was essentially told to get lost until then. All while the app says it won‚Äôt be arriving until 9:20 anyway. Then I noticed the driver was reassigned a second time. At 9pm, I tried to reach out to customer service, where my order was suddenly cancelled without any input from me. They said somebody else had picked up the order. I‚Äôm absolutely sure it was one of the other drivers who picked it up and then disappeared off the map. They‚Äôll let a driver pick something up, then they‚Äôll reassign the order (!!!???), and no communication will happen between the two drivers or the restaurant about who picked up the food and where it went. I was willing to wait 2 hours for cold soggy food but that was the final straw. Because they cancelled and refunded the order, I was again essentially told to get lost by customer service. Not one person considered this situation to be a real problem or an inconvenience. They don‚Äôt give a SPLIT sh!t about the customer experience. This service takes orders they KNOW they can‚Äôt fulfil all in an attempt to grab as much money as they can. I cant wait until it finally falls apart.
name: Martha MacDonald

review: Before they had phone line to call to customer service now when you call to same number they answer before voicemail mail tell you to log in your account and not helpful 2 times restaurant they cancelled my food after 60 minutes late then I excepted to have refund usually shpujd happens 5 to 7 days not to 3 months and nobody care or bother to answer for refund they take money quickly but they want to give back never happen

review: I'm finding on trying uber eats that their system takes their drivers to the wrong address.   I've had to call multiple times to direct the last 2 drivers.  Doesn't happen when we use Skip so we are likely going to go back.

Extremely disappointed with both the delivery service and the response from customer service.

review: Uber Eats incessantly gets orders wrong and only compensate a fraction of it. Do not order groceries and beverages through them. You will be disappointed if you do.

review: Not even a one star. Ordered my breakfast using the app. This was meant to be delivered by 9:25‚Ä¶ they then added on a further half an hour to the time which kept going up and up by the minute. I had no other option but to cancel this order as I had to leave my house to go to university. They have now kept my money (¬£10.89 the full amount) due to me cancelling. I‚Äôve contacted the support to get absolutely nothing but a shoddy service and basically told that there will be no help or refund. Why should I be losing my money because you cannot perform on times that you set? Absolute joke and I will never be using the app again‚Ä¶ scam

review: My order was never delivered despite payment being taken. Customer services said that I gave a PIN to the driver which confirms delivery was made. I did not give a PIN to anyone, least of all a driver because no one ever came to deliver the order. It is a scam and I will be reporting this theft to the police as UberEats couldn't care less.

review: Easy to use, good reactivity

review: Worse service ever.. I ordered my food, and it was never delivered.. and they complain team don‚Äôt seem to care. Never again

review: I don‚Äôt understand why Uber has unprofessional people working. They are just stilling money government should close all Uber and charge them for stilling people's money even is not  worth giving half a star to Uber

review: Unmatched transactions, and the issue not getting solved

review: This company is shocking!Serval times have I made an order and they have missed items, got items wrong, been unbelievably late! But this time they have taken it to a whole new level, I purchased some groceries as I did not have time to and I had people that needed to go to work on the night shift and children to feed and when I came to check the order it said it had been delivered when it hadn‚Äôt. I contacted Uber and after 12 hours of waiting for a responce they then said that they couldn‚Äôt refund or change my order! What an absolute joke so now I am going to report them for theft & scamming

review: Fast and quality

review: My food was ice cold and only got automated answers on the help section. Delete the app!

review: Quick, easy to order and timely

review: Great service and it was my first time. To ever use this service/app.

review: Food was delicious and actually arrived a little early. Only issue was that I requested utensils but didn‚Äôt get any ‚Ä¶ or napkins. Difficult to eat Indian food without them!

review: My drink was missing from the order and I updated the tip to $0, from $2.  You still charged me $2 for tip.  My food was cold.  Not even like warm.

review: Easy, fast, affordable food delivered straight to my door

review: Unbelievably bad.  Every 5 mins the estimated delivery went back.  15 mins turned into 1 hour 25 mins.  The ‚Äúno later than‚Äù time was exceeded by 20 minutes.  And, predictably, the food was stone cold and items were missing!The app is scandalous- no option to cancel, no option to complain, receipt takes 24 hours etc.  when I tried to message a delivery person my message disappeared as I was typing - twice!!  A classic case of ‚Äúmake it as difficult as possible‚Äù.  I then messaged to say that items were missing and the response I get was, ‚Äúthank you for your feedback!‚Äù  No less than a 100% refund plus a credit would be in order here, but it will probably take a fight to get that.  So Uber Eats relies on drunk people who can‚Äôt be bothered to complain and technology designed to frustrate.  What a great business model!  Please take your business elsewhere and show this terrible business that their lack of integrity will cost them in the end.

review: took 2 hours to deliver food & very poor customer service.
name: KA

review: Made an order through the app and when the food had arrived my drinks had spilled and went all over the food also (entire order was inedible) I requested a refund on the 6.9.23 (uk) and I am still waiting for it have been messed about asking for screenshot of my online banking 3 times but every time its not readable. even provided proof from the bank via email that no refund has been made and now they are telling me that because there is no payment from my account I'm lying even tho I provided evidence that a refund was made. Now I have to go through my bank absolutely ridiculous. The C.E.O's need to sort their company out absolutely rubbish.

review: Quick delivery and nice understanding driver
name: ME

review: I got another lot of disgusting food tonight and guess what? Uber eats won‚Äôt refund. It stresses me out whenever there‚Äôs a issue as everything is so long, dragged on by their awful app that doesn‚Äôt allow you explain properly and then after hours on the app they just dismiss you completely. It‚Äôs disgusting. How can they keep getting away with this? Is no one watching them? It‚Äôs not fare I paid ¬£40 for chewy old prawns, soggy food, beef gone off that taste of weird lamb smell and drenched in oil‚Ä¶ This was from Shanghai in brick lane! First time and definitely my LAST Time

review: Wouldn't even give it one star!!! DISGUSTING SERVICE Ordered thru Mcdonalds app. The driver accepted the order 15 minutes before they decided to actually go to the restaurant. They decided to just sit there (they where a mile away from restaurant) and when they decided to move they took forever to get there and I'm guess by the time they got there the food was freezing!Took 4 minutes for them to drive from the restaurant to my house. So I highly doubt the food turned stone cold in 4 minutes. After they delivered the food the driver purposely left the delivery open as if to say it was still being delivered so it looked like he delivered it within the time frame. WHICH HE DID NOT. I contacted uber for help through the mcdonalds app and twitter and did not want to give the refund (the order was ¬£30) and kept saying to call customer service when we did and they told us to call mcdonalds to get a refund which they knew we couldn't!! DISGUSTING! SCAMMER!

review: I ordered food from ubereats and driver delivered to the wrong address. I was standing outside my hotel and kept messaging him the directions but he ended up 1.5 miles away from address.Contacted ubereats and explain them the whole situation but they refused to acknowledged the drivers error and kept telling me that driver waited for you at the delivery address, seriously? Driver waited at the wrong address and it's my fault?I sent numerous messages and asked them to check his location as he was fully tracked and also my conversation with him but they refused the refund, I lost food and money!I will never use it again and will tell every single person I talk to, not to use this rubbish service.

review: The driver was fantastic and communicated with me well. He offered to bring the food to the hotel room, but I met him at the lobby. The food was still hot!

review: I ordered scheduled delivery yesterday and the delivery person came with order from wrong restaurant. I said this is not from where I ordered. He said he will check with customer service and after sometime the order was cancelled saying the Delivery person could not contact me. When I reached out customer service, they said order is getting delayed and will have to wait for some more time. When contacted a little later, I was told order is cancelled and I will not even get refund for that.When I explained what happened, they were hesitant to listen and when asked to contact higher level, she said I will be contacted shortly after I disconnect and haven't received a call until this point of time.I have experienced this issue several times and it is a lesson to be away from them. They just take your money.

review: I was promised a refund and I'm still waiting till this day. Bad service indeed.

review: they deliveried wrong pack and not possible to reach them. Impossible

review: The absolute worst customer service!!! No way to leave feedback about food, only delivery drivers. I simply asked how I could leave a review about the bad quality food I received‚Ä¶just couldn‚Äôt get an answer. Plus their delivery charges are extortionate, deliveries always delayed and arrives cold‚Ä¶no compensation or satisfactory response from customer service. A really horrific company to spend money with/deal with

review: Initial experience was poor. Indeed one driver failed to arrive despite 2-3 attempts, I watched in annoyance on the tracker as he missed my road.Subsequently I found this a 1 off & use them more often.

review: The services fees are out of this world, refunds are never properly applied. Never using this service again

review: Ordered a Mac delivery. Given an approx time for delivery and then a more accurate time. We waited at door for 5 minutes after delivery time check app which stated driver had tried to contact me. I checked to see as I had had my phone with me snd no calls had been made so I tried to contact driver and I wasn‚Äôt able to be connected. I then saw it said it had been delivered but it hadn‚Äôt been. I tried the Uber help number who told me it was down to Macdonalds to refund as their driver tried to contact. I told them I could prove he hadn‚Äôt tried to contact me but they said unable to do do refund. I contacted macdonalds who told me contact them again which I did with same result. I contacted Macdonalds customer service explained again and said it was definitely Uber thst should sort this out but would highlight this problem. In short I contacted a manager at Uber who again refused to acknowledge the problem was with their driver snd would not refund my money. I will never use delivery service again if Uber is involved.

review: Pual was nice and on time, delivered perfectly and still hot.  Food was a 10 and will be getting again

review: Ordered 2 happy meals through McDonald's app which Uber delivered but the drinks were missing so I called McDonald's who told me that I needed to contact Uber as they delivered.Contacted Uber who agreed to process a refund (It was difficult to talk to them as there is a language barrier).Looked at my account and they were trying to take extra money so called Uber again who told me to call McDonald's.It is a ridiculous set up, they pass you from pillar to post as nobody takes responsibility.

review: I selected my groceries and sent in my order. I was given updates on when my order from Coles was being shopped in the store. review: Was a bit apprehensive about delivery to my mum who is currently in a hospital ward but using the message function directly with the driver everything went smoothly.  Thank you - my Mum was overjoyed!

review: Just ordered lunch. Followed the collection. Next thing I am advised it has been delivered. No food. Nothing. Thank you Matteo the driver. Hope you enjoyed eating my lunch!! Don‚Äôt use UberEats

review: I ordered foods from the same restaurants that I used for many years through Uber eats this evening. The delivery was late by 30 minutes than what the app said initially, then the Uber driver showed up at my door only to say he didn't have my food. He was on the phone with a rep for 15 minutes while I was standing by him waiting for my concern to be resolved. The driver reassured me that he will go back and bring my food in 10 minutes, then rep said that he can leave and deliver the other orders as my order will be delivered by someone else. The delivery guy reassured me my food will be delivered in 20 minutes, then left. Shortly after, I received a notification that my order has been canceled, and will be reimbursed (excluding the tip). I called the customer service and only thing they could do is to cancel the order and refund. I escalated to their supervisor only to be told that they can't compensate me for 2 hours that I've wasted because they didn't know how to do their job properly and because I am not subscribed customer. Then they hung up on me!!! What the F! Never using your service again. Zero Star!

review: Uber eats sucks. I placed an order the delivery driver showed up to my house and threw my food out his car window as we were watching. The food was all over my car and my concrete driveway. Uber support is a joke they told me I‚Äôm not eligible for a refund. The terrible part about all of this is I gave Uber support pictures.

review: I placed an order for food - i made a slight mistake. i went to cancel and reorder (it was within 1 minute) and i got charged for cancelling.I contacted 3 seperate supports from uber eats who wouldnt refund me and I even asked "just place the order normally" and they wouldnt do that either. They just wanted my cancellation fee. F uber eats.

review: Worse Company EVER!!!!!!! I will never use this company again. Worse costumer service never have a supervisor available to talk they don‚Äôt care about customer at All. Hours in the phone with them to resolve absolutely NOTHING!!!!!!!!

review: My order was ridiculously delayed (c.1 HR). 1 driver decided to drop my order, it then took a long time to find another driver who, after another 10 mins or so decided they didn't want to deliver my order, then another wait for someone to finally pick up my order and deliver over an hour later. Do not recommend. Use Deliveroo.

review: Great customer service, drivers are hit or miss.

review: It is quite normal for Uber Eats to charge and never deliver. I then waste my own time chasing them for refund despite their drivers cancelling the orders. If you have alternative delivery option then I would avoid Uber Eats. Too many times have I seen by delivery being chauffeured for over hour to then be told the driver cancelled the order.

review: Thieves. Simple as. Orders are accepted and then not delivered while charged are still made to the customer. The apps support and communication options are absolutely useless.

review: Avoid this company at all costs, used Four times originally, never got orders right, took so long to deliver, food always cold. Recently tried To order McDonald's through Mcdelivery, they use Uber Eats! Was forced to rely in Uber Eats once more, BIG MISTAKE! Items missing, called customer services offered a flat refund of ¬£2.79! The meal was nearly ¬£18. Avoid this scam delivery service!

review: The majority of drivers seem to be on bikes these days. So when they find out its more than 2 miles they cancel. Tonight I went through that many drivers all who were on bikes and cancelled that when I finally got my food it was cold from sitting in the shop for so long. And as we all know you can't get a refund from uber for cold food as they always say it is out of their hands and there is nothing they can do. The drivers really get on my nerves they pick up as many orders as they can before delivering so if your the unlucky person who Is their first order it will be cold when you get it. I once had  a delivery driver pick my food up drive 3 miles in the opposite direction then he came back to the same restaurant I ordered from where he waited 15 minutes before he moved and made his way to my house which was a 10 minute drive, saying my food was stone cold would be an understatement.

review: I took advantage of the 50% off fruit and veg ftom Sainsbury's available via Uber Eats. Brilliant savings considering how expensive fruit and veg is. It was delivered within 40 mins. Unfortunately, I had to order from my sister-in-law's address as my address was too far for me to be offered the 50% off discount.

review: Fast delivery and politeness of the person delivering the order..

review: Been charged 30.35 send 22 quid worth for asda? Changed my receipt so only shows what they sent? Sent random items that aren't even remotely like a substitute? Sweet n sour instead of curry? What about korma? Broccoli instead of sugar snap peas? ü§î left all the other stuff of as in removed it from my receipt, no mention of a refund of the 8 odd quid difference, hard to contact uber, no mention when they will reply either and there's no message history? üòëüòí

review: I ordered a delivery through the McDonalds app and UberEats were responsible for delivering it.  They didn't deliver it and they refused to give me a refund.  McDonalds are adamant that UberEats are responsible for refunding but they will not entertain it.  They refused to contact the driver to see where he'd delivered it, the driver wouldn't answer the phone when I tried calling them, they had a photo of a doorstep where the food was left but wouldn't provide the photo to me and wouldn't allow me to send them a photo of my doorstep for comparison.  They also advised that they have no complaints department so I can't take it any further.  Absolute joke of a company.  Avoid at all costs.  I will be taking this further.
name: KE

review: What‚Äôs the purpose of putting delivery instructions in your profile if they are not going to respect them. I clearly have please meet me at the door and hand me the food.  In addition to my food I ordered an orange Fanta as well.  Well the app said the driver is 1 min away. Well it said that for 5 mins.  I just happen to go to the door to look out to see if they were out there and I saw my food sitting on the ground with ants around the bag.  And the orange Fanta was clear‚Ä¶go figure.  So I picked everything up and came in the house. The beve to waste on my hand and it tasted like seltzer water.  The only thing I could eat was the wings because they were in a covered box everything else was in the little open boat containers and I don‚Äôt know if anything crawled in them.  I tried calling the driver and it went to voicemail. So I contacted customer service through chat.  They gave me a 4-5 paragraph apology and a $2 credit.  Well the beverage it‚Äôs self was $3.39.  So I texted back and inquired what was the $2 for when the beverage was $3.39 their response was we‚Äôve credited your account with $2 is anything else we can help you with.  So needless to say I will go back to DOORDASH!!!   I will not be using Uber Eats again. They can take those $2 and give them to someone else!
name: Wanda Jones

review: We used Uberests in uk. Had a great experience every time we ordered food was delivered in a timely manner.
name: VS

review: They have the absolute worst customer service in Canada than I have seen across any other country where they are present.

review: Ordered 5 chicken select ¬£14.92 with dips and milk. Got no delivery at all. I walked 3 miles to get it myself. Uber sent message thanking for order. Driver must have eaten my meal. I have no pin and they think I had order. Awful and have shut down account. Never using them again.

review: Terrible customer service & delivery service.I ordered food to my office when I was working late, something I have done countless times. As I see the driver approach I go to stand outside the building and wait. I get a notification that the driver has arrived but I see from the map that he is more than 1 street over. I receive a call where the driver was talking to me but I could not understand anything (unfortunately he had a thick accent and his english wasn't very good - not the driver's fault but made communication difficult). Therefore I told him to switch to chat, where I typed instructions as to how to reach my office, even giving the store in front as reference. No reply. Tried to call the driver. No reply. Eventually receive a notification that the driver had delivered my food with a picture of my delivery left in the streets of London! Nowhere near original location.I have a picture of where he left the food (on the London pavement next to what looks like an iron gate to I don't know where - clearly not an office or a private address) and the map location, which is miles off delivery address. Despite this, they would not refund me the order. I am out 20 pounds with no food to show for it. Awful service. I will go back to Deliveroo for now.

review: Uber eats had a 50% off fruit and veg on Mondays promotion. When I tried to use it, it wasn't available, I thought maybe it's because I've used this promo before. So, I asked my partner to look, it wasn't on his either, but, there was a ¬£15 discount voucher available for him to use. We clicked on that and looked at the available stores, we selected our store and ordered our shop. The discount was applied and the total was ¬£23.49. Uber Eats however, after the transaction, has decided he couldn't use that discount on that transaction, so, they have taken ¬£38.49 from his bank account. We would not have ordered those items paying that price but the voucher cancelled out the over priced items and the fees so ¬£23.49 was acceptable. We contacted UE straight away and they initially said it was just a pending amount and not the actual amount that would be taken. Then when it has actually cleared from the bank and we contacted them again, they have said that discount wasn't applicable on that transaction so tough. How can anybody ever trust a discount code with them ever again if they can just change their mind after the event?
name: LD

review: I got sent an email with a ¬£15 off voucher for groceries over the value of ¬£25. I clicked on the link and found my store placed an order which showed the ¬£15 off only to find that they reneged on the discount and took the full amount after it had shown the discounted price. Now they tell me that this store was not in their promo, so why didn't it say that at checkout and why did it give the impression that it was OK at checkout only to change it later.
name: NN

review: If I could give zero stars I would!Customer service useless driver changed after me chasing my order for being an hour late.This company needs closing! The service is getting worse!

review: Tried to cancel the renewal 1 day before the new cycle of uber one , got money deducted from account , they confirmed the cancellation but they said the fee was non-refundable . Also they trick you into subscribing to uber one with all kind of promotions and then you see they are not available in your area and on top of that you need to spend at least 15¬£ every single time to benefit from the savings and most of the time its not that big of a deal so stick with paying the fee you will save money in the long run .
