review: Everything was great. Food was on time as promised and it was hot and deliouse
name: TT

review: The driver stole my food they were in my street then cancelled the order just to take it for them selfs and when I contacted uber eats about it all they said is sorry for the driver being unprofessional and give me a refund but that's not good enough I get nothing for the inconvenience and GET NO FOOD if I wanted to cook I wouldn't of ordered in the first place and won't take the drivers account down so they will just do it again if it's a big enough order for them to take absolute waste of time ( drivers name was SHAFIA)
name: IA

review: absolutely terrible service. refused to fix their own problems.I ordered ¬£30 worth of mcdonals from uber yesterday. 2 meals for me and my partner. firstly my big tasty arrived without tomato, it says no tomato on the label and i most definitly did not ask for that, the whole reason i like the burger is because of the tomato.  My partner ordered the chicken selects meal along with a fruit bag. when the order arrives there are no chicken selects and there is no fruit bag. they INSTEAD sent a triple cheese burger and a chicken mayo without any topping and cheese added to it.... How on EARTH did the restaurant think that was an okay replacement. he is LACTOSE INTOLERANT so was not able to eat any of the meal. i also ordered an apple pie which never arrived. at first i thought i was given the wrong order. the the bag receipt is correct, its just whomever packed the order clearly cannot read and should not be working with food! I took pictures of everything replaced and of the receipt and UBER have refused to refund me a couple times. so here i am. DO NOT ORDER WITH UBER EATS, DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY, TIME AND STRESS

review: The delivery arrived at exactly the time the app said it would. The driver was friendly and everything was just as I ordered and the price was great.
name: KE

review: I was so nice I'm a handicap so getting ordered out things are hard for me and I usually have a family member to cook but everyone was just to busy and uber eats came in most handy for me ppl are so kind on time and very professional thank you very much

review: Quick and easy! My favorite part is the huge selection!!

review: A friend gave me $100 Uber Eats gift card as a gift. I normally don't order food delivery. I am now sold and see what the big deal is about Uber Eats and am so happy because their delivery simplifies my life.

review: Prompt. Courteous driver.

review: Used uber eats for a while but never again. Ordered a Macdonald's on the Macdonald's app who deliver via uber eats. Driver claims he delivered order but nothing arrived. I asked to see a copy of picture taken or I could send a picture of my front door. Was told they cannot send emails or receive them!! Awful customer service. Cancelled uber eats account and will be making a complaint to the retail ombudsman as clearly this happens to alot of people after reading other reviews and they simply get away with it

review: Couldn‚Äôt make a purchase due to a server error. I lost voucher money. Customer service never helped.

review: The best part is the food was really yummy that night.  Hot and fresh tasting.  It took a little wile for the driver to get it to us but it still was good.Funny thing was,even after the 40% discount I still paid as much as the regular price because of the inflated delivery and service fees.

review: Maritza who made the delivery was kind and prompt.  The food was delicious too!

review: We ordered food and a whole burger was missing. Same thing happened from the same place last week. Instead of refunding the missing item, they placed a restriction on my husband's account. This means we paid for an item we didnt receive. Uber clearly state that they help with missing items and that's what the restaurants say. Unless they are small businesses who take responsibility as they can't afford bad reviews. This is a clear violation of consumer rights and I look forward to watching them get sued. Maybe we should get together online and go to court. Absolutely ridiculous and I haven't had dinner because of them.
name: SH

review: Uber was very timely!!
name: JW

review: Just so you all know. This mother #%% just stole my 11 year old son money. They never picked up his food from restaurant they didn‚Äôt get responsible for the action instead said they don‚Äôt refund any transaction and that that‚Äôs how they process everything. Pieces of shj%% fools.
name: Lesdi minueza

review: Uber eats hasn‚Äôt refunded any of my money even thought customer service has claimed that I would receive my money within 5-10 business days. They‚Äôve done this with me more than once.
name: SK

review: Buyer Beware we ordered a Chinese meal for 2 after a busy day at work.  We waited and waited and eventually got a call from a cyclist who could not speak a word of English.  After overhearing on the phone delivering to the wrong address he dumped the food and sent a pin picture of where we could find it. We made our way to the spot only to find absolutely nothing.  SHAME ON YOU UBER EATS WHO REFUSED TO REFUND OUR MONEY EVEN THOUGH WE PROVIDE PHOTO EVIDENCE.  never again

review: My experiences have been awesome! Uber eats is the best platform to use for delivering food. I love the discount and Uber One is amazing it helps you save a lot! I would highly recommend anyone to use Uber Eats always! Thank you for everything .
name: EU

review: I was a regular customer, ordering food with Uber Eats until today. I have ordered food, & delivery driver never appeared infront of door. He even didnt bother calling. I kept waiting, he then updated the order as completed then I called him through Uber Support and his mobile went into voice mail. I have raised this with Uber Eats Support & shockingly they said driver waited for the specific time and refund cannot be made. I hope he ate my food somewhere near my house & enjoyed. However, the pathetic support team didnt even bother listening to what I was saying & kept telling me refund cannot be made. I am never going to order with Uber Eats as they cannot understand the issues with Customer and siding with their riders. & Riders are scamming the customers.
name: HU

review: Uber eats serviceThe order was done very timelyWell packedProfessional  rider
name: DW

review: Would give 0 stars if I could. Been stealing money from my account since July. First were apologetic and told me they're trying to fix it. Then turned around and told me I have a 'duplicate' account which is subscribed to their Uber One subscription. Absolute lies as they do not want to return my money taken from me. review: I ordered my first taco bell with Uber eats and I was really looking forward to it!! We waited and the delivery guy came. I was stood at my front door. I also have a ring cam which recorded the whole event! He drove up, looked at me and then drove right past and carries on even though I shouted to him as I saw his photograph and car on the app! I got no food that night and he wouldn't answer his phone to rectify! He said he delivered to 62 to Uber in a statement after I complained, after a lot of trouble finding it, through terrible user interface design on the app, even though there isn't a number 62 on my street lol and I wrote 48 in the app ( I know my own address lol! I think it was his first time with Taco Bell as well tbh and he could not resist it. Maybe he was hungry I don't know? I couldn't contact Uber but eventually I received a refund but with no recompense or apology and -¬£40 down and hungrier for 3 days! Very unpleasant experience which I have never had with deliveroo or just eat yet! I still haven't tried Taco Bell!

review: If I could give no stars I would. I have had nearly ¬£28.34 stolen. My partner discriminated on the telephone and refused to put me through to a manager. I ordered mcdonalds which arrived stone cold and missing an item. As a result I go to restaurant to sort it out despite paying delivery. Restaurant really helpful and inform me to complain to uber for a full refund.At this point I re order and pay for it. Return home, contact uber who quickly inform me that due to the driver collecting it and delivering it "in time" that I have to accept this fact but they will refund me ¬£2.36 for the missing burger. I then speak with a manager, mentioning firstly the discriminatory comment, which I get no apology for. I then get spoken down too regarding the policy is only the 1 burger.I challenge this as ridiculous! And after returning to the store a second time, i am made aware that the driver had clicked to say 3 minutes away and he was not ! Hence the "acceptable stone cold meal". Committed to what is morally right, I contact uber again in a bid to speak to a different employee, who initially seemed OK and i explained the issue, I then asked to speak with manager regarding new info, to be told you get one chance to speak to a manager, and that I have to accept the ¬£2.63 refund for a ¬£28.34 meal in which none of it was edible. (More likely while I was on hold waiting for my second call with a manager, she had explained the new info to the manager, and the policy suddenly changed because I was right) I am completely shocked and disgusted that a company such as uber can absolutely rip you off and steal your money !

review: I order a lot from Uber Eats, several times a week.  But their business is getting sloppy.  I‚Äôve had cold food in the past, but my order last night was like it had been in the fridge.  It was fairly cool outside, and the delivery person showed up on a bicycle!!! Not with a hot bag either, just the paper take out bag, flapping in the wind.  I contacted customer service several times.  I kept getting disconnected.  I asked for a supervisor, but I was told there were none available.  I was also told one would call me later in the evening.  They didn‚Äôt.  What an absolute scam.Lately, the delivery time changes several times.  And then you get a message that your order is on the way, but the driver has a few stops.  Translation: your food will be so cold you may as well have eaten out of the garbage.  Such a shame.  It was a good service originally.  I opened a PayPal case to try to get a refund.  The food was so cold it wasn‚Äôt edible.

review: I placed an order worth ‚Ç¨50, adding to the over 20 orders I've made throughout this year, on my Uber Eats account created in Nov 2017 (as soon as it opened in Lisbon).I can count on one hand the number of times I've spoken to support due to minor issues, such as incorrect or missing items. Every time, the support team was extremely attentive and resolved the problem.On this order dated 4th of September, one of the products was Salmon Tartare. The product description reads: "Shari, Salmon, and avocado cream", and the image clearly shows a generous layer of avocado cream covering the Tartare.Unfortunately, to my astonishment when I received the tartare, it only contained two ingredients, rice and salmon.I immediately contacted support to report the issue, expecting they would offer a fair compensation, as they always had the few times I experienced similar problems.To my surprise, Uber Eats' support this time dismissed any responsibility, stating that "merchants might not include condiments if they are not listed on the menu." When I replied that it wasn't a condiment, but a missing ingredient, and that it was clearly not only in the image but in the description, they responded that "Although we know this wasn't the experience you were expecting, unfortunately, we can't issue a refund."Following this unfortunate reply, on 5/09, I asked to speak with a supervisor and have since been ignored. Attached, I'm sending the photo of the product from the shop vs. what I received, as well as the exchanged messages. To conclude, I'd like to mention that the cost of the Tartare is ‚Ç¨6.50, in an order of ‚Ç¨49.39, which makes this whole sad situation even more ridiculous.
name: Jo√£o Ricardo Silva

review: Bloody company, i ordered one thing from mc d and other thing was in cart of different restaurant after getting mc order, they directly confirmed other one in the cart which I never confirmed and money gone out of my card, bloody nonsense company never order anything again, spoiled my day

review: I'm fuming, I can't get out the house so I ordered a few grocery items using my last ¬£20 and 8.30am, delivery should of been with me by 8.50am (I know its an estimated time) the latest arrival should of been 9.20am anyway I received an email at 9.10am saying my food had been delivered, I hadn't received any delivery, I tried to ring the delivery driver and also messaged him and I think he blocked my number, so at this point I'm ¬£20 down and still not received my groceries, I tried to contact uber eats but an automated person said they priorities orders that are still processing and as my account said it was delivered I wasn't a priority and was told to email them and they would get back to me 24hours later, im sorry but this wasn't got enough as on my shopping list was breakfast for my 2year old, I rang morrisons (I know its not their fault) and a lovely lady spoke to me and told me it was actually her that got my order ready, she said the driver was very abrupt with her and actually made her feel uncomfortable, she said to leave it with her and she would see what she can do, she rang me back an hour later and said she got intouch with uber eats and they should be contacting me, they did message saying that morrisons had contacted them on my behalf and if I needed any assistance then not to hesitate to message back, within minutes I messaged back to explain my situation, this was at 10.50am, its now 1pm and they've not replied back!!I've lost my last ¬£20 until i next get paid (which is still 3days away) and I still have nothing in for breakfast!! My 2year old went without breakfast because of a selfish uber eats driver that either stollen my food or delivered to someone else (I can't get out the house to be knocking on all the houses on my street to see if it was delivered elsewhere). I'm absolutely devastated that I put my trust into this company! Looks like my kid is having chips for breakfast for the next to days!, I litterally don't know what else to do as i have no family or friends that can help me. I won't be using uber eats again, their drivers have no customer service skills and the actual company customers services are just as bad for Not responding! I'm absolutely gutted and fuming!!!!!

review: For a few months, I had a monthly membership that was $9.99/m. Out of no where, I was charged $60 for an annual membership(this was in July 2023). I never changed or canceled my monthly membership, nor authorized to be charged for the annual membership. I chocked it up to a glitch, contacted customer service, and they refunded me. I continued my monthly membership for 9.99 for a month, then decided to cancel it all together, because I wasn't using it enough to justify paying for it. Woke up today to a 14.99 charge from UberOne on my bank account. [Follow along, because this get confusing]. Contacted customer service, asked for a cancellation and refund. I was told because I had already been refunded in the past(that annual membership I never signed up for), that they wouldn't refund me. So I asked why it was 14.99 instead of the monthly 9.99, he told me it was for a 3-month membership and I was "only charged 14.99 instead of the standard 30 for three months" as if I should be appreciative. He then explained it as "You canceled the annual membership, but kept your monthly membership, so you were charged for a 3 month membership." EXPLAIN to me how that makes sense. I never should have been charged for the annual. I shouldn't have been charged for the 3 months, after canceling it all together. And I shouldn't have been charged for 3 months PERIOD because I never signed up for it. He and I went around in circles for 15 minutes then he hung up the chat. review: Just awful. There is no level of customer service with Uber at all. Their automated management of delivery can easily be hacked by lazy drivers and then Uber refuses to give you any compensation. Recently had a driver call up, rude, ‚Äúwhere‚Äôs your house‚Äù, like the guy doesn‚Äôt have sat nav and I haven‚Äôt given exact instructions. Hangs up on me, connection is awful. Then says he‚Äôs at my house waiting on the app - ‚Äúdelivered, waiting‚Äù in Ubers eyes, but actually you can see him still cycling around the neighbourhood on the app. Then I am connected to the driver x3 and he hangs up on me. But they only care about the wait time data, which is easily hacked by bad drivers. There is no cx, you can‚Äôt talk to anyone. They always side with the awful drivers they have too. Never using again. Deleting the app. Deliveroo is way better. Uber are literally thieves.

review: I placed an order and the driver picked up the wrong food. The restaurant called me to let me know. I reached out to the driver with no luck so left him a message. I immediately reached out to ubereats to ask them to get in touch with the driver and get him to turn around. They outright refused to and said the order has to complete. I complained and said that‚Äôs a waste of food, time and fuel. They can call him and stop this. They still refused. They said they won‚Äôt help me until the order completed then cut the chat. I reached out again. The new rep said he was looking into it. The driver decided not to cancel the order but waited for it to automatically complete. The moment this happened, the Uber rep said they can‚Äôt help because the order is live. Completely different to what the previous rep said. Then he cut that chat. I reached out for help to say my order was not delivered. They said it was and I won‚Äôt be assisted. That I would be emailed. I‚Äôm waiting for my dinner! I need immediate conversation not an email. So I called the restaurant and told them I will place a single item order so they get another driver. Uber then gave me a massive charge for a small order. I then used this opportunity to reach out again to chat to explain what was happening and to raise a complaint. I provided screenshot evidence. The rep said since it‚Äôs not a live order they won‚Äôt help and they closed it immediately. This is what happens when you support  or are forced to rely on disgusting firms like this. Deliveroo would never have let this happen!

review: Don‚Äôt bother. We won‚Äôt be using Uber Eats again. At least not for our local Pizza Express (Muswell Hill). Hard to tell who‚Äôs really at fault but neither side knows what the other is doing. We waited 2 hours for one pizza for my daughter; Uber Eats have no customer service to speak of, of course. The app just takes you round in circles, getting nowhere except to the same unhelpful generic pages. At the 2 hour point, we drive to Pizza Express, where they looked up the order on their system and it showed the pizza had been picked up by Uber Eats, even though our app was still saying waiting for pick up, and moving the estimated time on by 10 mins every 10 mins. The Pizza Express people said they get problems every night with Uber Eats where drivers don‚Äôt bother to wait (or can‚Äôt, due to parking restrictions) so no one picks up the order; or it gets picked up but doesn‚Äôt make it to the customer. In the end we managed to cancel our order and Pizza Express made my daughter a fresh pizza, which took about one minute, and we were out of there, vowing to not bother with Uber Eats ever again. If this was an isolated incident, I wouldn‚Äôt have written this review, but the exact same thing happened last time we ordered from the same Pizza Express - also a 2 hour wait, also ended up with us picking up the pizza ourselves. So, like I say: never again.

review: Refusal to refund a food safety issue September 9th, 2023Today I ordered blueberries and raspberries as well as some frozen items from Target using Uber eats. When I went to wash the raspberries there was some mold outside but mold inside most of the raspberries. I took a picture and asked customer service to either refund the money or call Target so that I could pick up some good raspberries this week. They refused both and said there was nothing they could do. So use Uber eats to shop or dine in at your own risk. Yesterday when I ordered the same two items I did not get either of them so some of their shoppers need training. Before that, a shopper brought me tuna in a paper pack instead of chicken in a can. This is in spite of having photos of the items they are shopping for. Uber eats repeatedly asked me to give the shopper today a bad rating but that would not be fair to him as the mold may not have been something he would know to look for. Now this is interesting as Uber eats has no problem asking the customer to poorly rate the shopper when that person needs to make a living. Target would reimburse Uber eats for bad product but Uber eats does not consider it worth their time and would rather have food safety issues they refuse to address and poor customer relations. Beware big tech.

review: Company of 5 coming at Noon, expected delivery 1 pm.Restaurant said food must be ordered by UberEATS.Placed order at 12:30pm.  Screen info showed map with UberEASTs at starting point. Never left the restaurant. Delivery time changed by the 1/2 hour. 2 hours later called the restaurant and was told that the order had been delivered and verified.  NEVER GOT IT.  They agreed to refill the order and to choose a different delivery time.  This put us at 2:30 pm.  The first delivery person disappeared and a new one had to be called by the name of LEE.  I called LEE and got a recorded message. Another new delivery time was posted 3:30 Left a message telling him about the problem and wanted him to call me.  Never called. Another message that the order had been CANCELLED. Order had been paid for when order was placed of $95.  Manager at the restaurant was very accomodating.  The first order was verified as delivered.  Manager completed the order again for free with a few additional items.  We picked it up at 4:30 pm.  It was fresh and hot all within 1/2 hour.DON'T EVER USE Uber EATS for delivery.  Yes we probably waited too long.  But the Manager was very polite, provided fast service and provided a few additions to the order.  And our order was FREE.

review: I've been having issues with Uber Eats for months. Lately, almost every order I've placed has had some kind of issue, whether it is missing items or incorrect items or food quality issues (my last order was missing one of the five chicken fingers that was supposed to be in the box, it had an incorrect - and smaller size - side, and an incorrect - and smaller size - drink from what I paid for). Uber used to be pretty decent at providing a refund or a credit when these issues occurred, so I kept using the service, but now they have stopped issuing any sort of credit or refund, stating that "this order isn't eligible for refund at this time". I've spoken to multiple customer service reps asking why it was not eligible, and none of them were willing to say anything more than the same canned response that the previous agent gave me. Finally, after hours of back and forth and complaining, a customer service manager came on, and... they said the same damn thing. I had to press again for more clarification, and finally, a manager said that it was due to "excessive" refund requests. I explained to the manager that I only request a refund when there is an issue with my order, and lately, their drivers have been causing "excessive" issues with delivering what I've ordered, which has caused me to reach out to customer service on multiple occassions. Uber is clearly not willing to correct the reported issues with their drivers and would prefer to punish their customers for choosing to pay them money to use their service rather than making things right. I suppose some of the blame is on me for continuing to use their service after having issues, but in the past issues had been few and far between with Uber Eats (especially compared to their competitors in my area), so I was hoping that this was a fluke, but sadly, it is now apparent that this is the new norm.
name: Joshua Beck

review: So often things are missing or damaged and the waiting times are all a lie ! They never show up within the times they have said
name: John Dring

review: Absolutely no way of contacting them what so ever! Customer support is non existent. Signed up as a genuine new customer and a couple of weeks later I had email for ¬£10 off my first 3 orders over ¬£20 spend. All the family gathered tonight to make a big order and surprise surprise none of the codes worked! We tried and tried and gave up. There‚Äôs not even a contact number or nothing to call up. Ruined our family night. You should be shut down absolute disgrace of a company if you can even call yourselves that? Useless!!!
name: AM

review: Uber Eats has terrible customer service. If your driver brings you the wrong or missing item, and it happens frequently, they will more often times than not refuse to give you a refund. It is illegal to charge for a product that you didn't get. They can improve through hiring better employees by giving them better income, so the mistakes are unlikely to happen. They can also refund you when your order is wrong. Perhaps, they should implement a system where the restaurant is required to submit a photo of the order, so it's obvious if the order was wrong or something was missing. It may not be a perfect system as it relies on driver honesty and puts in an extra step for busy restaurants, but if they're not going to trust the customer when they say they didn't get something, it's the least they can do.
name: JE

review: Very good! In future I use this service.

review: Delays, poor CS, entirely wrong time estimates, drivers who take a tour of half the city before dropping off your cold, probably inedible, meal, and a distinct lack of english fluency from their drivers. This is bordering on a scam and I fully believe they should be treated as such.Uber Eats is so bad it's a scam. Never pay for priority, it's literally just a scam.

And handed a bag over got another taxi home. To realise they hadnt cooked fresh food. So all food had been left too sweat burgers were wet. Chips were a pile of mush. Only thing that was consumed was the can drinks. All went in the bin. And im going round in circles trying to get a refund. Absolute joke.and then had the cheek to restrict my uber account

review: In Uber Eats, you only have 3-5 seconds to cancel your order and not pay a cancellation fee. This is very ridiculous! How come such a big company didn't think of this?!!!! At least after the final registration of the order, an opportunity of 1-2 minutes should be given so that if there is a mistake in the order, the order can be canceled without cancellation fee. It means that when the order is registered and the restaurant confirms it, the restaurant will start preparing after 2 minutes. It is very strange that as soon as the restaurant accepts the order, it is written in the software that the restaurant is in the middle of preparation, and from then on there is no turning back!! If anyone wants to cancel their order at this point, they will have to waive all the money they paid for the food, because it will all be charged for the cancellation fee, and that's too bad!!!! A few days ago I paid more than 170 dollars for the cancellation fee, I canceled my order in exactly less than a minute, but because three seconds after placing the order, it was written that the restaurant is preparing!! And when I talked to them, they only replied that the restaurant had prepared your food!!! How is it possible ?!! We all know that in restaurants, food preparation starts more than 5 minutes after placing the order!!! This is a scam!!! It is better to change the rules, I will not use Uber from now on.

review: If anyone in my group the night I used Uber eats was in a state to drive, we would have been so much better off driving to the place we got food from. We were initially given an estimate that it would take 20-30 min to get our food, with a maximum delivery time that was about 50 minutes later. Our order time kept getting delayed and went beyond the "maximum delivery time." The actual restaurant itself was a fast food place with a drive thru that 10 min from us, so I think that the platform just had trouble finding a driver. The food was cold by the time it got to us. I only used UberEats because I had a 60% off coupon, but based on how much more expensive the food is on the uber platform, I will not be ordering from Uber eats without a coupon because of how bad the experience was.

review: My neighbour in the road opposite me ordered from Uber eats. However, the delivery driver got the wrong address. This has been happening more regularly over the past two weeks and when I answered the door I asked them what address they were looking for. They told me, and I said they had the wrong address and closed the door. The young man delivering apologised. However, the guy in the car shouted to me and told me I was very rude. I opened the door and told him I wasn‚Äôt being rude. I was just stating that they had the wrong address and shouted at me that it‚Äôs not his problem  and I said it was his problem because he read the wrong address to which he drove off shouting ‚Äú go f@%# yourself you thick b#%*^‚Äù. This was all captured on my ring camera. I was not rude I was not verbally abusive and yet I got spoken to in a very unwelcome manner. If I spoke to one of my customers in my organisation like that I would be fired immediately. I will no longer be a customer UberEATS.

review: Delivery is expensive.  I will never order in Uber.

review: I ordered a food shop from Asda and booked express delivery for some strange reason my order was split into 2 (which the driver I saw said he had never heard of before and couldn‚Äôt understand why)  1 driver who was really helpful turned up with some of my order the other driver never turned up atall‚Ä¶I ordered 115 items and out of that I was missing 86 of those items. Asda confirmed that the other driver picked up that part of my order also witnessed by the other driver who said that he had left before him. So basically the other driver stole ¬£170 worth of my shopping, I am absolutely disgusted in what I have experienced today as majority of what wasn‚Äôt delivered was for my daughter who has severe allergies and obviously now the supermarkets are shut I am unable to get her stuff as it‚Äôs not stocked in convenience stores.As I say the driver who did deliver part of my order was very helpful and stood and spoke to me and tried his best to see if he could track down the other driver but was unable to and talked me through what to do about contacting Asda who also have been very helpful.I am not sure if you will be able to track down this driver but I feel he should take some responsibility for what he has done as I am probably not the only person! I did try to call to talk to somebody but because I didn‚Äôt have an ‚Äúactive order‚Äù the call abruptly ended. Also tried emailing this to every email I have found online for Uber eats but none of them seem to work!Obviously I can keep going on about how disgusted I am with this one particular person and that he thinks it is acceptable to take someone else‚Äôs food shop that they have paid for..But this also looks very bad on you as a company that certain drivers can‚Äôt be trusted.I would hope that they would contact me for more information to be able to look into this just to ensure that someone else doesn‚Äôt experience what I have today and end up going without things they desperately need for their children!

review: Uber eats is a wonderful platform that has grown a lot but it still has a little ways to go. This was the first meal in about five meals that I've ordered off of Uber eats that was actually pleased with everything I bought. I wish that I could say that about all the items I've ever bought on Uber eats with the truth is a lot of things just don't deliver correctly or well. Also some of them have just been something I can simply make it home / very unimpressive. Like The Rice bowl company I ordered food from it felt very basic and dry and I was not pleased. This last company the Thai food restaurant was amazing and I would order online from them multiple times. But I wouldn't know unless I ordered from them before. That's the problem with Uber eats it is a wonderful platform to get things delivered I wish sometimes they would do restaurants further away and just make you pay a small fee because there are some restaurants that are far away that I can't access but I was still pay for knowing that the food would be like colder and I wouldn't care less if it was from my very favorite place. But I digress. This platform is wonderful I even got free delivery for the first time and I don't know how long. But it did help with making the choice of whether or not I was going to actually order delivery. Because sometimes the fees and everything after it all adds up plus tax just makes me say all right I'm going to make bowl of ramen. I will say that I checked my email and I had several emails that I let expire for multiple Uber eats deals. So if you're a person who doesn't mind the emails when you do want to use them they do have plenty of promotional codes offers and everything else. That I will give them an A+ on. I wonder if they do tests on the restaurant as far as does it deliver well within the radius that it says it can.
name: SW

review: I got my food quickly and it was still hot. I wish there were more restaurants in my area that use Uber Eats because I would use it more often.

review: A few times have received the wrong order and was told we can't always be promised condiments when they were actually part of the salad in subway and made no senseThey came to deliver from a cafe and went to the wrong location and only attempted to call me once and then called to tell me they were leaving.. they took the food back and still charged me!!!! review: Worst experience and waste of money. I was unwell and ordered food with Ubereats. I used it because I had a voucher for delivery which wouldn‚Äôt apply unless I had it delivered so I thought great I‚Äôm ill. I paid ¬£16 with a ¬£5 discount. The food left the store at 8:40 and I received just after 9:30. The driver was driving around and around and spoke little english. When I went outside to collect my food in my pjs he had my food in his hand with no insulated bag and was just stood there. He had logged on his side he was at the delivery but he wasn‚Äôt even at my address. Once I had walked the few mins Back my food was freezing cold I contacted Uber who said they are sorry my food wasn‚Äôt at the temperature I wanted and thank you for the feedback. review: After a long day I ordered at 7.15pm, the delivery was estimated at 20 minutes, perfect as I was hungry.My driver was assigned but didn‚Äôt move for 40 minutes. My driver then got changed 4 times!! I contacted customer services and they said I could cancel but at this time there was a driver at the restaurant and I was so hungry so I said no, but I did want my money back for the inconvenience. As soon as I said that my order got cancelled (I suspect by customer services), the chat disappeared and I was left feeling very hangry! I will not be using ubereats again.
name: EL

review: Uber decided to limit my delivery options because they said and I quote, "to many items being returned to store"  "too many items undeliverable"! So if a customer is not available for instance I went to a guarded community and the customer was unavailable and guard would not let me through.  I called twice, he called twice and I waited but couldn't wait to long I had 12 other deliveries.  Just like UPS or FEDEX they don't wait they have a timed schedule.  The other day (2 days ago) I had a delivery to one address but 8 of the items had to be scanned separate. Essentially that means the customer order each item separately.  I knew this was very odd and unusual so I called the customer.   The delivery address was to Garden Grove, CA and the customer who's acct got charged lives in NY.  She said I tried to contact Walmart to tell them I have fraud on my bank acct.  I said OH Nooooo so I told her I will take them all back to Walmart.  She said thank you.  Mind you WE DON'T GET PAID FROM UBER IF NOT RETURNED.  I had to return no only the customer that had the Guarded gate community home but the fraud items which totalled 9 items.  Gee I thought I was doing a good deed by calling her to let her know something was fishy.  I returned the items and I did call UBER Customer Service.  She documented it for me and said you will get pad for returning them.  Im thinking ok like $5 or $10 bucks.  my total delivery and believe me these are SLAVE WAGES,  $25 for 6 different cities and I drove ALL OVER the place like usual.  Honestly im almost losing money because inflation.  I take the items back to Walmart.  Two days later Uber puts a message on my acct.  We are limiting your delivery options because WE FOUND FRAUD ON YOUR ACCT.  WOW........Now doesn't that just sound coincidental!!! I return a bunch of items but then all of a sudden fraud on MY ACCT.  So I wait a day.  Today this morning I got a message from Uber stating You can no longer do CERTAIN DELIVERIES.  Which now LIMITS MY INCOME EVEN MORE!!! So I document my delivery by copying my deliveries I did the other day and how much they paid me.  VERY STRANGE I got paid $86 dollars instead of $25 for returning them to Walmart.  I asked myself why so much more?  but Im slaving daily so I graciously accept it of course.  Ive done 1700 deliveries for this slave job!  Then I look at the full payment for Uber as well.  OMG they made a lot of money from this Whole fraud thing!!! A LOT!!!! Then I asked myself "who pays for all this"?  does Walmart lose money and pay Uber??? Or is the poor lady who's acct information was stolen pay for all those fees and it was like $102 dollars SOMEONE LOST because of fraud on the poor ladies acct. Uber made a total of $156.80 for all deliveries.  I wish I could have saved her number to make sure she didn't get screwed.  Another lady that day was not home and in a gated community I couldn't get into and called and no answer.To sum it up "IM THE ONE" being punished because if someone isn't available and I can't access their property to drop off their item and or now these fraud items being returned its MY fault  for any given reason I could not legitimately deliver.  Now Im not allowed to do Walmart deliveries.  That was a good chunk of my income taken away from me for reasons not my fault.  Thats not all I noticed they get out of paying the "healthcare stipend" by not accepting my healthcare insurance card"  ITS INSURANCE!!! they keep asking me to send them a photo of it for 2 years now they won't accept it.  No answer as to why!  I don't like that Uber NEVER has a HR dept.,  NO MANAGER TO TALK TO, NO MESSAGING AREA unless you have an ongoing conversation about an issue, you only get to deal with these out of country foreign customer service people that you barely understand the accent.  SUCH SCAMMERS!  They get the scammer award of the year in my onion.  THANKS UBER FOR TREATING YOUR BEST "DIAMOND" UBER DELIVER LIKE CRAP (A SLAVE) THANKS A LOT..... Ive only done OVER 1600 deliveries for you.  I have a 95% satisfaction, 71% acceptance and 9% cancel (waiting too long at restaurant) my percent would be higher but with the economy I can't afford to take every single delivery
name: Tina Welton Husted

review: There is absolutely no help if your order is missing items/doesn't arrive etc.  The "support" team are not interested in helping and we have had multiple orders where we've paid for food we never got.  Stick to deliveroo/Just Eat.

review: Ordering fast food from Uber eats while I'm sick in bed with covid went fine so I thought I'd try grocery delivery, since i can't go anywhere myself. Big mistake. They overcharged me by over $50 and several items were missing. Customer service insisted that the shopper tried to contact me with changes - a total lie. I had my phone in my hand the whole time (what else do you do when you have covid?). They actually made me take a picture of the cheese they brought (it was the wrong cheese and cost 3x more than what was ordered). Then the part where it allows you to rate your order was suspiciously unavailable, meaning I couldn't even claw back any of the overly generous tip I'd given. They did promise a partial refund ($28) but my experience is ruined and I just feel sicker now from the stress of it.

review: Quick delivery. Delivery person very pleasant.

review: Good customer service. Drivers have been professional, friendly and courteous!

review: Order online at approx 6:20pm & advised delivery approx 7pm. Driver phoned with very thick accent & all I could make out was he was asking for password which was provided. As this was my first order I assumed he needed it to collect my order. At 7:45 I phoned restaurant to be advised order collected quite a while ago. Couldn‚Äôt work out how to contact driver or Uber. At 8:15pm found my order at my front door. It must have been there in the cold for 60mins. Order was cold & now soggy. Driver didn‚Äôt ring the door bell. He just dropped the order at the door.  Told by my adult daughter later that driver phones on arrival but as I couldn‚Äôt understand what he was saying when he phoned. Poor communication.  Very unhappy with lack of customer service. Our dinner was terrible & very late & binned. I should have just phoned direct & ordered.

review: I spendt 45 dollars on a dinner ordered through uber eats. when i opened the bags i saw the soup spilled . I didn't see till i tried to eat the rest that ALL the soup had spilled and everything else was soggy with soup. the website makes it difficult to complain. they want a picture. since i had a big mess i took a few pictures. but they'd only let me upload one. it didn't upload so cleaned up the mess and figured i'ed try later. there's no phone number on the website. i called the restaurant and they gave me the number they had. . that number connected me to customer service. when i explained it to her she gave me the corporate smily "I understand"  bs and in the end said. i have to send a picture. I ordered food bcs i was exhausted, now i had to clean up a drippy mess, take out the garbage so it won't atract bugs or mice,  and they expect me to spend more time diddling with the computer. never ever again will i order from ubereats.

review: Title: Disappointing Experience with Uber EatsRating: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ (2/5)I've been a loyal user of the Uber Eats app for a while now, but my recent experience left me extremely disappointed. I ordered food and eagerly awaited its arrival, only to receive it ice-cold.I immediately contacted customer support, hoping for a quick resolution, but to my dismay, my request for a refund was denied. This is unacceptable. As a customer, I expect my food to arrive in the right condition, and when it doesn't, I should have the confidence that the issue will be promptly resolved.The lack of support and refusal to refund for a cold meal has left a sour taste in my mouth. It's disheartening to see such a decline in the quality of service from a platform I used to rely on.I hope Uber Eats takes this feedback seriously and works on improving its customer service and quality control. In the meantime, I'll be exploring other food delivery options that prioritize their customers' satisfaction. üòî #UberEatsReview #ColdFood #CustomerServiceIssues

review: Placed an order through the McDonald's app that came to just over ¬£26, and UberEats was to deliver it. We're sat in the living room keeping an eye out the window for the driver to pull up, and also have a dog who never fails to hear someone approaching the house. Get a text to say it's been delivered. Bit odd that there was no knock, and also that we didn't see or hear anything. Opened the front door and there's nothing there. Called UberEats and they refused to give a refund, as according to them, the delivery was completed without any issues. ¬£26 spent, no takeaway, and essentially called a liar when I contacted customer services. If you don't want the risk of having your evening ruined like this, don't use them. Even the girl at the McDonald's where I placed my order said that things like this happen with UberEats more often than they'd like.

review: I have accidentally signed up for their membership without knowledge. I then canceled it immediately when I realized  and issued a complaint when I saw they charged me. No refund was given so I called my bank. My bank then refunded me the money they took. This was in February 2023 and after this I left Uber Eats. Yesterday I rejoin Uber and connect my card incase I wanna purchase anything. Today is august 2023 I look at my bank account and see $11.29 taken from my account. I contact Uber and ask them why they did this. They explain it‚Äôs because the bank gave me my refund and not them so they are now taking the money that the bank refunded me back. I explained that I resolved the issue with the bank already and they have no right to do this. But I was told that there are no further actions they will take and they won‚Äôt respond to any more messages on the issue. I understand $11.29 isn‚Äôt that much but it‚Äôs the principle. Don‚Äôt connect ur card don‚Äôt buy from them. They scan and they are frauds. (Plus my account has been hacked many times by them before)

review: Just to let everyone know how badly this company treats customers.My grocery delivery tonight was missing one item, a loaf¬†of bread.Cost ¬£1.60.Naturally I reported it to them and they simply refuse to refund the money.I've asked them about 4 times now in private messages to explain the reason and they won't.It's not the amount of money it's the principal involved.And all I get is cut and¬†paste automated type of responses to my question.And no doubt they'll put another similar robot like response to this.And every one of their messages ends with the pathetic 'we appreciate your understanding'.Well I absolutely do not understand their decision and the matter was not resolved earlier.And they've still never told me exactly why I have not been given a refund.My item was not delivered and they've taken the payment for it.For something that they haven't delivered.That is theft.I tried to resolve this in private messages but they wouldn't do the right thing.So I have now cancelled my Uber One subscription and will never order from them again.So for the sake of refunding me ¬£1.60 they've now lost my business for life.That's a pretty poor way to run a company.I would advise anyone thinking of ordering from Uber Eats to think again.There's a very good chance you won't get all your order and they'll take your money and not give you a refund.And treat you like you're nothing.Terrible customer service from an awful company.(Now let's wait for their cut and paste robot like response thanking me for my understanding).

review: Placed an order and it was missing a cheesecake. I contacted UE and they stated they would get back to me as soon as they can. When they finally messaged me, they stated that my order is not eligible for a refund. I replied back multiple times asking why, and I got the same message saying the same thing. I called the next morning and was told that I won't receive a refund now or on any future orders. Apparently, I've had too many already, maybe 6 in 4 yrs, and it has been a long time. How is it my fault anyway, that the restaurants are constantly messing up! Why am I being penalized for it? The restaurant should be held responsible for their mistakes. Maybe even removed from the app, or something, after so many complaints. Not keeping customers money when they mess up smh. Restaurants should be double checking orders prior to going out, seeing how the driver can't. We are relying on the restaurant to get it right and UE to back up their service. UE and restaurants are making money off of us by not giving refunds when they should be, especially for missing and wrong items! I will not be using UE again! Worst customer service ever.

review: The worst ever food delivery company. I wish there was a rating zero rating for me to select. Twice this year Uber Eats drivers did not deliver the food I ordered. They just disappeared off the system. When I contacted Uber Eats on both occasions, the customer support told me that the driver had followed their procedure and had contacted me twice when that was not the case, as they did not ring me at all. Based on this Uber Eats refused to refund my money. They had standard answers every time I communicated with them via the help support. They could not think out of the box. In my opinion, Uber Eats has given their drivers an easy way to steal from customers. They only believe what their driver tell them even when they have taken your food for themselves. There is no accountability. It is so sad that you order food and their drivers steal it and Uber Eats don't do anything.Following the most recent incident, I have had to go to the retailer I ordered from and asked them to investigate and possibly look into not using Uber Eats anymore.

review: I am extremely disappointed with the way Uber Eats has handled my recent order. I placed an order with Eagle Pizza, but the food was not delivered correctly. I tried to resolve the issue with Eagle Pizza directly, but they were unable to do so within 72 hours. Eagle Pizza offered to refund me, but they said they would need to do so through Uber Eats. I contacted Uber Eats, but they refused to refund me because the 48-hour refund window had lapsed.¬†¬†I ordered a Pepperoni Passion Pizza (Double Pepperoni & Double Cheese) on Uber Eats on 12 August 2023. When the pizza arrived, it was dry and had only one or two pepperoni on each slice. There was also very little cheese.¬†¬†I called the restaurant the next day to complain, but the manager was unavailable. I was told that I should have called within 15 minutes of the pizza arriving, but it arrived after closing time. The restaurant offered to send a replacement pizza at 11pm, but it never arrived. I called again the next day to complain about my replacement pizza, and I was again told that the manager was unavailable. The restaurant promised that the replacement pizza would be a priority and that they would send it at 11pm, but it again never arrived. I have decided not to call or chase over a pizza.¬†I explained my circumstances to Uber Eats, but they did not escalate my complaint. I feel like the person I spoke to was incompetent and did not understand my situation. I am very disappointed with the level of customer service I have received from Uber Eats. I will not be using their services again.

review: Extremely unhappy with the service from the driver and the customer service afterwards when I'm trying to resolve my concern. After 2 hours the driver cancelled the order. No call, no reason, nothing. I had to chase up the driver and follow up everything.  He stated that he had collected the food, and had it in his car on the way when he car trouble. After I followed up, he did appologise, however,  no instructions or reasons to follow. I did receive an automated reply from uber stating that the money has been refunded and I can now reorder again and they'll deliver it when possible. Firstly, a 2 hour wait, then it's cancelled. I received a message on my phone that my order was being prepared. Great. Then another message later that it's on the way with the driver. Good. However,  after I had to chase up what was going on, I called the restaurant and they said that the food was never collected and still waiting to be picked up. Not ideal. Then I ordered the same order a second time. Was charged by uber for placing a new order as directed by the "support email". Once again, your order has been collected and on the way by a new driver. Just under 3 hours later we receive the food. When we bring it in. It's stone cold. Further enquiries, the food was never made again, and it was the same food prepared when we placed the order now 3 hours earlier. Unable to consume food or reheat due to moving into a new place and awaiting for appliances to heat, cook or even warm the meals ordered. Hence the reason we ordered in. Now, it's been approximately 11 days and still no positive action has been provided or any customer feedback offered. It seems its all automated. They continue to reply with the same questions, replies,  and responses when I have taken 3 separate attempts to get this rectified. All I want, is a team member to either message me via social media or email to truly attempt to help me. I've waited over a week before submitting this feedback, hoping that after 2 attempts on my end that it'll be resolved. But after a 3rd try from my behalf, I get the same automated questions that I've actioned and answered. Extremely frustrating that a customer needs to follow up Uber Eats mistakes. And after 3 attempts....nothing is done about it.

review: Last night we ordered from a restaurant. I'm not naming or blaming the restaurant because they had the food ready and in the driver's hand on time. Just wanted to get that out of the way. Uber eats is the problem here. This isn't the first time we have had problems with them, but last night they sent me a 50% off coupon and I said let's give it another shot. That was a mistake! I ordered at 5:15pm and the restaurant is only 3.4 miles away. 5:35pm the food was picked up and the app said my delivery person was on a bike which concerned me. The short trip is much longer on a bike, and a trip I wouldn't want to take personally. Also the time for delivery shot up to 6:10pm latest delivery time as they put it. We'll that came and went. I text the driver and they claim to not have my address which I promptly text her. Another few minutes pass and according to the app driver hasn't moved. Uber calls me around 645pm asking if it's ok to give the driver my address. Of course they would need an address to make a delivery, have these people lost their mind? I tell them just cancel and refund my money. They then tell me that's another department. Great so I hang up with them. By now it's 7pm we are hungry and no food according to app this delivery person is just sitting at the gas station, probably eating my food. So I get back on the app to get help finally find the correct combo of buttons to push and they cancel my order. They made sure to let me know i wouldn't be charged for canceling my order! Now this really pissed me off! First of all...if they miss that latest delivery time you are entitled to a full refund. Second trying to make out like they did me some kind of a favor canceling my order for free is BS. I reordered from the restaurant picked it up myself at 725pm and back at the house by 735pm. On top of that I ordered from the restaurant website and avoided all the fees and the food itself was cheaper by almost 5 bucks.
name: HC

review: The restaurant cancelled my order, they said they weren't doing delivery after the app showed my food was on way but too a totally different area.  It was cancelled after my son spoke to them.  They were very rude about it and told us to cancel on the app, knowing they would still get paid as it showed food was out for delivery and we cancelled.. therefore it was our fault..this happened on June 30th.. my bank refunded the money but now you have taken money again for service we did not receive.  I am very angry about this. Uber don't want to know and have now refused to communicate with me

He then proceeded to take forever to reply to my texts, said he didn‚Äôt know English down the phone and to send the address, I did this, he claimed he still didn‚Äôt know where he was going. I gave him directions down the phone, he then said he was here. My partner and the receptionist had been waiting outside and looking for him through the CCTV the whole time he was on his way. He then claimed to Uber eats people he had delivered it but then another person said he was waiting 20minutes and no nobody contacted him. They are nothing but liars. One of the colleagues laughed at me down the phone, the other guy was arguing with me and just said ‚Äúanything else I can help you with‚Äù. This is not how customers should be treated or spoken to. Im disgusted. Never will I order anything from this company or anything to do with this company again. I can‚Äôt believe uber eats staff can sit there and laugh and call me a liar, disgusting behaviour. They are thief‚Äôs and liars. review: The poor experience exceeded my order. To even resolve the extended delay delivery(1.5 hrs) I was on the phone and had 5 different rude chat agents. Then to have a supervisor call promised same day but to then get called twice 2 days later at midnight is ILLEGAL and wrong. When I reposted this, The reps keep emailing me stating ‚Äúthey are sorry for my order delay and cancellation.‚Äù Or send proof of order and when the calls happened. NOTHING! We are beyond resolving the issue of the order since I had to jump through hoops with rude agents for an hour after the order was delayed to finally get cancelled. To then get called 2 days later resulting in the lack of acknowledgment of this supervisors actions resulting in these reps copying and pasting a response is so unprofessional, frustrating and lack understanding. I provided proof of this supervisor calling me twice at 12:35am but I keep getting the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry for your order‚Äù reply. Isn‚Äôt this against the FTC consumer laws on when and how companies contact you? And the fact I asked for an US based supervisor to address why I was called after midnight, I again keep getting the ‚Äúwe‚Äôre sorry for your order‚Äù cut and paste reply. Finally called and went through a whole circle of them asking the postcode, saying it was going to be 20 minutes, and not getting it. At one point he also assumed I must be the wife of the man calling which felt insulting. Another point the shop owner hung up on us (I wanted to be mean at this point, but my mate took the phone and was lovely) Finally we got a call from the driver who was a solid hour at best away (this was roughly 3 hours after the order) and at this point it was easier to send someone to a shop to get everything at half the price. The driver still hadn't picked up my food and each time I checked his location he was further away from my house. He started out about 3 miles away and the restaurant is only about 1 mile away. Aside from the fact that I could no longer wait for my order, I can't imagine how awful it would be by then, after sitting around for 2 1/2 hours waiting to be picked up. review: I stopped using Deliveroo recently as the quality of their service has gone very downhill recently and now, I will no longer be using UberEats either. I have a long history of abysmal experiences with UE‚Äôs customer service but this latest experience  has truly been the straw that broke the camel‚Äôs back. I submitted a late evening order on August 5th from a nearby co-op, for 21 items totalling around ¬£40. When the driver arrived,he handed me 1 bag with 3 items in it and asked for the code, which I gave him (assuming the rest of the bags were in his car) then he tried to leave and when I asked where the rest of the shopping was, he said he accidentally dropped it off at the previous address he was at and he‚Äôll ‚Äògo and get it‚Äô and he‚Äôll ‚Äòbe back in 10‚Äô, and before I could question him further he jumped into his car and sped off.Obviously he never returned. And of course, UE sided with him because I gave him the code. To be completely honest, this is the behaviour that I have come to expect of UE and Deliveroo delivery staff, as this kind of thing happens ALL the time across all these sorts of low paid zero hours delivery gigs. And while I have had countless frustrating experiences with UE‚Äôs customer service team, I have never had an experience this dire. Upon contacting UE immediately to report the incident, approximately 2 seconds later they came back with a copy-paste response to say they would not be refunding my 18 missing items, totalling ¬£35 worth of groceries I never received. After days of back and forth messages on multiple platforms, they claimed to have investigated the incident fully, but refused to give me a single detail of their investigation and would not budge on their decision. In the end, I have filed a chargeback with my bank and that seems to be progressing in the right direction. I just really don‚Äôt think a company with such loathsome customer service rats can be a sustainable way to function. Such a deceptive and immoral company. Seriously, customers and employees alike need to stop putting up with this abhorrent service and boycott it.
name: Kt Moon

review: I would not give even one star for Uber Eats and its DRIVER whose name is JACKSON ANTONIO. Yesterday was my daughter's birthday. I live in Greenford. I ordered food from McDonald‚Äôs in the Westway Shopping Centre using Uber Eats. It was not the first time, and never ever any driver had any problem reaching my address. THE DRIVER DID NOT ARRIVE AT ALL! I saw on the app map that he stopped at the other end of the road, which was just a 1-minute ride from me. I texted him that he is in the wrong place and he needs to drive a little bit further, but he was messaging me back something in Portuguese. Then a message came that he tried to contact me, which was absolutely a lie. It was me who was trying to call him many times, but he just rejected my phone calls and I was texting him many times, no reply. Maybe because he did not speak English. After I got a message that he cannot localise my address and he had just gone away. Then I received the photo of my order being left somewhere outside the building. It was not my address. So disappointing. Kids were hungry. How can a driver be so irresponsible, with such bad communication? What he has done to my order I don‚Äôt know. I lost almost ¬£18. Maybe it is not much, but how can I trust this company again, that allows such irresponsible people to work there, without knowing basic English? I complain to UberEats, but the reply was that I am not eligible for a refund, because the delivery person tried to contact me (which is FALSE) and he waited for 7 min to deliver the order (at the wrong address).

review: DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY.  UBER EATS HAS FAKE REVIEWS, FAKE IDS for DELIVERY DRIVERS and they are aware of this and DO NOT CARE.Very bad and unethical company that really does not care about the retailer or the customer.  It only cares about money.I had a bad experience with an order which never arrived.  I tracked the delivery driver who visited several towns after collecting the order.  I spoke to the restaurant and discovered the delivery driver who was a MAN was using a FAKE ID that belonged to a WOMAN.  I reported this to Uber eats support.  They did not care about the non delivery, they did not care about the FAKE ID.  I thought the non delivery could be a common complaint but it appears so was the FAKE ID as the support were nonchalant suggesting this is not the first time this has been mentioned. review: Great Food!!       The food I ordered arrived, still warm and looked good in it ‚Äòs container.However, I was shocked @ the total cost of the order.        I was prepared to pay for a large order of wings, but by the time I paid service fee, taxes, tips the cost was double what i had expected. It became clear to me that I cannot afford a service like this.

review: I placed a large order with a restaurant based on its proximity and time to deliver. I received a confirmation moments later showing that the delivery would be much longer than I expected and I had a large number of small children to feed. I looked to see if it was possible to cancel the order and there was an automated cancellation request, when I selected it it said that the order had been canceled and that I owed a cancellation fee of $339, The entire amount of the order. This makes no sense since if I had to pay for it anyway I may as well have the food delivered. The cancellation was processed less than 5 minutes after the order that was supposed to take more than an hour to prepare was submitted. I immediately reached out to customer service and it took two days to finally get in touch with them. They refuse to refund my money based on the order having been submitted and the restaurant already beginning to prepare the food. I went around and around with them multiple times before calling the restaurant only to find out that the restaurant manager said that the restaurant was not paid for the order because it was canceled, and they never made the food.I disputed the charge with my credit card company because I never received anything for my payment. The money was refunded to me but now Uber is billing me for it. I have attempted to contact customer service I've told them the restaurant was unpaid and didn't make the food and they've done nothing but offer me a $25 credit. The problem is that now I can't use the app without first paying the $339. The $25 credit seems a poor exchange for $339 for food I never received .I wouldn't have probably worried about it if they had charged me a $25 cancellation fee or if they had told me in advance that the order could not be canceled or would be charged in full anyway but none of these things happened. As it is, they expect me to pay them $339 for food that they never made and never delivered. I have tried to appeal to them that I can no longer do business with them, and that in my lifetime I will be worth much more as a customer than this $339 but no one seems to care. They just repeat the same information which is that they can't refund it after the order has been placed but in that case I should have been made aware of the fact before it allowed me to cancel it.
name: CK

review: Tonight I didn't get my food and its impossible to get in touch with customer services. I've not had my money back. Never using Uber Eats again

review: relaxing in my home tonight, suddenly I am half scared to death, there is banging on my living room window I look up and some strange guy is on my garden staring into my living room trying to get my attention. turns out it is a uber eats delivery driver delivering food to my daughter which I wasn't aware of, he had, I guess, been knocking and no one had heard him. does this give him the right to invade my privacy? probably not illegal? but certainly rude and unprofessional, aren't you supposed to wait or text. who does this guy and this company think they are?

I've been struggling since Friday to reach a resolution but their customer service is so pathetic that I keep receiving a basic email instead of a response to my complaint. My issue is not being recognized nor is their response helpful. I do not recommend ordering from Shawarma House in Kensington unless you prefer vegetarian meals.

review: I don't use Uber because I have had issues previously with their Uber drivers, I know Uber don't care about anything but money. My friend ordered Uber eats to my place on the weekend, and the driver delivered the food and then left, whether he actually left I am not sure about. 30 mins after the delivery was handed to me, the driver was back and buzzing my unit, I answered the intercom as i assuming he dropped something inside the complex and needed to come get it. He told me he needed to use the toilet and asked if I would let him use mine. I decided to do the right thing because Uber probably wouldn't care to ensure their drivers have bathroom access, they are reputable for being a poor employer and poor service, so I let him in to use my bathroom. When he came out of the bathroom, I expected he would than me and leave, but he wasn't leaving, he stayed near the door, looking around at my place. He seen my cat and started calling it over to which it ignored. Then he proceeded to ask me if I lived alone which made it clear he was not there because he needed to use the toilet. He couldn't from where he was standing thay I had a friend with me, but as soon as I told him another person was with me, he very quickly got himself out of my unit. This is extremely dodgy as he clearly didnt come to my home needing a bathroom, he either never left and stayed for half an hour, or he came back to target me because I am a young female and he thought i was alone, and wanted to suss out if I lived there alone. My friend contacted Uber via the app and told them what happened becuse we both felt uncomfortable about what happened, and Uber just sent a generic response to pretty much say sorry for the experience, and shut the conversation off. They are not looking into this incident and the driver will continue to try look for single women who live alone. I already knew Uber would do nothing, it's typical Uber to not care.I am wanting to warn everyone about using Uber that their drivers are untrustworthy and will try and target perople home alone and try gain access after the delivery is done. Do not trust Uber! They allow this to happen under their watch. Stay safe and avoid Uber, you cant trust your address with their drivers as you may be targeted. I have never had this issue with any other delivery app, it seems to be an issue with Ubers drivers, and probably because they let them get away with it and do nothing. I am now banning anybody from Using Uber at my home, apparently not using Uber myesf wasn't enough to avoid their problematic drivers.

I did get an email from them saying that oops mistakes happen and I should not be such a picky customer - I was really missing items i paid for - what!? I no longer use UberEats service - I use Skip or DD much better customer service with the inevitable mistakes from restaurants, and more efficent driving service overall. Do not use UberEats.

review: I‚Äôd give zero stars if I could!I will never ever use Uber Eats ever again! Let‚Äôs get this straight I did an order one the 11th of June which I waited nearly an hour or over an hour as 6 times it said on the app there relocated a new driver, further more I eventually received my food which wasn‚Äôt food by that point as I received it all smashed up and liquids had gone everywhere and let‚Äôs just say I wasn‚Äôt aware until I put the bags on the sofa to then see there what looked to be ice cream and coke now bedded into it so had to someone to clean it up because Uber eat‚Äôs clearly wanted to be ido**, anyway they said on the phone mind you that if I‚Äôve not received my refund by the 2nd of August then ‚Äú simply‚Äù contact them‚Ä¶ we‚Äôll there was no simply about it, I had a bad time trying to get hold of someone as they refused to speak to me because I didn‚Äôt have an open order because it gone past the 48 hour mark when not being funny how else am I meant to predict the fact I was never going to receive that refund, vicious cycle as they tell you to wait 2 months for the refund but when it‚Äôs not there they refuse to speak to you, so at that point they opened up an automated chat for me on the app which speaking to a wall would of been more helpful! So tried to add on there the fact I spoken on the phone at the time as i didn‚Äôt except to be on the app trying to demand my ¬£33 pounds back !They kept giving me the scripted words of ‚Äú sorry for the inconvenience but without an active order we can not refund you as it‚Äôs gone over the 48 hour‚Äù Blar blar basically more like they make you wait for 2 months to then tell you are not eligible for a refund!

review: I put in an order from Amir Ile Perrot $44.A few minutes later, the uber driver messages me that he accepted the order by mistake and that I would need to cancel the order otherwise his "score" would be affected (sorry).I didn't even know I could cancel an order but after going through the help chat bot, I accidentally cancelled my order from being bombarded by chat messages and options when I was just trying to contact someone from Uber (which is way harder than it should be).Then after accidentally cancelling my order, I'm able to speak with a customer service agent who tells me I messed up and there's nothing they can do for me and I'm now stuck with a $33 charge for nothing in return. For additional context, I've never had any disputes on my account and I've been with them for years. After arguing with the person they offer my $10 to which I respond with my dissatisfaction and results in the agent telling me theyre sorry for me experience, have a nice day and ends chat.I escalate the conversation to Uber (not eats) and the second person tells me more or less the same thing but, this time, with a $25 credit. Again, I tell them how that's not good enough, the DRIVER WAS NOT GOING TO DELIVER (proof available in the chat logs with the driver). Finally after arguing for a while, they reluctantly offer me a full refund as a credit on my account.They never addressed the driver situation which is crazy and now I'm left with Uber eats PTSD and no food that I was supposed to receive an hour ago.

review: These delivery app companies are ripping consumers off wholesale! I've been trying each and every one of them for the first time this year and they're all the same. Somehow, in spite of charging you so much to deliver your order, you will either get sent the wrong order or some of the items will be missing. When you try to get a refund, you're given a store credit that doesn't even come close to covering what was lost.For instance, I ordered something today through Uber Eats for $12, which--when all put together--almost cost me $24. Okay, fine, I get that this is the price to pay for convenience, but at least have the decency to give me everything I ordered. In my case,  of course the costliest item was missing and I was only given a $2 credit for an item that was over $6! And I was charged almost $12 in fees, taxes and tips! But I only get $2 back?This is absolutely unacceptable, and Americans need to start contacting the attorney general in their state to go after companies like UberEats, Door Dash, etc. Take screenshots of your items, customer service response, etc. and write your attorney general!

My advise to you all is order your food through JUSTEAT and DELIVEROO ( i have had similar experiences which was resolved within the hour) UBER EATS are abyismal and hands down the worst customer service i have EVER recieved. review: My recent encounter with Uber Eats left me utterly disappointed and frustrated. I had ordered from a merchant, but to my dismay, they cancelled my order right after I booked it. Annoyed, I had no choice but to place an order with another merchant, which thankfully got delivered eventually.The real nightmare began when I noticed the sum of ¬£35.27 debited from my account for the cancelled order. Attempting to rectify the situation, I desperately tried to contact the merchant through Uber Eats, but surprise, surprise, there was no viable option to reach them! I had to resort to using Google search to find their contact details.Upon calling the merchant, they washed their hands of the matter and directed me back to Uber Eats, which, as it turns out, is no walk in the park to get in touch with. It's almost as if they purposefully avoid addressing pertinent issues like "Why was I charged when my order was cancelled?" in their Help page.After jumping through hoops, I finally managed to contact Uber Eats through an alternative means, but guess what? They outright refused to assist me since more than 48 hours had passed. Now, let me clarify that I did try to check my account just a day after the incident and noticed the amount was "Pending." So, naturally, I assumed the charge wouldn't go through.But no! Uber Eats decided to go ahead and charge me for an order that was cancelled by the merchant. What kind of absurd policy is that? Why should I be penalised for their inability to keep track of cancelled orders? It's ridiculous and infuriating!This whole experience has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I will think twice before ever using Uber Eats again. Their lack of customer support and the unjustified charges have completely shattered my trust in their service. I strongly advise against using Uber Eats unless you want to risk being ripped off for a cancelled order. A terrible experience overall!

review: Customer service is not assisting me and keeps fobbing me off or the person I'm speaking to leaves the chat. I checked out an order for the desired items at the desired cost. Which I have a screenshot for. Then 20 minutes after checking when my food will arrive. It showed up more than double the price and added 2 extra items  WHICH I DID NOT CHECK OUT WITH. I tried to contact the resturant to stop the order as Uber Eats app had clearly glitched. No answer from the resturant. I then called and messaged the driver to say not to pick up my order. No response. Before my order came I then reached out to Urber eats online chat and was told they can only help me once my order was complete!?! And then as you guessed it left the chat. Spoke to various other members of your team for them to also leave the chat. One said the chat was only to discuss live orders and they cannot help as mine is completed. Contradictory to what the first person advised.Therefore when the delivery driver came I took what I rightfully ordered and told him to return the two extra items I did not order (but yet still paid for)I therefore want the refund for the two extra items I didnt order and didnt accept. I paid ¬£41 for one chocolate waffle!!Please tell me why your customer service continues to fail me on every attempt I make to resolve my issue?I have opened a dispute with PayPal which was my payment method and I would appreciate somebody contacting me. I have a screenshot of my correct order total and a screenshot of when it changed. Luckily I was able to capture this as on a different section of your app it showed my true order.I want my refund that I am rightfully owed or I will be taking this matter further. Absoulty disgusted. P.s I wouldn't mind if customer service were able to resolve my issue in a timely manner but to get no assistance when I have tried countless times is dispicable.Still not resolved. I will update accordingly if and when it does.
