review: I placed an order via the McDonald's app for delivery the order was delivered however some was missing and the meals they sent all had a bit missing- can you imagine the embarrassment caused when some of the childrens meals turn up but my best friends childs meal didnt... - I promptly called the uber driver straight away he said I need to contact the restaurant I tried to telephone the restaurant at least 20 times leaving a couple of messages but to no avail I was missing a meal and some a nugget from 3 other meals and the lemonade drinks were flat upon trying to make contact with the chatbot on the app everything I tried to attach my invoice the app closed I then emailed McDonald's about 5 times to finally be told for a refund I have to contact uber eats I went onto my uber eats app and didn't get anywhere because the order wasn't ordered on their app but when you look at your McDonald's receipt it lists ubereats as the vendor!I also tried to call the delivery driver again but he had blocked my call!

review: It is the second/third occasion that I have been left out of pocket because of this ridiculous company. Almost every time i place a grocery order, there is something missing. Recently, I have been unable to go out to purchase items so have resulted to ordered through the app. They have refused to refund me for items that were missing and these are not cheap items. I am disgusted and appalled by the quick response of ‚Äòunfortunately, we will be unable to provide a refund on this occasion‚Äô. If an item will not be delivered because it is not in stock, instead of just telling me it is out of stock. They continue to process the order and then when I tell them the item is missing, they do nothing about it and take the money. I wonder how many other customers are falling into this horrid trap.

review: We ordered a McDonald's which took 50 minutes to arrive with Uber. When it did get here they'd missed out 2 medium fries. Called the Uber delivery driver straight away to explain what happened (in case she had accidentally forgotten to hand us a bag) and she just hung up on me! So I called back again, no answer this time, so left a voicemail asking why she'd  hung up and could she call back to see what we could do about it. No response so called McDonald's. They said we need to speak to Uber about a refund so tried the app help which was next to useless as I didn't have an 'active order'. Never again! Would advise others not to bother either the food is cold and shrivelled up by the time it gets to you anyway.  McDonald's compensated me with 2 x large fries and 3 Mcflurries but still made a relatively straightforward process so frustrating!

review: Repeatably extremely poor customer service. If you have the audacity to have more then one issue on separate deliveries with your food they no longer care. In fact even when I could track my food that arrived cold because the driver went home for half an hour with my food, prior to delivery, was reported, I got no feedback and was told they won‚Äôt uphold my complaint, pretty much telling me my food wasn‚Äôt cold. I was an Uber one customer too. Terrible experience and terrible CS. I‚Äôve gone out of my way to give this poor review as I truly believe the public deserve better than what this company has to offer. I haven‚Äôt used them now for months and have received far superior service from others such as food hub and so much cheaper too. I have deleted their app, unsubscribed from their poor Uber one service and will never ever use this horrible company again. Even when trying to complain their app actually tipped the driver without me wanting to, and they even refused to refund that! Why would I tip a driver I‚Äôm trying to complain about. There competitors are a much better choice. You‚Äôve had your chances Uber, too many to name. You lost a very loyal customer here. I highly recommend people avoid this company. Extremely disappointed and as far as I‚Äôm concerned the world would be a better place without UberEats.

review: I ordered food on 28/07/23 and requested it to be delivered to my door. I added the entrance code to the building, the floor number and the flat number but the delivery person left it outside of the building instead. He sent a picture of the delivery, and it was literally on the floor, outside a building of 94 flats. When I went downstairs,it was no longer there. The delivery guy did call and I missed it (but called back a 4 minutes later to no answer). However there was NO need to leave it outside as he did. When I raised a claimed it was dismissed right away because it "had been delivered". No one read the details of what actually happened and they closed the claim right away. I raised a second one which was also dismissed because "someone was already looking into it", when in reality the other claim was already archived. I raised it yet again and all I got at this point was "sorry but as mentioned before, we can't refund a delivery after 48 hours". First, it had not been mentioned before, which shows they don't even read or check what has been said. And secondly, my original complaint literally happened minutes after the failed delivery. They have TWICE now sent the same message " sorry but as mentioned before, we can't refund a delivery after 48 hours" and nothing else. In 3 separate instances I asked to log an official complaint but it was ignored every single time. It's the worst customer support I've received in my life, on top of the terrible service I got for the delivery. Appalling.

This usually happens when you tip on the app. And when I checked, they had charged me around 7$ more. So in total it was a 17$ tip on a 50$ order. And the customer support was not really helpful.

name: Gagan Oberoi

review: I'm a delivery rider and I also order take aways frequently. I can say that between three major UK delivery apps which are Just Eat, Deliveroo, and Uber Eats; Uber Eats stands in last place while Deliveroo takes first. I rarely have any issues with Deliveroo since they were able to tackle its rider's wrong doings who were using fake GPS and hold orders while delivering food from other apps or even the same app in which the account might not even belong to them because most are illegal imigrants who pay rent for it.Just Eat has the similar problem and most riders use between 2-4 Stuart accounts (Just Eat), takes one order while holding their GPS from other mobiles in the same location, accepting an order in their different accounts, holding them there while doing another delivery.This really isn't fair for its costumers because they paid for the order and also for the delivery and they expect to receive the order nice and hot which rarely happens. I've e-mailed Stuart and Just Eat countless times trying to explain to them what goes on and they don't seem to care.The app that I consider worst for their customers, whose riders abuse their system is Uber Eats. Uber came up with a strategy to favor themselves but I believe it backfired on them and they are really losing money. Using as an example, Mc Donalds; If the riders accepts an order that is paying 2.70, most will not deliver it because it's not even worth the wait during pickup. What they do is accept the order but do not pick it up, wait for about 20 minutes then reject the order while a colleague of theirs is also waiting and see if that same order will popup on his mobile with an increased value which is usually doubled the original value. Depending on the riders, they keep doing it until it's paying above 10 pounds and they hope it pops up in one of their many rented uber accounts. I once ordered 2 milkshakes that took almost 2 hours to arrive and they were as warm as the sandwich that came with it and I knew they did this method with my order even when I messaged them asking them to please not do it. I reported them to Uber and I believe they did nothing about those riders which is very sad.As I said before, I'm a delivery rider and also a regular customer on these apps and I put myself inside the customers shoes when I deliver. I am terrified that these apps don't do anything to improve the customers experience while knowing that the major problems are the riders who are causing it.I'm only ordering my take aways with Deliveroo until these other companies decide to take action against these type of riders and start to favour their customers.
name: WT

review: Never disappoints! Always on time, provides real time updates. Delicious food. Great service overall! Kudos!

review: Placed an order and paid fir express delivery. Was told it would delivered to my place of work by 5.15pm. At 5.25pm I tracked order to be told the driver had been sat outside for 7mins and tried calling my number twice both of which are lies. I work on reception of a car dealership showroom made up of ceiling to floor glass windows and I can see who drives in and out and certainly if a car was sat outside for 7mins. I call had no missed call on my mobile. I tried taking this up with Urber who told me I was it entitled to a refund as the driver followed their T&C guidelines fir delivery. I tried for a 2nd time and got the same response. So I am down by just short of ¬£19 l an that is their gain & their driver also kept the order as I checked with the food chain I got it from and order was not returned to them.Decusting customer service!!DO NOT TRUST OR USE UBER EATS. I know I won't again and dego makes sure my family and friends don't too.
name: CG

review: ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è. Very timely.  Very professional Uber Eats is a popular food delivery service that allows users to order food from local restaurants through a mobile app or website. Customers can browse through a variety of restaurants, choose their desired items, and have them delivered to their doorstep.One of the benefits of using Uber Eats is the convenience it offers. Users can track their order in real-time, receive notifications about the status of their delivery, and communicate with the delivery driver if needed. The app also allows users to save their payment information, making the checkout process quick and easy.However, like any delivery service, experiences with Uber Eats can vary. Some users have reported positive experiences, praising the speed and reliability of the service, as well as the wide range of restaurants available. On the other hand, there have been occasional complaints about delayed deliveries, incorrect orders, or issues with customer support.It's important to note that experiences can differ depending on various factors, such as your location, the specific restaurant you order from, and the availability of delivery drivers in your area. To get the most accurate and up-to-date information about Uber Eats in your area, it's best to check reviews or ask friends or neighbors who have recently used the service.

Last night I ordered food from a place with Uber eats and I was casually eating broccoli and the next thing you know I‚Äôm choking and heaving because a long brown hair was inside the food, I‚Äôve contacted the company and all they say is sorry and refuse to give me a refund. review: I was threatened and shouted at by a delivery driver because i did not have my PIN .......I live in a block of flats and had to go downstairs to collect my food , I did not notice when ordering a PIN number would be required , when i told the driver i did not know the PIN or indeed have it with me he started shouting at me that i will not get my food and will not get a refund , this shouting became more and more  aggressive and his fist was raised and clenched on a couple of occasions , i was then blocked from entering the lift to go upstairs despite telling him several times I would go upstairs with him and try to find the PIN number , after about 15 minutes of his abuse he finally came with me and looked on my laptop for the PIN , after which he snatched  the receipt from the bag and left , by which time my food was only just warm and I was left shaken  ........A report has been sent to Uber and i wait their reply.

review: Today was my first time ordering from Uber Eats so it's unfortunate it didn't go well. When the driver arrived, he had an order from a completely different restaurant and said that was the only one he was given. I didn't accept it. It was a pain though in fairness to Uber Eats, after calling them they refunded me in full. Hence the 2 stars opposed to 1.I won't be using again since I can't trust whether it's a once off, though kudos to their customer service team.

review: I have never had any problems with uber eats, however this Saturday I had placed a order waited over an hour as the drivers kept cancelling my order. review: No food, no moneyI really should have looked on here first before making my order. I ordered from a Chinese restaurant and was patiently waiting for my food despite the delivery time increasing and getting longer on the app. Eventually it said delivered and I was surprised as we were home and no delivery, so we checked the door‚Ä¶nothing. I tried calling the driver several times and when he eventually picked, it seemed like he couldn‚Äôt communicate in English or he was just avoiding my questions. He never even attempted to call me to confirm when delivering. I was given a code when I placed the order but it is obvious the code is as useless as Uber eats. I don‚Äôt understand how my food did not arrive and I have been charged despite given a code to avoid this. Well, I then escalated to the help team who were very unhelpful and said I couldn‚Äôt be refunded after review. I asked them to explain what was reviewed and how they couldn‚Äôt explain how they arrived at h the decision and just replied the same thing. I was very hungry, upset and sad as I had just lost ¬£30 and no food. Avoid this company if you don‚Äôt want to lose out.

review: While this was only my second experience with UberEats, I was not extremely satisfied.  The food was still very good, and warm (probably sat under the heat lamps an extra 45 min).  The final delivery driver was excellent.  I ordered food at 1350.  The problem I had was drivers kept accepting the job then 10-15 min later dropping the job, so my estimated 1420 delivery kept changing and finally got my food at 1521‚Ä¶.one hour AFTER the initial delivery time and 31 min after the ‚Äúlatest‚Äù delivery time.  Not terrible, but this was a Monday afternoon (no holiday / special event).

review: Delivery driver was on my street with a $200 order. I received a text while waving down the driver that my order was cancelled for no reason. Have tried several ways to contact them but continue to receive the same generic message requesting my order number. I have submitted my order number 3 times. They have not refunded me and there is no way to get my money back. DO NOT use this service. My delivery man went home with a nice order for his family that I paid for. They are thieves.
